src_text: 1    IKhabinethi yamukele ukuvulwa kwesiKhwama sokuBonelela umPhakathi ongaSebenziko yiHlangano eThuthukisa amaBubulo (i-IDC) ngokutjhebisana ne-Ofisi kaMengameli kunye ne-dtic.
tgt_text: Bohodu bja dikgerekgere tša tšhipi le dikheibole tša koporo mo mananeokgoparareng mmušo bo šitiša go šoma gabotse ga ikonomi bjalo ka ge bo hlola gore dilo tše di rekišwago disenyegelo tša gona di ye godimo go feta tekano.

src_text: Lelisekelo lizokuvulela abantu abatjha abapheze babe zii-50 000 amathuba wokuvala iinkhala emsebenzini olisizo emphakathini weendawo ngeendawo.
tgt_text: Tše dingwe tša ditšhitišo tše di akaretša kabo ya mohlagase le ditirelo tša ditimela ka baka la diporo tša ditimela tšeo di sentšwego.
Di hlola disenyegelo tša tlaleletšo tša dinamelwa banameding ka baka la dinamelwa tšeo di šwalalantšwego tša banamedi.

src_text: 2    Lelisekelo lizokufaka hlangana ukutjhejwa kwepilo nehlalakuhle yomphakathi, ukusekela amano wokunikela ngokudla okunepilo njengeendawo eziphekela abanganabuyo isopo, ukukhuthaza isiko lokutlola nokufunda, ukutjala namahlelo wokukhandela ukusilaphazeka kwebhoduluko kunye namano wokusekela ilutjha.
tgt_text: Dikheibole tšeo di sentšwego le tša go lokaloka tša mohlagase di hlola kotsi ya polokego setšhabeng, kudukudu baneng..     Kabinete file tlhahlo ya gore dtic swanetše go etapele ditherišano mo nakong ye šetšego ye kopana, le go humana digopolo go tšwa setšhabeng le go tšwa mafapheng maleba ka magato mohola ao ka phethagatšwago ke mmušo go fediša go senywa ga mananeokgoparara bohlokwa ikonomi.

src_text: Lesisikhwama sizokusekela  amabhizinisi womphakathi ama-26  angasebenzeli inzuzo.
tgt_text: Morago ga tshepedišo ye, Kabinete tla bolela ka magato ao dumeletšwego     Ditiragalo tšeo di Tlago.
Simposiamo ya Boditšhabatšhaba ya Tšhomišanommogo ya Theknolotši go Reniša Khutšo (PTPS) ya Ditšhabakopano (UN).

src_text: Ubulelesi Nekohlakalo.
tgt_text: Afrika Borwa tla swara PTPS ya Boselela kua Khanseleng ya Dinyakišišo tša Mahlale le tša Intasteri gola Pretoria go thoma ka Labobedi, 21 go fihla ka Labohlano, 24 Phupu.

src_text: IKhabinethi yamukele ukubotjhwa kwabantu abambadlwana mayelana nokukhwabanisa, ukukhukhuthiswa kweemali nekohlakalo.
tgt_text: Go letetšwe gore go tle baemedi ba 300 go tšwa mebušong ya dinaga tše 50 tšeo di lego maloko yona.

src_text: Hlangana nezaphulamthethwezi kubalwa nabasebenzi abakhe baba ziimphathimandla zeenkhundla eziphakemeko zembusweni nezamabubulo wombuso, abanye babo baqalene nemilandu yokuphula umthetho wokuphathwa kweeMali zomBuso (umthetho Nomboro 1 wee-1999).
tgt_text: Simposiamo ye kopantšha mmogo mašole ao nago le kgahlego, maphodisa le badudi go tšwa dinageng tšeo Mebušo ya tšona lego maloko UN go šomišana mmogo tirišong ya theknolotši ya sebjalebjale le ye gatetšego pele gotee le mareo ao šomišwago mererong ya sešole ye eteletšwego pele ke UN.

src_text: Ukubotjhwa kwabo – abafaka hlangana umsebenzi womNyango  wezaNgekhaya e-Desmond Tutu Refugee Reception Centre ePitori, ngezwangobatjho  yokufunjathiswa liphandle – kufakazela ukuthi akunamuntu ongehla komthetho godu nokuthi asinayo indawo yabasebenzi abakhohlakeleko eminyangweni yombuso..     IKhabinethi yamukele godu iragelophambili ngemizamo yokubuyiselwa ngeSewula Afrika kwezelamani zakwa-Gupta, u-Rajesh no-Atul.
tgt_text: Simposiamo ye tla šomišwa bjalo ka sefala sa go abelana tshedimošo le sa go logišana maano mebušong ye lego maloko UN ebile amega masolong go reniša khutšo ka theknolotši ya moragorago mererong ya sešole ya go reniša moya wa khutšo..     Phenkgišano ya Bosetšhaba ya go Swarwa ka Morago ga Mengwaga ye Mebedi ya Wekšopo ya Bone ya Mabokgoni Afrika Borwa Maemo Bolefase (WSZA).

src_text: Lokhu kuza ngemva kokubotjhwa kwabo mhlapha e-Dubai e-UAE ngemva kobana iHlangano yezamaPholisa yePhasiloke (i-Interpol) yakhupha iinyeleliso eziburhaba ngokufunwa kwabo ziimphathimandla zomthetho zeSewula Afrika.
tgt_text: Phenkgišano ya Bosetšhaba ya go Swarwa ka Morago ga Mengwaga ye Mebedi ya WSZA swarelwa Sentharengkgoparara ya Boditšhabatšhaba ya Inkosi Albert Luthuli gola KwaZulu-Natal go thoma ka la 7 go fihla ka la 10 Phupu 2022 ka fase ga morero wo: “Ga go Boelwe Morago ka go Hlatloša Tšweletšo ya Bašomi ba Diatla ba Mengwagalekgolo ya bo21”..     Tiragalo ye šomišwa go hlohleletša mabokgoni go šoma ka diatla bjalo ka mošomo wa makgonthe wo motho ka ikgethelago ona bophelong gotee le go bulela dikgwebišano tšeo di tshephišago le intasteri ye.

src_text: Izelamanezi ziyafunwa eSewula Afrika mayelana neensolo ngendima yazo ekugolweni kombuso, okufaka hlangana ukukhwabanisa nokukhukhuthiswa kweemali.
tgt_text: Tiragalo ye šomišwa gape go lekola maemo rena boithutelamošomo le tlhabollo ya go šoma ka diatla godimo ga tlhohleletšo ya go šušumetša go tšewa ga mešomo ya bophelo ka moka ya go šoma ka diatla bjalo ka mešomo yeo ka bago kgetho ya mathomo baithuting ba rena     Melaetša.

src_text: Iyaraga imikhulumiswano yokubuyiselwa kwabo eSewula Afrika hlangana nama-ejensi wokuthotjelwa komthetho e-UAE neweSewula Afrika.
tgt_text: Mahloko Kabinete bile le Mopresidente Ramaphosa go lebiša mahloko Lapeng la Bogoši le setšhabeng sa Pušo ya amaMpondo morago ga go hlokofala ga Mohlomphegikgolo Kgoši Zanozuko Tyelovuyo Sigcau     Bao ba Thwetšwego MešomongBatho ka moka bao ba thwetšwego mešomong mangwalo bona thuto tlo tiišeletšwa le go netefatšwa ka tsela ye maleba.

src_text: Ukubotjhwa kwabo kutjengisa ukuzimisela kukarhulumende ukulwisana nobulelesi nekohlakalo ngaphandle kokwesaba nokuthatha ihlangothi..     Ukubotjhwa lokhu kutjengisa ukuthi umsebenzi neendlela lezi zisebenza ngefanelo ukwenza abasolwa baziphendulele ngezenzo zabo ezihlubayezako nokuqinisekisa ukuthi akunamuntu ongehla komthetho.
tgt_text: Morena Jacob Ganny Mbele bjalo ka Molaodipharephare (DG) Kgorong ya Methopo ya Diminirale le Enetši..     Mme Pumeza Nwabisa Nodada bjalo ka Motlatšamolaodipharephare: Taolo ya Kagodithokgwa Kgorong ya Kagodithokgwa, Boreatlhapi le Tikologo.
Mme Susan Mafanedza Masapu bjalo ka Moeletšimogolwane wa Melao ya Mmušo wa Kgoro ya Toka le Tlhabollo ya Molaotheo..     Mme Doris Tshepe bjalo ka Mokomišinare wa Khomišene ya Diphenkgišano.

src_text: IKhabinethi  isole umzamo  osemtarini  wokugiribeza umnotho wethu nelizwe ngemva kokulinyazwa kumbi kwekhebula e-Unit 1 ePhawa iMatla yakwa-Eskom  eMpumalanga.
tgt_text: Ngaka Alex Mahapa bjalo ka Moeletši wa Moswananoši wa Goyagoile go Tona ya Motšwaoswere ya Ditirelo tša Mmušo le Tsamaišo.

src_text: Ngalesisehlakalo kilephawa besele kusisehlakalo sesine esisolwa ngokugiribeza ngemva kokubikwa kwezehlakalo ezifanako ezibikwe kamanye amaphawa amathathu eemvekeni ezidlulileko.
tgt_text: Moadbokheiti Rams Ramashia bjalo ka Moeletši wa Moswananoši wa Lebakanyana go Tona ya Motšwaoswere ya Ditirelo tša Mmušo le Tsamaišo.

src_text: Ukutjhuguluka Kwetlayimethi.
tgt_text: Phetogo ya Klaemete.

src_text: IKhabinethi ikuthokozele ukuvakatjhela eSewula Afrika kukaNom.
tgt_text: Kabinete amogetše ketelo ya go tla ka mo Afrika Borwa ka Morena Alok Sharma, Mopresidente wa Samiti ya bo-26 ya Phetogo ya Klaemete ya Ditšhabakopano (UN), go thoma ka la 19 go fihla ka la 21 Phupu 2022, gotee le phetleko ya gagwe ya gore Afrika Borwa laeditše boikgafo bja mošito godimo ga diphetogo tša go diriša mohlagase wa go hlweka..     Ka 2021, Mopresidente Cyril Ramaphosa bile le baetapele ba bangwe ba dinaga go tsebagatša tšhomišanommogo ye bohlokwa le mebušo ya Fora, Germany, United Kingdom le Amerika gotee le Kopano ya Yuropa, go thekga diphetogo tša go se tšee lehlakore tša ikonomi ya khabone ya maemo fase le setšhaba sa go tielela kgahlanong le diphetogo tša klaemete..     Afrika Borwa be šoma ga boima go itokišetša sefala sa diphetogo tša rena goya mohlagaseng wa go hlweka le go thoma go šomiša methopo ya mohlagase wa go hlweka go swana le haedrotšene ya tlhago, dilahlwa, mohlagase wa go fehlwa ka moya, mohlagase wa seetša sa letšatši le mohlagase wa go fehlwa ka meetse, magareng ga mehuta ye mengwe ya go mpshafatšega.

src_text: Alok Sharma, onguMengameli wehlandla lama-26 lomHlangano weenKhulu zeHlangano yeenTjhaba eziBumbeneko (i-UN) ngokuTjhuguluka kweTlayimethi, ukusukela ngomhla we-19 ukuyokufika kumhla wama-21 kuMgwengweni wee-2022, yathokozela nokulinganisa kwakhe ukuthi iSewula Afrika izibophelele ngokubonakalako  ngokweyamela ehlelweni leembaseli ezingasilaphaziko.
tgt_text: Mehutahuta ye tswakanego ya mohlagase hlola tekatekano magareng ga methopo ya mohlagase go netefatša mohlagase wa go botega wa go kgona go fihlelela dinyakwa tša mohlagase tša naga ye tšeo di golelago godimo.
Go Hlaba Meento ya Bolwetši bja Coronavirus (COVID-19).

src_text: Ngomnyaka wee-2021, uMengameli u-Cyril Ramaphosa wahlanganyela nabanye abarholi ekumemezeleni ukusebenzisana okwakhe umlando bokubambisana naborhulumende bamazwe naka alandelako: i-France, iJarimani, i-United Kingdom ne-United States kunye ne-European Union ukusekela ihlelo elilungileko lokweyamela emnothweni womthamo ophasi wekhabhoni kunye nomphakathi okwazi ukujamelana nokutjhuguluka kwetlayimethi.
tgt_text: Kabinete amogetše phuhlamo ye kgolo ya diphetelo tša COVID-19 tšeo di gatišitšwego ka mo Afrika Borwa mo dibekeng tše mmalwa tša go feta ebile hlohleleditše batho ka moka bao ba nago le maswanedi go tšwelapele go entela, ka ge seo se thuša go efoga malwetši šoro, go amogelwa maokelong le go bolawa ke COVID-.

src_text: ISewula Afrika seyinesikhathi isebenza ngokukhuthala, isebenzela ukulungiselela ukweyamela ehlelweni leembaseli ezingasilaphaziko, ilungiselela nokuthoma ukusebenzisa imithombo yamandla weembaseli ehlwengileko, enjengehayidrojini ehlwengileko, i-biomas, umtjhiso wommoya, umtjhiso welanga, kunye negezi ephehlwa ngamanzi,  hlangana nezinye zeembaseli ezivuselelekako.
tgt_text: Palo ya go feta seripa ya batho ba bagolo ba MaAfrika Borwa go fihla gabjale ba amogeditšwe selekanyo sa moento wa COVID-19 se ka bago se tee.

src_text: Lokhu okuthiwa ziimbaseli ezimvango kunzinzisa imithombo yamandla ukuqinisekisa ukuthi kunegezi eyaneleko ezakugcina iindingo zegezi ezisolo zisanda elizweni lekhethweli.
tgt_text: Mmušo ikemišeditše go diriša dikadimo tša tswala ya fase tšeo di sa tšogo dumelelwa ke Panka ya Lefase go reka dilekanyo tša tlaleletšo tša moento wa COVID-19 le go netefatša gore setšhaba se šireletšegile ka fao go lekanego kgahlanong le diphetelo tše dingwe tše ka bago gona.

Kabinete lebeletše gape merero ya go amana le dikgatelopele tša go laola leuba la COVID-19, kudukudu ka kgatelopele ye fihleletšwego ya go boela sekeng ka botlalo ga ditiragalo tša setlwaedi tša ikonomi maphelong rena.

src_text: Ikarekelo Yomjovo Wesifo Sengogwana I-Corona (i-COVID-19)   .
tgt_text: Tona ya Maphelo, Ngaka Joe Phaahla tla fa tshedimošo ka moka ka botlalo.

src_text: IKhabinethi ikuthokozele ukwehla khulu kwenani labantu abangenwe sisifo se-COVID-19 eSewula Afrika eemvekaneni ezidlulileko, yabe yakhuthaza boke abantu abalungele ukuhlaba ukuthi baragele phambili basihlabele lesisifo, njengoba lokhu kulisizo nje ekuphephiseni abantu ukuthi bangangenwa magulo amambi, bangalaliswa esibhedlela namkha bagule bebabhubhe.
tgt_text: Letšatši la Bosetšhaba la Baswa.

Kabinete lebogile MaAfrika Borwa ka moka ge ba tsenetše meketeko ya naga ye ya Letšatši la Bosetšhaba la Baswa ka Labone, 16 Phupu 2022 ka fase ga morero wo: “Go hlohleletša mekgwa ya go iphediša ya go tšea nako ye telele le tielelo ya baswa go fihlelela bokamoso bjo bo kaonafatšego.” Moya wa lethabo le go se boele morago wo laeditšwego ke baswa go ralala setšhaba ka moka ke lona lebakabaka la meketeko le tshepho ya bokamoso bjo bo kaonafetšego.

src_text: Isiquntu sabo boke abantu abakhulu beSewula Afrika bekube nje, ubuncani bakhona sebakhe bahlaba kanye bahlabela i-COVID-.
tgt_text: Ge Kgwedi ya Bosetšhaba ya Baswa ya mafelelong re ntšheng ka ga tšhwene mo maitekelong rena go netefatša gore baswa ba kgona go ikhweletša mananeo mantši go ba thekga ao tlago ka mmušo le go ba kgontšha go kgatha tema ka mafolofolo ikonoming..     Kgoro ya Ditirelo tša Setšhaba, bjalo ka mongmošomo wa go thwala batho ka bontši arabetše tlhotlo ye ka go kgontšha dialoga tša go se šome go hwetša maitemogelo ka Lenaneo la Dialoga la Boithutelamaitemogelo la Ditirelo tša Setšhaba le la Boithutelamošomo.

src_text: Urhulumende unqophe ukusebenzisa imali asandukubolekwa yona mhlapha evunyelwe yiBhanga yePhasi, enamakonyana aphasi, ukungezelela imithamo yomjovo we-COVID-19, kuzokuqinisekiseka ukuthi isitjhaba sivikeleke ngokwaneleko engozini yokutheleleka ngalesisifo..  IKhabinethi ibuye yaqala neendaba eziphathelene nokulawulwa kwesifo esikhe sarhagalesi, i-COVID-19, khulukhulu malungana nendima esele yenziwe nokubuyela ngokupheleleko emisebenzini ejayelekileko kezomnotho.
tgt_text: Mmušo phethagatša gape le Sekhwama sa Mešomo Setšhabeng (SEF) ebile tsošološitše masolo tlhomo ya mešomo Ditirelo tša Bosetšhaba tša Baswa (NYS) ao ka bobedi ga ona tlo batametšago baswa ba go lekana 50 000 ka gare ga ditiragalo tša ikonomi.

src_text: UNgqongqotjhe wezePilo uDorh.
tgt_text: Masolo a ka se thuše fela ka go aba maitemogelo mošomo ao tsomegago kudu eupša tla thuša gape le ka go tsošološa mohola wa gore badudi ba kgathe tema ka mafolofolo.

src_text: Joe Phaahla usezasinikela eminye imininingwana malungana nalokhu.
tgt_text: SEF šomišana le mekgatlo ye sego ya mmušo (di-NGO) mola NYS ngwala fase maina baswa gore be bona ba khumanago mešomo mo ditirelong tša go hola batho setšhabeng go ralala naga ka bophara.

src_text: ILanga LeLutjha LeliZweloke.
tgt_text: Dinamelwa.

src_text: IKhabinethi ithokoze woke amaSewula Afrika ngokuhlanganyela esikhumbuzweni seLanga leLutjha leliZweloke ngeLesine, ngomhla we-16 kuMgwengweni wee-2022 ngaphasi kommongondaba othi: “Sikhuthazela Ingomuso Elingcono Lendlela Yokuziphilisa Ebambelelako Nekhambisana Nobujamo Bezinto Elutjheni.” Ummoya wamandla wetjisakalo newokujamelana nobujamo bezinto otjengiswa lilutjha elizweni lekhethu loke umthombo wokuhlalela ethembeni nokuthokozela ingomuso elingcono.
tgt_text: Kabinete amogetše Leano la Magato la Dintlha tše 11 go swaragana le go thibiwa ga ditsela le go goketšwa ga batšwantle bjalo ka baotleladilori.

Leano le, la go hlangwa ke Komiti ya Ditona tša ka Nageng (IMC) yeo Šoganago le Mešomo ya Legoro la Difatanaga tša go Rwala Merwalo le ya Ditsela ka moka le bakgathatema ba intasteri ya merwalo le ya ditsela, magareng ga tše dingwe, le go hlohleletša go phethagatšwa ga dinyakwa tša VISA le go obamela melao ya bašomi..     IMC hlametšwe go kalokana le palo ye nyologelago godimo ya go thibiwa ga ditsela le ya megwanto ka baotleladilori ba MaAfrika Borwa bao ba sa kgotsofalago.

src_text: Njengoba iNyanga YeLutjha seyiya ngekupheleni nje, asiqiniseni imizamo yethu yokuqinisekisa ukuthi abantu abatjha bayawathola amahlelo amanengi avulwe ngurhulumende wabe wakghonakalisa nokuthi baba nelitho abalenzako emnothweni.
tgt_text: Megwanto le go thibiwa ga ditsela ama gampe go sepela ga dinamelwa ka thelelo tšhoša babeeletši ba dinagadišele le gape go ama gampe dilo tše bohlokwahlokwa go swana le ikonomi le magatokamano kabo ya dilo tše bohlokwa tša go šomiša tšona ditsela tšeo di amegilego.
Tlhaelelo ya Meetse Mmasepaleng wa Metsesetoropo wa Boemakepe bja Nelson Mandela (NMB).

src_text: IKoro yemBusweni, njengoba imqatjhi omkhulu kinabo boke nje, isisikimele lesisitjhijilo ngokuvulela iimfundiswa ezineziqu kodwana ezingasebenziko ukuthi zithole ilimuko lokwazi umsebenzi ngehlelo lokuFundisa iimFundiswa ezineziQu umsebenzi emBusweni.
tgt_text: Kabinete amogetše magato go tla ka Kgoro ya Meetse le Tlhwekišo (DWS) Mmasepaleng wa Metsesetoropo wa NMB gola Kapa Bodikela go efoga Letšatši la go Hloka Lerothi la Meetse ka ge profense ye lebagane le tlhaelelo ye šoro ya meetse yeo thomilego ka.

src_text: Urhulumende godu uphumelelisa isiKhwama sokuVulela umPhakathi imiSebenzi (i-SEF) ngehlelo leLutjha eliVuselelwe ngobuTjha (i-NYS) lokuvula imisebenzi, elizakuvulela abantu abatjha amasango wokungena emnothweni; ihlelo ngalinye kilawa lizakuvulela abantu abatjha abama-50 000 amasango wokungena emnothweni.
tgt_text: DWS šoma le profense go phethagatša magato nakwana magareng le nako ye telele go šogašogana le go fediša ditlamorago tše ka bago gona tša komelelo.
Kabinete hlohleleditše gape badudi ba NMB go latela ditaelo tšeo ba di filwego tša go fokoletšwa meetse tšeo ba di filwego ke mebasepala ya fao go netefatša gore meetse ga fele.

src_text: Amagadango lawa-ke angeze agcine ngokunikela ilimuko lokwazi umsebenzi elidingeke khulu, kodwana lizakuqinisa namandla wokuthi abantu abatjha babe zizakhamuzi ezinelizwi eendabeni zelizwe.
tgt_text: Ka kakaretšo, tšhomišo ya meetse swanetše go fokotšwa ka dilithara tše 50 milione ka letšatši, go tloga maemong gona bjale dilithara tše 280 milione ka letšatši go theošetšwa fase go dilithara tše 230 milione ka letšatši.

src_text: I-SEF isebenzisana neenhlangano ezingasizombuso (ama-NGO) bese kuthi i-NYS isebenzise abantu abatjha emisebenzini ebuyisela umphakathi elizweni lokeli.
tgt_text: Bosenyi le bomenetša.
Kabinete amogetše go golegwa malobanyana mo ga mohlankedi wa Kgoro ya Merero ya Selegae wa go šomela kantorong ya Benoni mabapi le go gatiša pasporoto ya bofora go mofaladi wa go tšwa Bangladeshi.

src_text: Zokuthutha  .
tgt_text: Mohlankedi yo, Mme Sibongile Simelane filwe peile ya R5 000 kua Kgorotsheko ya Maseterata ya Benoni ka Labobedi, 21 Phupu.

src_text: IKhabinethi ithokozele iHlelo lomSebenzi lamaPhuzu ali-11 elizakusebenza ngomraro wokuvalwa kweendlela nokuqatjhwa kwabatjhayeli bamathraga abamaphandle.
tgt_text: Motšwantle yo wa Bangladeshi, Morena Fahim Kazi golegilwe le gare leka go tšwa ka mo nageng ka la 12 Mopitlo 2022 šomiša leina la gagwe la bofora la ‘Lebogang Ndlovu’.

src_text: Ihlelweli, elitlanywe yiKomidi eHlanganyelwe miNyango yaboNgqongqotjhe (i-IMC) eqalene nezeeNdlela nokuThutha ngokusebenzisana nababelani bezeendlela nezokuthutha, likhuthaza ukuthotjelwa kwemithetho yeencwadi zokukhamba (ama-visa) ikhuthaze nokuthotjelwa kwemithetho yezemisebenzi nezabasebenzi, hlangana nokhunye.
tgt_text: Kgoro ya Merero ya Selegae (DHA) malobanyana mo bušeditše morago mmapadi wa Lithuania, Mohumagatšana Leva Andrejevaite, yo bego leka go šomiša bošaedi melao ya Afrika Borwa ya taolo ya bafaladi ge ihlamela maaka matala gore be nyaka go dira kgopelo ya asaelamo ka baka la ntwa ye kgatlampanago gola Ukraine.
Kabinete lebogiša mošomo wo dirwago ke Yuniti ya go Lwantšha Bosenyi ya DHA opela diatla le go hlohleletša MaAfrika Borwa go tšwelapele go bega ditiragalo tša mohuta wo tša bosenyi.

src_text: I-IMC yasungulelwa ukulungisa ukuvalwa kweendlela okuthuweleleko nokutjhagala kwabatjhayeli bamathraga beSewula Afrika abanghonghoyilako.
tgt_text: Magato ao sego molaong MaAfrika Borwa ba go rekiša dipasa tša bona nale ditlamorago tše mpe kudu tša go fihla kgole godimo ga tšhireletšo ya naga ye le seemo sa ikonomi maphelong.

src_text: Imitjhagalo nokuvalwa kweendlela kuliya ukukhambeka kweendlela, kwethusa abasisi bangaphandle, kanti ngaphezu kwakho koke, kuthela umnotho namarherho aqakathekileko wokukhambisa ipahla ngamacaphazela amambi, njengoba amarherho lawa asebenzisa leziindlela lapho kukhamba khona amathraga ekubangwa umsebenzi wawo nje.
tgt_text: Mmušo tla tšwelapele go tšea magato go tiišetšwa letsogo kgahlanong le motho mang goba mang yo amegago ditiragalong tše sego molaong tša go nyatša melao ya rena ya bofaladi, ntle le poifo goba sepitša.

Kabinete amogetše gape sephetho sa go phara molato le go ahlolelwa ga morutiši wa Durban Mohumagatšana Nomusa Precious Gabuza (37) – yo ahloletšwego kotlo ya mengwaga ye meraro ya go bewa leihlo ke ba tshokollo ya bagolegwa le go golegwa tekano ya mengwaga ye mene, yeo fegilwego ka botlalo lebaka la mengwaga ye meraro kua Kgorotsheko ya Selete ya Umlazi gola KwaZulu-Natal ka baka la go gataka Pušoselegae: Molao wa Dikgetho tša Mebasepala, 2000 (Molao 27 wa 2000).

src_text: Ukutlhayela Kwamanzi Kumasipaladi Wedorobha i-Nelson Mandela Bay (i-NMB)          .
tgt_text: Bjalo ka morutiši sekolong seo se bego se šomišetšwa bjale ka setiši sa dikgetho nakong ya Dikgetho tša Mebasepala ka Diphalane 2021, Mohumagatšana Gabula ipone molato ka go lahlela ka dipaloto tša bofora tše 24 ka lepokisaneng la dikgetho, go akaretšwa tše 12 tša dipaloto tša Dikgetho tša Mebasepala le tše 12 tša dipaloto tša Dikgetho tša Wate.

src_text: IKhabinethi ithokozela igadango elithethwe mNyango wezaManzi nokuHlwengisa (i-DWS) kuMasipaladi we-NMB ePumalanga Kapa ukuphepha iLanga lokuPhela kweziYela (elaziwa nge-Day Zero) njengoba lesisifunda sitlhayelelwa mamanzi kangaka nje solo kwangomnyaka wee-.
tgt_text: Go pharwa molato ga gagwe le kahlolelo ye e filwego di tloga di laetša boikgafo bja Khomišene ya Dikgetho ya Afrika Borwa bja go tsena gare seemo seo ka bonako le go diriša magato taolo ya ditlamorago.

src_text: I-DWS isebenzisana nesifunda ukuphumelelisa amagadango wesikhatjhana, newesikhathi esilingeneko kunye newesikhathi eside wokuthundubaza ubukhali besomiso kilesisiphande.
tgt_text: Ye ke kgonthišišo ya go tiišetšwa letsogo ya dipeakanyo tša dikgetho, yeo go tloga kgale bego matlafetše nakong ya ge go be go tsebagatšwa Metšhene ya Sebjalebjale ya go Ngwadiša Bakgethi ya go kgona go thibela bakgethi go bouta gabedi.

Kabinete netefaditše gore dikgetho ke motheo wa temokrasi ya gaborena le gore di swanetše go šireletšwa ka fao go ka kgonagalago..     Khonferense ya Ditona ya bo-12 (MC12) ya Setheo sa Dikgwebišano Magareng ga Dinaga tša Lefase (WTO).

src_text: IKhabinethi ibuye yakhwezelela izakhamuzi ze-NMB ukuthi zibabalele amanzi ngokuthobela imibandela yesilinganiso sokusetjenziswa kwamanzi esibekwe ngumasipaladi wendawo.
tgt_text: Kabinete amogetše dipoelo tša WTO MC12 ye bego swaretšwe kua Geneva, Switzerland go thoma ka la 12 go fihla ka la 17 Phupu 2022, kudukudu sephetho sa gore dinaga tše nago le maloka di ka kgona go fekeetša dilaesense tša maswanedi tšhireletšosemolao ya nako ye rileng ya meento ya COVID-19 go fihla ka ngwaga wa.

src_text: Kubekwe isilinganiso esithi ukusetjenziswa kwamanzi kufanele siphungulwe ngama-50 weengidi zamalitha ngelanga, ukusuka ema-280 weengidi zamalitha ngelanga njenganje, ukuyokufika ema-230 weengidi zamalitha ngelanga.
tgt_text: Sephetho sa ge eba go swanetše go oketšwa mekgwa ya go alafa le go phekola COVID-19 se diegišitšwe ka dikgwedi tše tshela.

Afrika Borwa be eteletše pele boipiletšo bja WTO bja go beelathoko maloka botlhami le boikgopolelo ao tlemaganego le meento ya COVID-19 ao tlo netefatšago gore go ba le khumanego ya go lekalekana ya meento le go kgontšha dinaga tša go ba le mabokgoni go itirela meento go dira bjalo.

src_text: Ubulelesi Nobukhohlakali.
tgt_text: Khonferense ye ikgafetše gape go latela tshepedišo ya go se ute selo le ya go akaretša bohle ya go hlama leswa mediro le mehola ya yona ka moka le go dumelelana go tsenela sekgoboko sa dikwanelo tša dikgwebišano tša go swaragana le magoro go etša maphelo, go thea magomo go diphokoletšo tša boreahlapi, kiletšo ya dikgwebišano ka mokgwa wa elektroniki gotee le tšhireletšego ya dijo     Diphetho tša Kabinete.

src_text: IKhabinethi izithokozele iindaba zokubotjhwa kwesiphathimandla somNyango wezaNgekhaya esisebenzela e-ofisini le-Benoni, esibotjhelwe ukwenzela isakhamuzi se-Bangladesh ipaspoti yomgunyathi, mhlapha.
tgt_text: Kgatelopele Lenaneong la go Fetogela Kgašong ya Titšithale (BDM).

src_text: Isiphathimandleso, uMma uSibongile Simelane, uvulelwe ngebheyili yee-R5000 eKhotho kaMarhistrada we-Benoni ngeLesibili womhla wama-21 kuMgwengweni wee-.
tgt_text: Kabinete amogetše tshedimošetšo ka Lenaneo la BDM le go lemoga kgatelopele ye dirilwego ka go lokelwa ga mapokisana dithelebišene bjalo ka karolo ya go fulara kgašo ya dieriele go fetogela kgašong ya titšithale.

src_text: Isakhamuzi se-Bangladesh esenzelwe ipaspoti yomgunyathi, uNom.
tgt_text: Kabinete gateletše gapegape nyakego ya ka pelapela ya go ruma BDM go kgona go bulela tsela maphoto ao nyakegago dikgokagano tša gohle tša motlalanaga, gotee le tshedimošo ye nngwe le theknolotši ya dikgokagano ya go amana le morero wo..     Tona ya Dikgokagano le Theknolotši ya Titšithale Khumbudzo Ntshavheni tla swara kopano ya tshedimošetšo ya babegaditaba gosasa (Labohlano, 24 Phupu) go fana ka tshedimošo ka botlalo.

src_text: Fahim Kazi, ubotjhwe alinga ukubaleka ekhethwapha ngomhla we-12 kuMrhayili wee-2022, ngegama lika-‘Lebogang Ndlovu.’         .
tgt_text: Pego ya Ngwaga ka Ngwaga ka Seemo sa Bosetšhaba sa Ditokelo tša Bana.

src_text: UmNyango wezaNgekhaya (i-DHA), mhlapha usandukududula umlingisi omsikazi we-Lithuania uMma u-Ieva Andrejevaite, wambuyisela ekhabo, nabekalinga ukukhwabanisela ihlelo leSewula Afrika lokubhadwa ngekhwapha kwabantu abaphalalele ekhethwapha, ngokuleya amala nakalinga ukwenza isibawo sokubhaciswa asithi batjho ubaleke “ipi elwa e-Ukraine.”                 .
tgt_text: Kabinete dumeletše go phatlalatšwa ga Pego ya Bobedi ya Ngwaga ka Ngwaga ya Bosetšhaba ya Ditokelo tša Bana.

src_text: IKhabinethi iyawubuka umsebenzi owenziwa liPhiko le-DHA eliLwa nobuKhohlakali.
tgt_text: Pego ye tsebiša ka seemo sa ditaba ka phethagatšo ya Leano la Magato Bosetšhaba la bana go lebeletšwe nako ya magareng ga 2019-. .

src_text: Ithokoza beyikhuthaza amaSewula Afrika ukuthi aragele phambili ngokuhlaba umkhosi ngezenzo zobulelesi ezinjengalezi.
tgt_text: Pego ye laetša diphenyo tšeo di gatišitšwego mengwageng ya magareng ga 2020- laetša gape le magoro ao santše lego tlhotlo, go akaretšwa le polokego ya bana le dithulano tšeo di tšwetšego pele magareng ga bahloki le bahumi go lebeletšwe bana.

src_text: Ukwephula kwamaSewula Afrika umthetho ngokuthengisa abomazisi bawo kunemiphumela emimbi kumbi ekuphepheni nebujameni behlalakuhle yomnotho yelizwe lekhethu.
tgt_text: Pego ye laetša ka fao leuba la COVID-19 le amilego bana ka yona mengwaga ye boletšwego..     Magato go namola seemo ao phethagatšwago ke mmušo nepile go lemoša batho ka moka ka ditokelo tša bana, go ya le ka fao go hlalošitšwego ka gare ga Molaotheo wa Rephabliki ya Afrika Borwa wa.
Magato a thekga gape le ditlamego tša naga ye godimo ga Dikwano tša UN ka Ditokelo tša Bana (UNCRC) le Tumelelano ya Afrika ka Ditokelo le Boiketlo bja Bana (ACRWC).

src_text: Urhulumende uzakusolo abathathela amagadango abukhali nanganasirhawu, ngaphandle kwevalo, abantu abanesandla ezenzweni eziphambana nomthetho ezinyefisa imithetho elawula ukungena kwamaphandle lapha ekhethu.
tgt_text: Afrika Borwa ke ye nngwe ya naga ya go saenela kwano go bobedi UNCRC le ACRWC..     Pego ye hlamilwe ka go rerišana pele le dikgoro tša mmušo le palo ye bonagalago ya bakgathatema ba maleba maemong bosetšhaba le profense.
Pego ye feletšego ka botlalo tla phatlalatšwa websaeteng ya Kgoro ya Tlhabollo ya Leago mo go: www.dsd.gov.za.

src_text: IKhabinethi ikuthokozele nokulahlwa ngecala abe ethweswe nesigwebo utitjhere weThekwini uMma uNomusa Precious Gabuza (oneminyaka ema-37) – ogwetjwe iminyaka emithathu yokusebenzela umphakathi, namine yokudosa ejele, elengiswe iminyaka emithathu eKhotho yesiPhande e-Umlazi KwaZulu-Natala – ngokwephula umThetho wezeKhetho laboRhulumende beeNdawo zemaKhaya womNyaka wee-2000 (umThetho Nomboro 27 wee-2000).
tgt_text: Pego ye Kopantšwego ya Kgafetšakgafetša ya Afrika Borwa ya lekga la boraro go fihla go la boselela yeo hlagišeditšwego UNCRC.

src_text: UGabuza, ongutitjhere wesikolo esasisetjenziswa njengesiteyitjhi sokuvowuda ngeKhetho laboMasipala ngoSewula wee-2021, ulivumile icala lokuvowuda ngomgunyathi amahlandla ama-24 ekhethweneli; amahlandla ali-12 eKhethweni likaMasipala wabuye wavowuda amahlandla ali-12 eKhethwni lamaWadi.
tgt_text: Kabinete dumeletše go hlagišetšwa UNCRC Pego ya Kgafetšakgafetša ya boraro go fihla go ya boselela.

Pego ye latela Pego ya bobedi ya Kgafetšakgafetša yeo hlagišeditšwego UNCRC ka..     Pego ye hlamilwe ka go tsamaišana le Kgatišo 44 ya UNCRC, ebile akaretša mebono le ditšhišinyo tšeo di dirilwego go tšwa pegong ya mafelelo.

src_text: Ukulahlwa kwakhe licala nokwethweswa kwakhe isigwebo kuphakamisa ukuzibophelela kweKomitjhini yezeKhetho eziJameleko yeSewula Afrika ekuthatheni amagadango wamsinyana wokukhalima izephulamthetho.
tgt_text: UNCRC rometše mebono le ditšhišinyo tša yona tša naga ye ka..     Go hlangwa ga pego ye go dirilwe ka go rerišana pele le dikgoro ka moka tšeo di amegago le bakgathatema ka moka go ralala le naga.

src_text: Lokhu godu kubuye kube nanga bufakazi bamandla wamahlelo wezekhetho, esele aqiniswa solo kwathoma ukusetjenziswa kwesiSetjenziswa sokuLawula abaVowudi (i-Voter Management Device) esikhandela ukuvowuda kabili namkha ngokubuyelela kanengi.
tgt_text: Pego ye feletšego ka botlalo tla dirwa phatlalatša ge šetše hlagišeditšwe UNCRC.
Pego ya Bosetšhaba phethagatšong ya Lenaneothero le Leswa la Metsesetoropo.

src_text: IKhabinethi iyavuma ukuthi amakhetho ayisika yehlelo lethu lentando yenengi, begodu kufuze avikelwe ngazo zoke iindlela.
tgt_text: Kabinete dumeletše go hlagišwa ga pego ya bosetšhaba ya mathomo ya Afrika Borwa ka phethagatšo ya Lenaneothero le Leswa la Metsesetoropo go Lenaneo la UN la Madulo Batho (UN-Habitat).
UN-Habitat amogetše Lenaneothero la yona le Leswa la Metsesetoropo kua Khonfereseng ya yona ka Dintlo le Tlhabollo ye Swarelelago ya Metsesetoropo ka Diphalane.

src_text: IKhonfrensi YaboNgqongqotjhe Yehlandla le-12 (MC12) YeHlangano YezeRhwebo YePhasi (i-WTO) .
tgt_text: Mebušo ye lego maloko lenaneo le go be bo letetšwe gore romele dipego ka boithaopo tša gore mošomo tlela kae.

src_text: IKhabinethi iwuthokozele umphumela we-WTO MC12 ebeyibanjelwe e-Geneva, e-Switzerland, ukusukela ngomhla we-12 ukuyokufika kumhla we-17 kuMgwengweni wee-2022, ithokozele khulukhulu isiqunto sokuthi amazwe afaneleko angawacitha amalungelo wobunikazimjovo bemijovo ye-COVID-19 bekube mnyaka wee-.
tgt_text: Afrika Borwa thekgile go amogelwa ga Lenaneothero le Leswa la Metsesetoropo le go le phethagatša ka morago ga gore le amogelwe ka go šomiša Tlhako ya naga ye ya Mohlakanelwa ya Tlhabollo ya Metsesetoropo (IUDF).

src_text: Siriyadiswe ngeenyanga ezintandathu isiqunto sokuthi lokhu kungadluliselwa na nemahlelweni wokulawula nokuthola ukuthi umuntu uphethwe yi-COVID-19, nemitjhogeni yokwelapha i-COVID-.
tgt_text: Nepo ya IUDF ke go hlahla go hlabollwa ga madulo metsesetoropo go akaretša batho ka moka go tielela le go phelega..     Pego ye ya kgatelopele ya mošomo hlamilwe ka go rerišana pele le didiko tša mmušo tša bosetšhaba, tša profense le tša selegae gotee le di-NGO tše maleba.
Leanopeakanyo la Mohlakanelwa la Tlhabollo ya Baswa (IYDS).

src_text: ISewula Afrika soke isikhathesi beyidosa phambili esibaweni sokuthi i-WTO ayisuse amalungelo wobunikazingqondo akhambisana nemijovo ye-COVID-19 okuzakwenza ukuthi boke abantu bakghone ukuthola umjovo ngokufanako nangokulinganako, kube kwenze nokuthi amazwe akghona ukukhiqiza imijovo enze njalo.
tgt_text: Kabinete dumeletše go phethagatšwa ga IYDS.
Leanopeakanyo le le kgontšha Pholisi ya Bosetšhaba ya Baswa ya 2020 go fihla ka.

src_text: Ikhonfrensi le ibuye yazibophelela nehlelweni elivulekileko neliqalelela umuntu woke lokuhlela ngobutjha yoke imisebenzi yayo, yabe yavumela nebuthelelo leemvumelwano zokurhwebelana emakorweni anjengezepilo, nekubekweni kweenlinganiso eemalini eziphungula iindleko ekuthiyweni kweenhlambi, ukujanyiswa kwesikhatjhana kokurhweba ngethungelelwano le-inthanethi kunye nelokutholakala kokudla   Iinqunto ZeKhabinethi   .
tgt_text: Yona hlatholla magato, diprotšeke le mananeo ao tlo dirwago ke bakgathatema ba go fapafapana go tšwa dihlophaneng tša baswa swaragana gape le ka go fokotša go ipušeletša gantši ga magato mmušo le go fa tlhahlo ya ka fao mekgatlo ye lego setšhabeng le lefapha la praebete ka thekgago baswa gore ba ka ikhweletša bjang menyetla ya mešomo.

src_text: Indima Ngokudlulela Ehlelweni Lokurhatjha Budijithali (i-BDM) .
tgt_text: Ge go be go hlangwa leanopeakanyo le, mafapha go fapafapana setšhaba amegile go lona go fa dikgopolo le go ntšha sa bona sa mafahleng.

src_text: IKhabinethi ithole umbiko ngendima esele yenziwe ngeHlelo le-BDM, yayibona indima esele yenziwe ngokufakelwa kwama-Set-Top Box njengengcenye yokufuduka ehlelweni lokurhatjha nge-analogu kuyiwe ehlelweni lokurhatjha budijithali.
tgt_text: Sengwalwa sa Makgoraditsela ka Pabalelo le Tšhomišano ye Swarelelago ya Diphedi tša go Fapafapana tša Afrika Borwa.
Kabinete dumeletše seakanywa sa Mokgoraditsela ka Pabalelo le Tšhomišo ye Swarelelago ya Diphedi tša go Fapafapana tša Afrika Borwa gore setšhaba se fe ditshwayotshwayo tša sona.

src_text: IKhabinethi ibuyelele yagandelela ukurhabeka kokuqedelelwa kwe-BDM kobanyana kuzokuvuleka ikundla yokurhatjha efunekako ebanzi, ekhambisekako nekhambisa amaza wokurhatjha ngebelo elikhulu, kunye nethekhnoloji yelwazi nezokuthintana.
tgt_text: Diphedi tša go fapafapana tša Afrika Borwa di fana ka motheo wo bohlokwa wa go kgontšha kgolo ya ikonomi le tlhabollo, ebile wona motheo wo tloga le bohlokwa kudu go lebeletšwe mekgwa yeo batho ba iphedišago ka yona..     Sengwalwa se sa makgoraditsela ke sona se kgontšhago ditšhišinyo tšeo di dirilwego ke Sehlopha sa Maemo Godimodimo sa Ditsebi tšeo di thwetšwego ka 2019 go fetleka dipholisi tša rena tša bjale, melao le ditlwaedi ka merero ya go amana kudu le diphedi tše tša mohuta wa moswananoši..     Pego ye šišintše gore go hlangwe pholisi ye akaretšago tšohle ka pabalelo le tšhomišo ye swareleago ya diphedi tša go fapafapana tša naga ye.
Pholisi ye tla phethagatšwa go ralala didiko ka moka tša mmušo.

src_text: UNgqongqotjhe wezokuThintana nezeTheknoloji yeDijithali u-Khumbudzo Ntshavheni uzokubamba umhlangano weendaba kusasa (ngeLesihlanu, 24 kuMgwengweni) lapho azakunaba khona ngemininingwana.
tgt_text: Pabalelo tloga le bohlokwa lesolong la naga ye la go akgofiša kgolo ya ikonomi le tlhomo ya mešomo.
Leanopeakanyo la Nama ya Diphoofolo tša Lešoka.

src_text: Umbiko WaQobemnyaka NgobuJamo BamaLungelo WabaNtwana EliZweniloke.
tgt_text: Kabinete dumeletše go phatlalatšwa ga seakanywa sa Leanopeakanyo la Nama ya Diphoofolo tša Lešoka gore setšhaba se fe ditshwayotshwayo tša sona.

src_text: IKhabinethi ivumele ukumenyezelwa komBiko waQobemnyaka wobuJamo bamaLungelo wabaNtwana ongowehlandla lesibili.
tgt_text: Leanopeakanyo le le šeditše go botsefatša le go fetoša gabotse intasteri ya nama ya diphoofolo tša lešoka.

src_text: Umbiko lo uphethe zamva nje ngokuphunyeleliswa kweHlelo lemiSebenzi eyenzelwa abaNtwana esikhathini see-2019-.
tgt_text: Le šetšane gape le go kgatha tema tšhireletšegong ya dijo ka mokgwa wo swarelelago.
Intasteri ya nama ya diphoofolo tša lešoka ka boati ke intasteri ya go se lefišwe metšhelo ya go šoma thokwana le noši.

src_text: Umbiko lo uphakamisa ipumelelo eyenzeke ngesikhathi see-2020-.
tgt_text: Leanopeakanyo le le šišintšwego le fana ka leano la phethagatšo leo le tla botsefatšago le go matlafatša intasteri ye bjalo ka bobedi moabi wa tšhireletšego ya dijo le lefapha la kgolo ya ikonomi leo le tla thušago go hloma menyetla ya mešomo     Melaokakanywa.

src_text: Ubuya godu uveza neendawo ezisafuna itjhejo, ekubalwa hlangana nazo nokuphepha kwabantwana kunye nokutjhiyana ngendima okusolo kuthuwelele kuya phambili hlangana kwabanothileko nabanganalitho.
tgt_text: Molaokakanywaphetošwa ka Kakaretšo wa 2022 wa Merero ya Setšo.

src_text: Umbiko lo godu uveza nokuthi isifo esikhe sarhagala kokapha, i-COVID-19, sibacaphazele njani abantwana ngalesisikhathi.
tgt_text: Kabinete dumeletše go hlagišwa Palamenteng ga Molaokakanywaphetošwa wa 2022 wa Merero ya Setšo gore Palamente go sekaseke goya pele.
Diphetošo tše di šetšane le go fetleka Molao wa Setšo le wa Boetapele bja maKhoi-San, 2019 (Molao 3 wa 2019), wo tsentšwego tirišong ka la 1 Moranang.

src_text: Amagadango athathwa ngurhulumende anqophe ukuphumelelisa amalungelo wabantwana, njengoba kusitjho umThethosisekelo weRiphabhligi yeSewula Afrika we-.
tgt_text: Molaokakanywaphethošwa wa 2022 wa Tšhireletšo ya Temokrasi ya Molaotheo Kgahlanong le Ditiragalo tša Matšhošetši le tše dingwe tša go amana le tšona.

src_text: Asekela neembopho zelizwe lekhethu eemVumelwaneni ze-UN ngamaLungelo wabaNtwana (i-UNCRC) nomTlolo we-Afrika ngamaLungelo neHlalakuhle yomNtwana (i-ACRWC).
tgt_text: Kabinete dumeletše go hlagišwa Palamenteng ga Molaokakanywaphetošwa wa 2022 ka Tšhireletšo ya Temokrasi ya Molaotheo Kgahlanong le Matšhošetši le tše dingwe tša go amana le ona gore Palamente go sekaseke goyapele.

src_text: ISewula Afrika yayitlikitlela yomibili imitlolo yeemvumelwano i-UNCRC ne-ACRWC.
tgt_text: Ge šetše amogetšwe, Molaokakanywa wo tla fetoša Molao wa bjale wa Tšhireletšo ya Temokrasi ya Molaotheo Kgahlanong le Matšhošetši le Ditiragalo tša go Amana le ona, 2004 (Molao 33 wa 2004).
Molaokakanywa wo fetile pele ditherišanong tšeo di tseneletšego tša setšhaba morago ga gore dumelelwe ke Kabinete ka Mopitlo.

src_text: Umbiko lo uhlanganiswe ngokubonisana neminyango karhulumende nabanye ababelani abafaneleko abambadlwana belizweloke neemfundeni ngeemfunda.
tgt_text: Diphetošo tše di šetšane le go bea madulong didirišwa tšeo di tšweleditšwego ka nageng ye tša go lwantšha matšhošetši gotee le magato lefaseng ka bophara ao hlomilwego.

src_text: Umbiko opheleleko uzakumenyezelwa kubunzinzolwazi bomNyango wezokuThuthukiswa komPhakathi, ku-www.dsd.gov.za.
tgt_text: Diphetošo tše di šogašogane gape le ditemana tšeo go tšeerwego sephetho ke Kgorotsheko ya Molaotheo sa gore ga di gate ka mošito tee le Molaotheo.

Bjalo ka ye nngwe ya naga ye lego leloko la Khansele ya UN ya Tšhireletšego, Afrika Borwa tlamegile goya ka mohola wa yona go batametša kgauswi melao ya boditšhabatšhaba yeo šetšanego le go maatlafatša magato le go lwantšha matšhošetši lefaseng ka bophara     Ditiragalo tše di Tlago.

src_text: Umbiko WeSewula Afrika Ohlanganisiweko Wesithathu Ukuyokufika Kowesithandathu  Onande Uthunyelwa I-UNCRC              .
tgt_text: Samiti ya bo-14 ya Brazil, Russia, India, China le Afrika Borwa (BRICS).

src_text: IKhabinethi ivumele ukwethulwa komBiko wesithathu ukuyokufika kowesithandathu onande wethulelwa i-UNCRC.
tgt_text: Mopresidente Ramaphosa tla eta pele go kgatha tema ga Afrika Borwa Samiting ya bo-14 ya go swarwa ka dikgokagano tša bidio ya Baetapele ba BRICS yeo swerwego ke Rephabliki ya Bohle ya China go thoma ka Labone, 23 go fihla ka Labohlano, 24 Phupu.

src_text: Lombiko ulandela wesibili umBiko oNande uthunyelwa i-UNCRC, owagcina ukwethulwa ngomnyaka wee-.

tgt_text: Maloko rena BRICS ba tšwelapele go hola naga ye.

src_text: Umbiko lo uhlanganiswe ngokweNdinyana 44 ye-UNCRC, begodu umumethe nokwatjhejwako nokwaphakanyiswako embikweni wokugcina.
tgt_text: Ngwageng wa go feta, diromelwantle tša go feta 17% tša Afrika Borwa di be di nepišitšwe dinageng tše dingwe tša BRICS, le gona palomoka ya go feta 29% ya ditšwantle tša rena di be di tšwa go tšona dinaga tše.

src_text: I-UNCRC ithumele ekutjhejileko nekuphakamisileko ngelizwe leSewula Afrika ngomnyaka wee-.
tgt_text: Boleng bja theko ya kgwebišano ye bo tšwelapele go golela godimo, ka palomoka ya dikgwebišano tša Afrika Borwa le dinaga tše dingwe tša BRICS batamela R702 bilione ka 2021, morago ga gore golele godimo go tloga go R487 bilione ka.

src_text: Umbiko lo uhlanganiswe ngokubonisana nayo yoke iminyango nababelani abafaneleko elizweni lokeli.
tgt_text: Tšhomišanommogo gare ga dinaga tše lego maloko BRICS magorong go fapafapana go swana le maphelo le dikgwebišanong tše kaonafetšego godišitše intasteri ya ka mo nageng, le go hola dinaga ka moka tše lego maloko BRICS.

src_text: Umbiko lo uzakumenyezelwa ungethulwa ku-UNCRC.
tgt_text: Dipeeletšo tša rena diprotšekeng tša tlhabollo ya mananeokgoparara le matsapa go fokotša go raragana ga magatotshepedišo mmušo ge go dirwa kgwebo di nepile go oketša diromelwantle go bagwebišani ba rena ba BRICS.
Sekolo sa Marega sa Tshepedišo ya Ikonomi Mmušong.

src_text: Umbiko Welizwe Ngokuphunyeleliswa Kwe-Ajenda Etja Yemadrobheni   .
tgt_text: Sekolotlhahlo sa Bosetšhaba sa Mmušo (NSG) se tla be se swere Lenaneo la sona la Boraro la Balaodiphethiši ba tša Dipolotiki gola Johannesburg go thoma ka la 27 Phupu go fihla ka la 1 Mosegamanye.

src_text: IKhabinethi ivumele ukudluliselwa eHlelweni le-UN lokuHlaliswa kwabaNtu (i-UN-Habitat) kombiko wokuthoma weSewula Afrika ngokuphunyeleliswa kwe-Ajenda eTja yemaDrobheni.
tgt_text: Thuto ye go yona go tla tla Ditona go tšwa Côte d'Ivoire; Borwa bja Sudan le Afrika Borwa gotee le Balaodipharephare ba go tšwa Lesotho, Zambia, DRC, Tanzania le Ghana.

src_text: I-UN Habitat yavumelana ngokusebenzisa i-Ajenda eTja yemaDrobheni eKhonfrensini yokwAkhiwa kweziNdlu nokuThuthukiswa kweeNdawo ezimaDrobha okubambelelako ngoSewula wee-.
tgt_text: Dimeyara tša Afrika Borwa, gotee le maloko dikomiti tša meyara le makgotlaphethiši le bona ba tla ba gona..     Go letetšwe gore baetapelephethiši ba sepolotiki go tšwa dinageng tša go fapafapana ba ngwathelane dikgopolo le tšeo ba ithutilego go tšwa go tšona maemong go fapafapana ditiragalo ao ba itemogetšego ona mešomong ya bona ya tšatši ka tšatši.

src_text: Kwavunyelanwa ngokuthi amazwe amalunga azakuthumela imibiko yayo yendima ngokuzithandela.
tgt_text: NSG hlamile lenaneo la ngwaga ka ngwaga go maloko lekgotlakhuduthamaga ka 2020, bjalo ka karolo ya thekgo ya lona ya boikgafo bja mmušo bja go hlola mmušo wo kgonago.

Lenaneo le, magareng ga tše dingwe, le šetšane le go tlabela lekgotlakhuduthamaga ka tsebo mo didikong tše tharo tša mmušo ka boetapele bjo bjo kaonafetšego le mabokgoni go bea leihlo mošomo wo dirilwego gore go kgonagale go lekolaleswa ditlhotlo tša pušo tšeo di šitišago go akaretšwa ga bohle le kgolo yeo swarelelago ya ikonomi.

src_text: ISewula Afrika yakusekela ukwamukelwa kwe-Ajenda eTja yemaDrobheni, yalandelisa ngokuyiphumelelisa ngomTlamo oLungelelweko wokuThuthukiswa kweeNdawo zemaDrobheni (i-IUDF).
tgt_text: Letšatši la Boditšhabatšhaba la Nelson Mandela.

src_text: I-IUDF inqophe ukwakha nokuthuthukisa iindawo zemadrobheni eziqalelela umuntu woke, ezibambelelako nezihlalekako.
tgt_text: Letšatši la Boditšhabatšhaba la Nelson Mandela la lenyaga ka Mošupologo, 18 Mosegamanye le tla ketekelwa ka fase ga morero wa lefase ka bophara wo latelago: “Dira se se kgonago, ka seo nago le sona, kae goba kae mo lego gona”.
Bjo ke boipiletšo bjo bo kwalakwaditšwego gore batho ba thekge le go kgatha tema lesolong le ka go logišana maano magato ao swarelelago nako ye telele go ba le ditlamorago tša go tšea telele.

src_text: Umbiko wendima lo uhlanganiswe ngokubonisana norhulumende welizwe loke, naborhulumende beemfunda kunye nabeendawo, nama-NGO afaneleko.
tgt_text: Ye nngwe ya magato mohuta wo ke Dipoledišano tša Baswa tša Nelson Mandela le Lenaneo la Boetapele bja Potego leo le lebeletšego kudu merero ye diragalago gona bjale ya go ama baswa ka mo Afrika Borwa le go potologa lefase ka bophara.
Sehla sa Metšhelo.

src_text: IHlelo EliLungelelweko LokuThuthukisa ILutjha (i-IYDS)  .
tgt_text: Sehla sa go faela metšhelo ya 2022 se tla bulwa go thoma ka la 1 Mosegamanye go fihla ka la 24 Diphalane.

src_text: IKhabinethi ivumele ukuphunyeleliswa kwe-IYDS.
tgt_text: Balefametšhelo ba hlohleletšwa go faela bohlatse bja bona bja tefo ya metšhelo mo go eFiling (www.sarsefiling.co.za) goba mo go MobiApp, elego sedirišwa sa Ditirelo tša Metšhelo tša Afrika Borwa (SARS)..     Ngwaga wo SARS tla tšwelapele ka go sekaseka balefametšhelo ka tee ka tee ka mokgwa wa go itiriša ka noši lego mokgwa wa go lefiša metšhelo ya letseno wo tlabetšwego pele ga nako go thuša go nolofatša tshepedišo ye ya go romela bohlatse bja tefo ya metšhelo.

src_text: IHlelweli lisekela beliqinisa umThethokambiso weLutjha wee-2020-.
tgt_text: Ka 2021 balefametšhelo ba go feta dimilione tše tharo ba sekasekilwe ka ona mokgwa wo wa go itiriša ka noši.

src_text: Lendlala amagadango, amaphrojekthi namahlelo ekufanele enziwe babelani abahlukahlukileko bemibuthano yelutjha.
tgt_text: Thomelo ya bonako le ye nepagetšego ya bohlatse bja metšhelo ga netefatše fela gore balefametšhelo ba dula ba latela molao eupša thuša mmušo go abela MaAfrika Borwa ditirelo tšeo ba di hlokago kudu     Melaetša.

DitebogišoKabinete lebišitše ditebogišo tša yona le go lakaletša bao ba latelago mahlogonolo: Moahlodi Owen Lloyd Rogers morago ga gore thwalwe malobanyana mo bjalo ka Moahlodi wa Kgorotsheko ya Molaotheo ya Afrika Borwa.Kabinete bile le Mopresidente Ramaphosa go lakaletša Mopresidente wa peleng Thabo Mbeki Letšatši le Lethabo la Matswalo Mengwaga ye 80 leo le ketekilego ka la 18 Phupu.

src_text: Liqalene godu nanokuphungula ukuzibuyelela kwamagadango wokusiza athathwa ngurhulumende, belikhanyise nendlela yokuthi umphakathi nekoro yangeqadi ungabasekela njani abantu abatjha ukuthi bathole amathuba.
tgt_text: Morena Mbeki ke wo mongwe wa go bonelapele bokamoso bjo bjo gadimago bja šebešebe bja MaAfrika Borwa ka moka     Bao ba Thwetšwego MešomongBatho ka moka bao ba thwetšwego mešomong mangwalo bona thuto tlo tiišetšwa le go netefatšwa ka tsela ye maleba.

src_text: Ihlelweli lihlanganiswe ngemibono ehlukahlukileko yamakoro ngamakoro womphakathi.
tgt_text: Balaodi bao sego ba Lekgotlaphethiši ba Lekgotlataolo la Afrika Borwa la Diphofo     Ntate Ernest Khosa     Mme Bulelwa Koyana     Ntate Surendra Sooklal; led.
Mme Rejoice Edith Phewa.

src_text: Umtlamo Wombikomthethokambiso Wokulondwa Nokusetjenziswa Okubambelelako  Kokuphilako  ESewula Afrika.
tgt_text: Maloko Kantoro ya Kutullo ya Dikadimo tša Magae le Kutullo ya Dipeelo     Mme Kenosi Pearl Louisa Selane (Modulasetulo)     Mme Catharina Maria Van der Sandt     Ntate Errol Vincent Magerman     Moadbokheiti Mandla Dludlu     Morena Matsobane Gabriel Mello     Mme Palesa Mawasha     Mme Penelope Anne Beck-Paxton     Mme Sphiwe Dorris Mayinga     Mme Tshifhiwa Victor Mphigalale; lej.

src_text: Zamvanje Ngesifo Sengogwana I-corona (i-COVID-19)   .
tgt_text: Tsebišo ka Seemo sa Bolwetši bja Coronavirus (COVID-19).

src_text: IKhabinethi ibuke boke abantu eSewula Afrika abakhethe ukuhlaba nokuthobela yoke imilayelo ye-COVID-19, okubangele ukuthi ilizwe lekhethu libalekele ukukhutjhukelwa linani labantu abangenwa sisifesi nasehla kwehlandla lesihlanu.
tgt_text: Kabinete lebogišitše batho ka moka mo Afrika Borwa ge ba tšeere sephetho sa go hlaba meento le go latela ditshepedišo ka moka tša COVID-19  tšeo pheletšo ya tšona kgontšhitšego naga ye go efoga palo ye hlatlogelago godimo ya diphetelo tše diswa ka nako ya leuba la bohlano la bolwetši bjo..
Le ge go le bjalo, ga se ra swanela go iketla kudu ka ge COVID-19 santše sale gona.

src_text: Nanyana kunjalo, kodwana nokho akukafaneli sizigedle ngoba i-COVID-19 isesekhona.
tgt_text: Le ge le gore malobanyana mo naga fedišitše dinyakwa tša kgapeletšo tša go apara dimaseke mafelong bohle, batho ba go ba le malwetši mangwe le bao ba sa ntšego ba lwala ba hlohleletšwa go tšwelapele go apara dimaseke.

src_text: Nanyana ilizwe lekhethu mhlapha libulele umlayelo okatelela abantu ukuthi bembathe imaski nabahlangana nabantu, kodwana abantu abanezinye izifo abaphila nazo nalabo abagulako bakhuthazwa ukuthi bahlale bawembethe amamaski nabahlangana nabantu.
tgt_text: Re swanetše go tšwelapele go hlapa matsogo rena goba go sanithaesa, le gape go šielana sekgala le go netefatša gore go hlabela moya ka tsela ye maleba..  Meento santše le mokgwa wa go itšhireletša malwetšing wo hlatsetšwego ka sesaentshe kgahlanong le COVID-19 ebile Kabinete hlohleletša batho ka moka bao ba sa kago ba hlaba meento go ya go hlaba meento ya bona ya go tsošeletša mafelong kgauswi le bona go hlaba meento ntle le tefo..  Mabora dikgabo.

src_text: Ukudlula lapho, kusamele bona sisolo sihlala ngokunande sihlamba izandla namkha sizihlikihle ngesihlanzekisi, sihlale siqalangene, besihlale siseendaweni ezibetha ummoya ngokwaneleko.
tgt_text: Kabinete sedimošitšwe ka seemo sa moragorago seo se gatetšego pele mabapi le go phatlalala ga Mabora Dikgabo ka mo nageng morago ga kgonthišišo ye lokolotšwego ya moragorago ya gore go na le motho wa bobedi yo nago le bolwetši bjo ka mo nageng.
Batho bao ba fetetšwego ba ipeetše thoko ka magaeng bona ebile lesolo la go lota mehlala ya batho bao ba ka bego ba kgokagane le bona le gare le kgatlampana go ba humana.

src_text: Ukuhlaba solo kuyindlela yesayensi ehle khulu yokuzivikela esifeni se-COVID-19, ngalokho-ke neKhabinethi nayo ikhuthaza boke abantu abangakahlabi ukuthi bahlabe khona nje, bangasariyada ukuya phambili, ikhuthaza nabantu abahlabileko ukuthi bayokuhlaba umjovo wokuqinisa amasotja womzimba eendaweni zokuhlaba eziseduze nabo, simahla.

tgt_text: Kgoro ya Maphelo le Setheo sa Bosetšhaba sa Malwetši ao Fetelanago se šomišana mmogo le Mokgatlo wa Lefase wa tša Maphelo go lekola kotsi ya diphetelo tša ka mo nageng ka go sepedišana le Melao ya Boditšhabatšhaba ya Maphelo..   Baerase ye ya Mabora Dikgabo ga phatlalale bonolo ebile phetelo ya gona gantši diragala morago ga go kgomana go swana le go atlana, go kgwathakgwathana goba go swaraswara ditho tša mmele tša go ba le dišo tša motho wa go swarwa ke mabora dikgabo.

src_text: Ipokisi Yeemfene.
tgt_text: Batho bao ba se nago dika tša mabora dikgabo ga go kgonagale gore ba fetetše ba bangwe ka baerase ye..  Kabinete eleditše batho bao ba itemogelago dika tša letadi, dika tša go tlwaelega tša go swana le tša mokhohlane, le menyabidi ya mmala wo mohubitšwana go bega ditiragalo tše dikliniking tša maphelo tša kgauswi le bona gore bolwetši bjo bo humanwe ka bonako le go phekolwa..  Masetlapelo Thabeneng ya East London.

src_text: IKhabinethi ibikelwe ngezamvanje zokurhatjheka kwesifo sePokisi yeemFene elizweni lekhethweli, ngemva kobana sekuqinisekiswe ukuthi sebabili abantu ababanjwe yipokisi yeemfene ekhethwapha.
tgt_text: Masetlapelo go tšhabiša namana tša mmele kua Thabeneng ya Enyobeni gola East London Profenseng ya Kapa Bohlabela ka la 26 Phupu 2022 ao tšeerego maphelo batšwamahlalaging ba 21 tšhošitše kudu batho ka moka ka nageng.

src_text: Lababantu esele kuqinisekiswe ukuthi babanjwe yipokisi yeemfene bakhethelwe ngahlanye emakhaya lapho bahlala khona, kanti-ke sekuthonyiwe ukulandelela abantu ekungenzeka ukuthi bakhe baba seduze nalaba abangenwe sisifesi, kobanyana bazokuhlolwa ukuthi abakatheleleki na.
tgt_text: Go tloga go le boima kudu go gopola ka tlalelo ya malapa bao ba lobilego bana ba bona ka mokgwa wo wo sehlogo..  Kabinete lebišitše melaetša ya yona ya mahloko go malapa ao lobilego bao ba phelago le bona le go leboga motho mang le mang ka thekgo ya bona ya moya wa botho go malapa ao llelago metswalle ya bona mo nakong ye ye boima..  Go hlobaetša gore bana ba bannyane ba mengwaga ya go lekana 13 ba ile ba dumelelwa go tsena lefelong leo le go gamola madila.

Re dira boipiletšo bathong ka moka setšhabeng go kgatha tema ya bona go dira gore bana ba dule ba bolokegile ka dinako tšohle..  Bana ba mengwaga ya ka fase ga ye 18 ga ba dumelelwe go tsena ka dipareng, ka dithebeneng, le ka mabenkeleng go rekiša madila.

src_text: UmNyango wezePilo neZiko leziFo eziThelelanako (i-NICD) usebenzisana neHlangano yezePilo yePhasi ukuhlola ubungozi bokuthelelana ngesifesi ekhethwapha, ngokukhambisana nemiThetjhwanalawulo yezePilo yamaZwengamazwe.
tgt_text: Bagwebi ba madila bao go ka humanwago ba gataka ye mengwe ya melao ye ba swanetše go pharwa ka bosenyi le go tšeelwa dilaesense tša bona tša go rekiša madila..  Dipoelo go tšwa Samiting ya Baetapele ba Seboka sa Dinaga tše Šupa (G7).
Mopresidente Cyril Ramaphosa kgathile tema Samiting ya Baetapele ba Seboka sa Dinaga tše Šupa (G7) yeo bego swaretšwe kua Bavaria, Germany ka Mošupologo, 27 Phupu.

src_text: Ingogwana yepokisi yeemfene ayirhatjheki lula, begodu ivamise ukudlulela komunye umuntu ngemva kokutjhidelana nomunye umuntu, njengalokhuya abantu nabamanganako, nabanganako/nabagonanako nofana nabathinta izitho zomzimba ezineenlonda namkha ezinamanceba wepokisi yeemfene.
tgt_text: Mopresidente – yo kgathilego tema dikopanong tša mošomo fao go tšona go ahlaahlilwego merero ya klaemete, mohlagase, maphelo le tšhireletšego ya dijo lefaseng ka bophara – be memilwe ke moswarakopano ye, Mokhanseliri Olaf Scholz..  G7 ke foramo ya sepolotiki ya magareng ga didiko tša mmušo ya go hlangwa ke Canada, France, Germany, Italy, Japan, United Kingdom le Amerika  Diphetho tša Kabinete.

src_text: Abantu abanganamatshayo wepokisi yeemfene angeze badlulisela ingogwana yesifesi kabanye abantu.
tgt_text: Seakanywa sa Melao ya Lefapha la Semolao (Seakanywa sa LSC).
Kabinete dumeletšwe go phatlalatšwa ga Seakanywa sa LSC gore setšhaba se fe ditshwayotshwayo tša sona.

src_text: IKhabinethi ilemukise abantu abanamatshayo wefiva, womgomani ojayelekileko, nabanamathuthuva anamanzi ukuthi baye emaziko wezepilo aseduze nabo kobanyana bayokuthola isizo lokuhlolwa nokwelatjhwa kusese nesikhathi.
tgt_text: Dinepo tša melao ye ke go kgontšha diphetogo ka lefapheng la semolao go fihlelela tekatekano ya batho goya le ka dipalopalo tša ka mo nageng.
Melao ye tla netefatša gape le gore go ba le setheo seo se tla tšweletšago baabaditirelo bao ba hlahlilwego gabotse le ba bokgoni ditirelong tša semolao.

src_text: Ibangamatlhuwo Eyehle Ethaveni YeMonti.
tgt_text: Go hlangwa ga Seakanywa se sa LSC go lekotšwe ke Khansele ya Phethagatšo ya Semolao bago setheo sa mmušo seo se hlamilwego goya ka Karolo 4 ya Molao wa Phethagatšo ya Semolao, 2014 (Molao 28 wa 2014) le go hlahlwa ke Molao wa Matlafatšo ya Ikonomi ya Bathobaso yeo Nabilego (B-BBEE), 2013 (Molao 46 wa 2013).

src_text: Ibangamatlhuwo eyenzeke Enyobeni Tavern eseMonti ePumalanga Kapa ngoSondo nakama-26 kuMgwengweni wee-2022 kwabhubhela kiyo abantu abatjha abama-21, ilethuse loke ilizwe lekhethu.
tgt_text: Molao wa B-BBEE wa 2013 bolela ka gore Tona ya Dikgwebišano, Diintasteri le Diphenkgišano tla lokolla ditlhathollo tša phethagatšo ye maleba matlafatšong ya ikonomi ya bathobaso mo mafapheng go ikgetha.

src_text: Kubudisi ukulinga ukucabanga isizi abakilo bemakhabo labantwana ababhubhe ngesihluku esingaka.
tgt_text: Maloko profešene ya semolao ka motsotso wo ga ba na melao ya lefapha le ya go ba hlahla go kalokana le go fetafetana le go se lekalekane profešeneng ya semolao.

Seakanywa sa LSC se tlo phatlalatšwa ka gare ga Kuranta ya Mmušo mo matšatšing 60 go dumelela setšhaba go fa ditshwayotshwayo tša sona..  Dipego tša Kgatelopele ya Mošomo tša go Lokollwa Gabedi mo Ngwageng.

src_text: IKhabinethi ibalilele imbiko bemakhabo labantwana abasitjhiyileko, yathokoza woke umuntu ngesekelo lakhe lobuntu ngokusekela imindeni ehluphekileko ngalesisikhathi sobudisi.
tgt_text: Kabinete dumeletše dipego tša kgatelopele ya mošomo tša go lokollwa gabedi mo ngwageng tša go thoma ka Diphalane 2021 go fihla ka Hlakola.
Dipego tše di bopa karolo ya Tlhako ye Logetšwego Maano ya Paka ya Magareng (MTSF) ya 2019-.

src_text: Kuzwisa ubuhlungu obukhulu ukuthi abantwana abancani beminyaka eli-13 kwaphela bavunyelwe ukungena endaweni yokusela bayokusela utjwala.
tgt_text: MTSF ya 2019-2024 ke leano la phethagatšo le tlhako ya go lekola mošomo ya go fihlelela Leanotlhabollo la Bosetšhaba: dinyakwa tše beilwego pele tša Ponelopele ya 2030 go basepediši ba lekga la boselela la mmušo.

src_text: Sikhombela woke umphakathi ukuthi ulime indimawo ngokugcina abantwabethu baphephile soke isikhathi.
tgt_text: Dipego tše di be di šetšane le ditlapele tše šupa tša mmušo lego (1) Diphetogo tša ikonomi le tlhomo ya mešomo; (2) Thuto, mabokgoni le tša maphelo; (3) Go kopantšha mmogo meputso ya leago ka ditirelo tša go botega le tše hlwahlwa tša motheo; (4) Go momaganywa ga mafelo, madulo batho le pušoselegae; (5) Phedišano setšhabeng le setšhaba sa go bolokega; (6) Mmušo wa bokgoni, wa potego le wo gatelago pele; le (7) Afrika le lefase le kaonafetšego, le magato go amana le go rarolla seemo basepediši ba mmušo ba lekga la boselela..  Kabinete amogetše magoro mošomo wo gatetšego pele godimo ga dinepo tšeo di theilwego tša paka ye re lego ka gare ga yona.
Kabinete lemogile gape le magoro ao nyakago magato gore go tle go fedišwe go nanya ga seemo seo se amilwego gampe ke leuba la COVID-.

src_text: Abantwana abangaphasi kweminyaka eli-18 abakavunyelwa ukungena emathaveni, esipotini, eendaweni zokuditjha ngotjwala kunye neentolo ezithengisa utjwala.
Abathengisi botjwala abazakutholakala bephula imithetho le kufuze babotjhelwe ukwenza ubulelesi, bemukwe namalayisensabo wokuthengisa nokusebenza ngotjwala.
tgt_text: Ditona di tlo swara ditshedimošetšo tša babegaditaba mo dibekeng tše tlago go hlatholla dipego tša bona ka go latelana ga tšona le go hlalošiša magoro ao go ona mošomo swanetšego go tiišeletšwa letsogo  Ditiragalo tšeo di Tlago.
Khonferense ya Bahlomi ba Diinstasteri ba Bathobaso le ya Baromela ka Ntle ga Naga (BIEC).

src_text: Umphumela Womhlangano Weenkhulu Wabarholi Besiqhema Samazwe We-G.      UMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa ube yingcenye yomHlangano weenKhulu wabaRholi be-G7 ebewubanjelwe e-Bavaria, eJarimani ngoMvulo nakama-27 kuMgwengweni wee-.
tgt_text: Khonferense ya Pulamadibogo ya BIEC tla swarelwa Sentharengkgoparara ya Boditšhabatšhaba ya Sandton gola Johannesburg ka Laboraro, 20 Mosegamanye.

src_text: UMengameli – ohlanganyele nabanye eenqhenyaneni zokubonisana ngetlayimethi, iimbaseli, zepilo, ukutholakala nokuvikeleka kokugoma ephasini kunye neendaba zokulinganiseka kobulili – umenywe msingathi womhlangano lo, u-Chancellor Olaf Scholz.

tgt_text: Khonferense ye latela tsebagatšo ya mathomong ngwaga wo ya Tšhomišanommogo ya Diromelwantle tša Bahlomi ba Diintasteri ba Bathobaso ka mmušo, yeo thekgago bahlomi ba diintasteri ba bathobaso go kgona go tsenelela mebarakeng ye meswa, le go kgona go fihlelela thekgo ya ditšhelete ya diromelwantle le mekgwa ya go bapaletša ba bangwe  Melaetša.

src_text: I-G7 yikundla yezepolitiki ehlanganyelwe borhulumende be-Canada, ne-France, neJarimani, neTariyana, neJapan, ne-United Kingdom kunye ne-United States     Iinqunto Zekhabinethi .
tgt_text: DitebogišoKabinete lebiša ditebogišo tša yona le go lakaletša bao ba latelago mahlogonolo: Springboks, ka phenyo ya yona ya go thabiša kudu ya motsotso wa mafelelo kgahlanong le Wales nakong ya phenkgišano ya mathomo godimo ga diteko tše tharo tša dipapadi Lepatlelong la Loftus Versveld gola Pretoria ka Mokibelo, 2 Mosegamanye.

src_text: Umtlamo Wehlelo Lekoro Yezomthetho (umtlamo we-LSC).
tgt_text: Banyana Banyana, ka phenyo ya yona ya go nweša dino tše pedi go ye tee papading ya pulamadibogo ya Mogopo wa Basadi wa Ditšhaba tša Afrika kgahlanong le Nigeria yeo bego bapalelwa gola Morocco, ka Mošupologo, 4 Mosegamanye  Bao ba Thwetšwego MešomongBatho ka moka bao ba thwetšwego mešomong mangwalo bona thuto tlo tiišetšwa le go netefatšwa ka tsela ye maleba.

src_text: IKhabinethi ivumele ukumenyezelwa emphakathini komTlamo we-LSC kobanyana umphakathi uzokuphefumula ngawo.
tgt_text: Ngaka Nyameko Barney Pityana bjalo ka Modulasetulo wa Khomišene ya Bosetšhaba ya Lotto..     Moadbokheiti Rory Voller bjalo ka Mokomišinare wa Khomišene ya Dikhamphani le ya Tsebo ya Kgopolo.

src_text: Zegezi.
tgt_text: Mohlagase.

src_text: Ikhabinethi yemukele amagadango wokungena hlangana kombuso ekurarululeni umraro omkhulukazi wokutlhayela kwegezi.
tgt_text: Kabinete amogela ditsenogare tšeo di tsebišitšwego ke mmušo go šogana le mathata mohlagase ka nageng.

src_text: Amagadango angeneleleko la avula indlela yokwehlisa izinga lokucinywa kwegezi kwenzelwa ukuyonga, kutjhugululwe indlela yokusebenza kilomkhakha wegezi khona kuzakufikelelwa ubujamo bokufumaneka kwegezi ngendlela enzinzileko.Ukusekela isiphehligezi nokusiza ilizwe lekhethu ekufunyaneni igezi kabudisi, sidinga ukunciphisa izinga lokusetjenziswa kwegezi okuzii-6000 zamamegawathi eenyangeni ezintathu ezizako..  Izakhamuzi zingafaka isandla ekongeni igezi ngokuhlala bacima amalampa angasetjenziswako neesetjenziswa ezisebenzisa igezi enengi ngeenkhathi lapho igezi isetjenziswa khulu khona.
tgt_text: Magato bohlokwa ao tšerwego kgora tsela ya go fokotša go kgaotšwa ga mohlagase, le go fetoša lekala la mohlagase le go fihlelela tšhireletšo ya mohlagase ya nako ye telele.

src_text: Amabhizinisi ayakhuthazwa ukwamukela ithekhnoloji eyonga igezi nawo azibandakanye ekuphumeleliseni amano wokwehlisa isidingo esiphezulu segezi..  I-Operation Vulindlela  .
tgt_text: Mo go thekgeng kabo ya mohlagase le go thuša naga ya rena ka kabo ya mohlagase yeo imelwago, re nyaka go fokotša tšhomišo ya mohlagase nageng ya rena ka dimekawate tše 600 mo dikgweding tše tharo tše di latelago.

src_text: Ikhabinethi yemukele iragelophambili eyenziweko ngaphasi kwejima le-Operation Vulindlela ukususa iinqabo emikhakheni yezamandla, umthangalasisekelo wezokuthintana nemikhakha yezamanzi nezevakatjhobukela ngomnqopho wokuvuselela umnotho.
tgt_text: Malapa ka kgatha tema ya wona mo go bolokeng mohlagase ka go tima didirišwa tšeo di sego bohlokwa le tšeo di šomišago mohlagase wo montši mo dinakong tšeo tšhomišo lego godimo.

src_text: Sele kufikelelwe ngepumelelo ematjhugulukweni alithoba kama-26, kanti ali-11 wawo amatjhuguluko la akhamba kuhle.
tgt_text: Dikgwebo di hlohleletšwa go šomiša theknolotši ya tšweletšo ya mohlagase ya mohola gape ye ntši le go kgatha tema mo mananeong go fokotša tšhomišo ye ntši ya mohlagase..     Operation Vulindlela.

src_text: Ipumelelo ifaka hlangana ukukhuliswa komthamo wokunikelwa kwamalayisensi wokusatjalalaliswa kweensetjenziswa zegezi, ukwakhiwa kabutjha kweBandla le-Transnet leenTetjhi zemiKhumbi leliZweloke, ukutjhatjhululwa kwerhelo lamakgonofundwa aqakathekileko nokusetjenziswa kwehlelo le-e-Visa emazweni ali-14’ kufaka hlangana amazwe amakhulu amatjha kezevakatjhobukelo anjenge-China, i-India, i-Kenya ne-Nigeria..  INturhu Eqothele Bobulili Obuthileko Nokubulawa Kwabasikazi (i-GBVF).
tgt_text: Kabinete amogela tšwelopele yeo dirilwego ka fase ga Operation Vulindlela go fediša dititelego tše di lebanego le mohlagase, dikgokagano tša megala, meetse le lekala la boeti go tsošološa ekonomi.

src_text: Ikhabinethi iveze ukusilingeka kwayo ngesehlakalo samhlapha sokugagadlhelwa kwabantu bengubo ababunane e-Krugersdorp, e-Gauteng.
tgt_text: Dimpshafatšo tša meago tše senyane go tše 26 di feditšwe, mola go na le tšwelopele ya dimpshafatšo tše.

src_text: Izenzwezi zelunya nokuhlukunyezwa kwabomma ziqalela phasi ifundiso yethu yokuziphatha emphakathini.
tgt_text: Dikatlego di akaretša go thoma ga dilaesense go tšweletšo ye tiilego, go fetošetša ga Taolo ya Maemakepe Setšhaba Transnet, tokollo ya mabokgoni bohlokwa ao lekotšwego lefsa le phethagatšo ya lenaneo la e-Visa mo dinageng tše 14, go akaretša mebaraka ya boeti ye mefsa ye megolo go swana le China, India, Kenya le Nigeria..     Dikgaruru le Dipolao tšeo di Hlolwago ke Bong (GBVF).

src_text: Ikhabinethi ibuke godu iButho lamaPholisa weSewula Afrika ngokubopha msinyana abasolwa abathinteka ezenzwezi zelunyezi..  Ikhabinethi ikhombele imiphakathi ukusebenzisana nabathobelisimthetho ngokuthi babelane ngelwazi elidingekako ukubika izenzo ezisolisako.
tgt_text: Kabinete tšweleditše pefelo mo go katweng go go šoro ga basadi ba seswai mo Krugersdorp ka Gauteng.

src_text: Ngokubambisana, singenzela abomma nabentwana imiphakathi ephephileko..  Woke amaSewula Afrika anesibopho sokuphikisana nezenzo zabaphehlinturhu ngokulandela umthetho.
tgt_text: Ditiro tše tše dimpe le tlhorišo kgahlanong le basadi di nyatša mokgwa wa rena wa leago.

src_text: Bika ngezehlakalo ze-GBVF esitetjhini samapholisa sangekhenu namkha udosele inomboro yokuBika ngobuLelesi yasimahla ku-0860 01 0111, iSentha eLwisana nobuLelesi be-GBVF ku-0800 428 428 namkha udosele umTato weSizo ngokuPhelisa iNturhu ku-0800 150. .
tgt_text: Kabinete retile gape Tirelo ya Maphodisa Afrika Borwa ka go swara babelaelwa ba mmalwa malebana le bosenyi bjo bošoro..     Kabinete ipiletša go ditšhaba go šoma le maphodisa le makala mangwe phethagatšo ya molao ka go abelana ka tshedimošo goba go bega mešongwana ya go belaetša.

src_text: INyanga yaboMma.
tgt_text: Ge re šoma mmogo, re ka dira gore ditšhaba tša rena di bolokege go basadi le bana.

src_text: NgeNyanga yaboMma egidingwa qobe mnyaka ngoRhoboyi kuhlonitjhwa abomma abazibandakanya emzabalazweni wetjhaphuluko nabo boke abomma abenza umehluko emiphakathini yekhethu..  INyanga yaboMma yanonyaka igidingwa ngaphasi kommongondaba othi: “AmaLungelo waboMma wezeHlalakuhle newezomNotho nokubaThuthukisa: Ukwakhela aboMma kabuTjha nokuQinisa Ukusimelela Kwabo” – Women’s Socio-Economic Rights and Empowerment: Building Back Better for Women’s Improved Resilience”..  Bangaphezu kwee-20 000 abomma abamatjhela e-Union Buildings ePitori mhlana ali-9 kuRhoboyi we-1956 bafaka isandla ekuqinisekiseni ukuthi ukulingana ngokobulili nokunikelwa kwaboMma amandla kezomnotho kuhlala kuliqalontangi eSewula Afrika ebuswa ngokwentando yenengi.
tgt_text: Moafrika Borwa yo mongwe le yo mongwe na le mošomo wa go ba kgahlanong le basenyi ba dikgaruru ka karolong ya molao.

src_text: Izenzo zabo zesibindi zakhuthaza abomma ukuthatha isikhundla sabo epalamende, kurhulumende neenhlanganweni zomphakathi begodu sakhela kilepumelelo selokhu safumana itjhaphuluko ngomnyaka we-.
tgt_text: Bega ditiragalo ka moka tša GBV setišing sa kgauswi sa maphodisa goba leletša nomoro ya Crime Stop: 08600 10111, Senthara ya Taolo ya Setšhaba: 0800 428 428 goba Mogala wa go Emiša Dikgaruru tša Bong: 0800.

src_text: Isikhumbuzo Sebangamatlhuwo ye-Marikana.
tgt_text: Kgwedi ya Basadi.

src_text: NgeLesibili, mhlana ali-16 kuRhoboyi wee-2022, urhulumende wahlanganyela nelizwe loke ekukhumbuleni ibangamatlhuwo eyenzeka e-Marikana eseTlhagwini Tjingalanga ngomnyaka wee-.
tgt_text: Kgwedi ya Basadi ya ngwaga le ngwaga ka Phato hlompha basadi bao ba kgathilego tema ntweng ya tokologo le basadi ka moka mo setšhabeng.

src_text: Ubuhlungu babasebenzi, imindenabo nesitjhaba soke buzakuhlala buyingcenye yomlando welizwe lekhethu..  Ihlelo lokuVuselela i-Marikana sele lihlonyiwe ukwakha kabutjha nokwenza ubujamo obamukelekako ukuthuthukisa ihlalakuhle yomphakathi we-Marikana.
tgt_text: Kgwedi ya Basadi ya ngwaga wo ketekwa ka fase ga morero: “Ditokelo tša Basadi tša Ekonomi ya Leago: Go Aga Lefsa Bokaone go Matlafala ga Basadi moo go Kaonafetšego”..     Basadi ba go feta 20 000 bao ba gwantetšego Union Buildings ka Pretoria ka la 9 Phato 1956 ba kgathile tema go kgonthiša gore tekatekano ya bong le matlafatšo di dule di le bohlokwa ka temokrasing ya Afrika Borwa.

src_text: Ngomnyaka ophelileko urhulumende walilisa imindeni yabongazimbi ngemali eziingidi ezili-R176 begodu imilandu esaleleko esatjhutjhiswako kulindeleke bona iqedelelwe ekupheleni kwakaRhoboyi wee-.
tgt_text: Dikgato tša bona tša bogale di hlohleleditše basadi ka kakaretšo go tšea maemo bona ao ba swanetšego ka Palamenteng, mmušong le setšhabeng, gomme re dira dikaonafatšo tše ga nnyane ga nnyane go tloga mola re hwetšago tokologo ka.
Segopotšo sa Marikana.

src_text: Isibalo esithileko seenkumba ezivuselelweko namkha eziqeda ukuthengwa zinikelwe abahlolokazi be-Marikana kanti ezinye zizokuphela ukwakhiwa nonyaka.
tgt_text: Ka Labobedi, 16 Phato 2022, mmušo kopane le naga ka moka go gopola masetlapelo ao diragetšego ka Marikana Leboa Bodikela ka.

src_text: Iphrojekthi yokwakha izindlu ebiza iingidi ezima-R700 izokwenza abasebenzi beemayini banikelwa iinkumba ezithe tjha.
tgt_text: Bohloko bjoo bo kwelwego ke bašomi, malapa bona le naga ka bophara bo tla dula bo le gona mo historing ya rena.

src_text: Umthangalasisekelo oqakathekileko wezehlalakuhle uyanikelwa ukuthuthukisa ubujamo bokuhlala kwemiphakathi eyakhele iimayini..  Imbizo kaMengameli Emayelana neHlelo lokuThuthukisa Iiyingi (i-DDM) e-Gauteng.
tgt_text: Lenaneo la Mpshafatšo la Marikana le phethagaditšwe go aga lefsa le go hlola tikologo ya go dumelela go kaonafatša maphelo setšhaba sa Marikana.

src_text: Ngemva kokubanjwa ngepumelelo kweeMbizo zikaMengameli ezethula i-DDM amahlandla amathathu eTlhagwini Tjingalanga, eFreyistata neMpumalanga ngokulandelana, uMasipala wesiYingi se-Sedibeng ubambe Imbizo yesine NgeLesihlanu, nakali-12 kuRhoboyi wee-..  Ngaphasi kommongondaba othi: “Ungatjhiyi Namunye Ngemva”, UMengameli u-Cyril Ramaphosa wadosa phambili isiqhema sabajameli abaziimphathimandla zikarhulumende welizwe, beemfunda nebeendawo zemakhaya.
tgt_text: Ngwaga wa go feta mmušo lefile R176 milione go lliša malapa batšwasehlabelo gomme melato ye sa šetšego ye lego dikgorotshekong go letetšwe gore phethwe mafelelong .

src_text: AmaSewula Afrika ngokuhlukahlukana kwamakoro wawo akhuthazwa ukubambisana ekulwisaneni namazinga akhulako womtlhago nokudobha phasi ukungabi nobuyo okubangelwa bujamo bezomnotho obubudisi..  IsiYingi se-Sedibeng sesibe neragelo phambili ekusebenziseni ngokomthetho iinZinda zomNotho eziKhethekileko (ama-SEZ) zomlambo i-Vaal, ekungizo ezinekghono lokuvuselela amabubulo werijini, isifunda newelizwe.
tgt_text: Dintlo tše di mpshafaditšwego goba tšeo di agilwego lefsa di filwe bahlologadi ba Marikana gomme tše dingwe di tla phethwa ngwaga wo.

src_text: I-SEZ yomLambo i-Vaal ihlala ikukwamukela imikhakha eqakathekileko elandelako: IDrobha eHle (i-Vaal River Smart City); isiKhungo esiTjheja iKghono leBhoduluko; isikhungo semikhiqizo yebange; iinsetjenziswa zezokulima; idrobha emagega nedoyelo leemphaphamtjhini; isiqetjhana sokudoya kwaboflayi abancani; imithwalo ekhamba ngesiphaphamtjhini nomkhakha ovuselelweko wesimbi.
tgt_text: Protšeke ya dintlo ya R700 milione dira gore go bonwe bašomi ba moepong ba fiwa dintlo tša seriti.
Go filwe infrastraktšha ya leago ye bohlokwa go kaonafatša maemo go phela ditšhaba tša moepong.

src_text: UmButhano kaMengameli womKhakha wezeHlalakuhle.
tgt_text: Imbizo ya Mopresidente ya ka Gauteng ka Mmotlolo wa Tlhabollo ya Dilete (DDM).

src_text: Umbuthano kaMengameli womKhakha wezeHlalakuhle owabanjelwa Ekurhuleni, e-Gauteng ukusuka  nakama-4 ukuya nakama-5 kuRhoboyi wee-2022 ngaphasi kommongondaba othi: “Ukukhuthaza ukubuyisana ngokuPhumelelisa ukuzibandakanya kwemiPhakathi ngezeHlalakuhle nezoMnotho”, wahlanganisa abalimindima beenkhungo ezihlukileko ukusebenzisana norhulumende ukutjheja iintjhijilo zezehlalakuhle nezomnotho nokufumanela imiphakathi iinsetjenziswa, hlangana neminye iminqopho..  Umhlangano lo watjheja imibiko yemikhulumiswano yeemfunda zolithoba mayelana neentjhijilo zazo, ezifaka hlangana ukufikeleleka kwesizo leemali, iindaba zokulawula, ukutjhugululwa komkhakha wezehlalakuhle ngomnqopho wokukhuthaza itjhebiswano lombuso nomphakathi ukuqalana nemiraro yomtlhago, ukungalingani nokutlhayela kwemisebenzi..  Ikhabinethi ikhombele iinhlangano zomphakathi nezakhamuzi ukulima indima eqinileko ekwakheni ikusasa elingcono, njengombana lokho kusehlelweni lomTlamo wokuThuthukiswa kweliZweloke: ngeNembombono yomNyaka wee-  IinQunto zeKhabinethi.
tgt_text: Go latela katlego ya Izimbizo tša Mopresidente tše tharo tšeo di swerwego ka Leboa Bodikela, Freistata le Mpumalanga ka tsela yeo, Mmasepala wa Selete wa Sedibeng ka Gauteng swere karolo ya bone ka Labohlano, 12 Phato..     Ka fase ga morero: “Akaretša batho ka moka”, Mopresidente Cyril Ramaphosa etile pele sehlopha sa bahlenkedi ba maemo godimo go tšwa go mebušo ya bosetšhaba, ya profense le ya selegae.

src_text: ITlhatlha lamaBubulo wezamaSiko, zobuKghwari nezobuGwali.
tgt_text: Maafrika Borwa ka mekgatlo le makala bona ba beakantšwe gore ba šome mmogo kgahlanong le magato ao golago bohloki le mathata ao hlotšego maemo ao hlotlago ekonomi.

src_text: IKhabinethi ivumele ukusetjenziswa kwetlhatlha lamaBubulo wezamaSiko nezobuGwali.
tgt_text: Selete sa Sedibeng se na le tšwelopele mo phethagatšong ya Vaal River Special Economic Zone (SEZ), yeo lego bohlokwa go kaonafatšeng selete, profense le naga.

src_text: Itlhatlheli litjheja ubukghwari obubukelwako, imisebenzi elukwako, yemigwalo neyeembikiindaba; okubukelwako nokuthintana ngeensetjenziswa; ukugwala nobukghwari; imidlalo nokugidinga, kufaka hlangana umbhino, ukugadangiswa kwemitlolo..  Lelitlhatlha lizokungenelela kilemikhakha mayelana nokwakha umkhakha wobukghwari obutjhugululiweko obuzokwamukelwa godu bube sezingeni lephasiloke ehlangothinelo.
tgt_text: Vaal River SEZ beakanya go swara makala bohlokwa a latelago: Vaal River Smart City; Hapo ya Tlhabollo ya Green Hydrogen; hapo ya khabisi; agro-logistiki, aerotropolisi; aetrome, sefofane sa merwalo le lekala la tšweletšo ya tšhipi ye matlafaditšwego.

src_text: Lizokusiza ibubulo lezobugwali nezobukghwari leSewula Afrika lifikelele amamakethe wangekhaya newangaphetjheya..  UmThethomtlamo Obuyekeziweko wokuBolekwa kweeMali nguMasipala neeMali Zobujamo Oburhabako.
tgt_text: Samiti ya Lekala la Leago ya Mopresidente.

src_text: IKhabinethi ivumele iinkhibelelo zomthethomtlamo wamva nje wokuBolekwa kweeMali nguMasipala neeMali zobuJamo obuRhabako.
tgt_text: Samiti ya Lekala la Leago ya Mopresidente yeo swerwego ka Ekurhuleni, Gauteng go tloga ka la 4 go fihla ka la 5 Phato 2022 ka fase ga morero “Go godiša Tirišano ya Leago go kgontšha go Kgatha Tema go Ekonomi ya Leago mo Ditšhabeng” kopantše bakgathatema go tšwa dileteng go šoma le mmušo go šogana le ditlhohlo tša ekonomi ya leago le go beakanya methopo ya ditšhaba tša leago, gare ga dinepo tše dingwe..     Samiti lebeletše dipego tša dipoledišano go tšwa go diprofense tše 9 ka ditlhohlo tša tšona, tšeo di akaretšago thekgo ya ditšhelete, ditaba tša taolo, phetogo ya lekala la leago ka kgopolo ya go godiša tirišano ya go šogana le ditlhohlo tšeo di lebanego le bohloki, go se lekalekane le tlhokego ya mešomo.

src_text: Iinkhibelelwezi zinqophene khulu nengcenye yokubolekwa kweemali.
tgt_text: Kabinete ipiletša go mekgatlo ya selegae le badudi go kgatha tema ya bona ka mafolofolo go kgonthiša gore re aga bokamoso bjo bokaone, bjalo ka ge go beakantšwe go Leano la Tlhabollo la Setšhaba: Pono ya     Diphetho tša Kabinete.

src_text: Hlangana neenkhibelelo ezihlongozwako ngokwethula isikhathi sokuboleka eseluliweko ukukhambisana nesikhathi sokusebenza kwepahla esekelwe ngeemali.
tgt_text: Leanolegolo la Diintasteri tša Boithomelo le Setšo.

src_text: Iinkhibelelwezi godu zihlathulula indima yamaziko asiza ngeemali kezokubolekisa ngeemali kibomasipala.
tgt_text: Kabinete dumeletše gore leanolegolo la Diintasteri tša Boithomelo le Setšo le phethagatšwe.

src_text: IsiGaba sama-230 somThethosisekelo weRiphabhliki yeSewula Afrika womnyaka we-1996 unikela abomasipala igunya lokuboleka iimali zokuqalana neeNdleko zabo.
tgt_text: Leanolegolo le nepiša bokgabo bja pono; tiroatla le moakanyetšo; bobegaditaba bja go bonwa le go kwa le bja kgokaganyo, ditirelo tša moakanyetšo le tša bokgabo; phethagatšo le keteko, go akaretša mmino, phatlalatšo le bobegaditaba bja kgatišo.

src_text: Umtlamo wokuthoma wavunyelwa yiKhabinethi ngomnyaka wee-2000 ukuhlahla isiGaba sesiThandathu nese-13 somThetho wokuphathwa kweeMali zikaMasipala wee-2003 (UmThetho Nomboro 56 womNyaka wee-2003).
tgt_text: Leanolegolo le tla tsena ka bogare mo makaleng go aga lekala la kaonafatšo ya boithomelo leo le tla lemogwago lefaseng ka moka le go phadišana mo lefelong.

src_text: Iinkhibelelo ezivunyelweko zinqophe ukuthokoza ababolekisi kumakethe yabomasipala kodwana kuragwe ukulandela imigomo ekhambisana nokuboleka iimali kwabomasipala.
tgt_text: Le tla šoma intastering ya boithomelo ya Afrika Borwa la kgona go fihlelela mebaraka ya gae le ya boditšhabatšhaba..     Tlhako ye Mpshafaditšwego ya Ditšhelete tša Dikadimo go Mebasepala ka moka le Ditšhelete tša Merero ya Ditšhoganetšo.
Kabinete dumeletše dimpshafatšo go Tlhako ye Mpshafaditšwego ya Ditšhelete tša Dikadimo go Mebasepala ka moka le Ditšhelete tša Merero ya Ditšhoganetšo.

src_text: Ukukhutjhwa ngaphambi kwesikhathi  kweembalobalo zobulelesi ezikhutjhwa ngekota zomnyaka weemali wee-2022/.
tgt_text: Dimpshafatšo di go karolo ya kadimo ya tlhako ye.

src_text: Ikhabinethi ivumele ukukhutjhwa ngaphambi kwesikhathi kweembalobalo zobulelesi ezikhutjhwa qobe ngekota zomnyaka weemali wee-2022/.
tgt_text: Gare ga dimpshafatšo tšeo di akantšwego go thoma paka ya go adima ya nako ye telele go sepelelana le nako ya mohola ya tše dingwe tša dithoto tšeo di thekgilwego ka ditšhelete.

src_text: Ikhabinethi ivumele ukukhutjhwa kweembalobalo zobulelesi ezikhutjhwa qobe ngekota.
tgt_text: Dimpshafatšo di hlakiša mohola wa diinstitušene tša ditšhelete tša tlhabollo mo sekgobeng sa kadimo sa mebasepala.

src_text: Lokhu kunqotjhwe ngakho ukutjhugulula ikambiso yokukhutjhelwa kwelizwe iimbalobalo zobulelesi ezikhutjhwa qobe mnyaka.
tgt_text: Karolo ya 230 ya Molaotheo wa Repabliki ya Afrika Borwa ya 1996 matlafatša mebasepala go kgoboketša dikadimo tša matlotlo bona goba ditshenyagelo tša gonabjale.

src_text: Ukukhutjhwa ngaphambi kwesikhathi kweembalobalo zobulelesi okutjhukunyiswako kulethwe kuRhoboyi wee-2022 ekoteni yokuthoma kwathi kwekota yesibili kwasiwa kuSinyikhaba wee-.
tgt_text: Tlhako ya kgale dumeletšwe ke Kabinete ka 2000 go hlahla Kgaolo ya 6 le 13 ya Molao wa Ditšhelete wa Mebasepala, wa 2003 (Molao wa 2003).

src_text: Iimbalobalo zobulelesi zekota yesithathu zizokukhutjhwa ngoMhlolanja wee-2023 kuthi zekota yesine ngoMrhayili wee-.
tgt_text: Dimpshafatšo tše di dumeletšwego di nyaka go hlohleletša baadimiši ba bantši mo mebasepaleng go hlokomela melao ya motheo yeo hlohleletšago go adima ga mebasepala..     Tšhupamabaka ye Lokolotšwego Pele ga Nako ya Phatlalatšo ya Dipalopalo tša Bosenyi tšeo di Begilwego tša Kotara ya Ngwaga wa Ditšhelete wa 2022/.
Kabinete dumeletše Tšhupamabaka ye lokolotšwego Pele ga Nako ya Phatlalatšo ya Dipalopalo tša Bosenyi tšeo di Begilwego tša Kotara ya Ngwaga wa Ditšhelete wa 2022/.

src_text: UkuPheliswa Kwesikhathi Sobujamo Behlekelele yeliZweloke (i-NSoD).
tgt_text: Kabinete dumeletše go lokollwa ga dipalopalo tša bosenyi tša kotara.

src_text: IKhabinethi ivumele ukuqedwa kwesikhathi sobuJamo beHlekelele yeliZweloke (i-NSoD) esamenyezelwa ngemva kweenkhulula ePumalanga Kapa naKwaZulu-Natala..  I-NSoD yaphelelwa sikhathi mhla ali-18 kuRhoboyi wee-2022 ngemva kokwelulwa kwayo kusukela mhla ali-18 kuVelabahlinze wee-.
tgt_text: Se be le go fetoša tokollo ya ngwaga yeo dirilwego ya dipalopalo tša bosenyi tša naga.

src_text: Ukwelulwa kwesikhathi sehlekelele kwenziwa kuyelelwe isidingo sokuraga nokuqinisa amagadango wanje athethwe maphiko wombuso ukuqalana nomthelela wobujamo bezulu obumbi eemfundeni ezithintekileko..  IKhabinethi ivumile ukuthi ubujamo banje abusavumelani namagadango aqinileko njengamaphiko wombuso, amakhampani wangeqadi neenhlangano zomphakathi ezizokuraga ngawo ukufumana isizo, ukuvuselelwa kwepahla nokwakha kabutjha  ImiThethomlingwa.
tgt_text: Dinako tšeo di beilwego tšeo ka tšona go tla lokollwago tšhupamabaka ye ya dipalopalo tša bosenyi tla ba ka Phato 2022 mo go tla lokollwago tša kotara ya pele gomme ye nngwe be ka Dibatsela 2022 mo go tla lokollwago tša kotara ya bobedi.

src_text: IsiKhibelelo somThethomlingwa wokuTloliswa kwePahla.
tgt_text: Dipalopalo tša bosenyi tša kotara ya boraro le kotara ya bone di tla lokollwa ka Dibokwane le Mopitlo 2023 ka go latelana .

src_text: IKhabinethi ivumele ukwethulwa ePalamende kwesiKhibelelo somThethomlingwa wokuTloliswa kwepahla wee-.
tgt_text: Go fedišwa ga Seemo sa Masetlapelo Setšhaba (NSoD).

src_text: IKhabinethi ivumele ukukhutjhelwa emphakathini komthethomlingwa lo ngoMgwengweni wee-..  Iinkhibelelo ezitjhukunyiswako zizokuphumelelisa ubunikazi benarha okusemthethweni kusiGaba sama-25(6) womThethosisekelo weRiphabhliki yeSewula Afrika we-.
tgt_text: Kabinete dumeletše go fedišwa ga Seemo sa Masetlapelo Setšhaba (NSoD) seo se tsebišitšwego go latela mafula ka Kapa Bohlabela le KwaZulu-Natal.

src_text: UmThethomlingwa lo uqalelela ukubuthelelwa kweembalobalo mayelana nombala, ubulili, ubakhamuzi babanikazi bamalungelo wenarha eSewula Afrika.
tgt_text: NSoD se fedišitšwe ka la 18 Phato 2022 go latela katološo ya sona ka 18 Phupu.
