src_text: Isiqalelelwesi sizokusiza  lokha nakutjhuguluwa ubunikazi benarha..  UmThethomlingwa we-Ejensi yemiThombo nomThangalasisekelo waManzi  (i-NWRIA) wee-.
tgt_text: Katološo lebeletše tlhokego ya go tšwela pele go matlafatša magato tšhireletšo ao lego gona ao thomilego ke dibopego tša mmušo go fokotša le go šogana le maemo boso šoro mo diprofenseng tšeo di amegilego.

src_text: IKhabinethi ivumele ukukhutjhelwa emphakathini komThethomlingwa i-NWRIA womnyaka wee-2022 isikhathi esingaba malanga amatjhumi alithoba (90) ukobana kuvezwe imibono ngawo.
tgt_text: Kabinete dumetše gore maemo gonabjale ga sa nyaka magato go se tlwaelege ka ge dibopego tša mmušo, lekala la praebete le ditšhaba tša segae di tla tšwela pele go kgonthiša gore go ba le kimollo ye tšwelago pele, mpshafatšo le kagolefsa     Melaokakanywa.

src_text: UmThethomlingwa lo utjhukumisa ukuhlonywa kwe-NWRIA ezokuqalana nokuhlela, isekelo leemali nokuthuthukiswa komthangalasisekelo welizwe.
tgt_text: Molaokakanywa wo Mpshafaditšwego wa Ngwadišo ya Mangwalo Bodulo wa.

src_text: Izokuqalana godu nokutjhejwa komthangalasisekelo wamanzi.
tgt_text: Kabinete dumeletše go išwa ga Molaokakanywa wo Mpshafaditšwego wa Ngwadišo ya Mangwalo Bodulo wa 2020 Palameneteng gore lebelelwe gape.

src_text: I-ejensi izokuqinisekisa ukufumaneka okuragako nokunzinzileko kwamanzi ngokukhambisana neembopho zomthethosisekelo zokufumaneka kwamanzi nebhoduluko elinepilo.
tgt_text: Kabinete dumeletše Molaokakanywa ka Phupu 2020 gore lebelelwe gape ke setšhaba.

src_text: I-ejensi le izokuhlonywa ibe liZiko lomBuso ngaphasi kweShejuli yesiBili yomThetho wokuPhathwa kweeMali zomBuso we-1999 (umThetho Nomboro 1 ka-1999).
tgt_text: Dimpshafatšo tše di šišintšwego di tla huetša gore go lemogwe nako ya naga yeo šireleditšwego ka semolao ka go Karolo ya 25(6) ya Molaotheo wa Repabliki ya Afrika Borwa ka.

src_text: I-ejensi le izokuthatha ilawulo lemisebenzi eyenziwa njenganje yi-Trans-Caledon Tunnel Authority..  IsiKhibelelo Somthethomlingwa Wamagunya NemiSebenzi YaboMasipala wee-.
tgt_text: Molaokakanywa dumelela go kgoboketšwa ga dipalopalo go ya ka morafe, bong, naga, bodudi bja beng ba ditokelo tša naga ka Afrika Borwa.

src_text: IKhabinethi ivumele ukwethulwa ePalamende kwesiKhibelelo somThethomlingwa wamaGunya nemiSebenzi yaboMasipala wee-.
tgt_text: Peakanayo ye tla kgontšha gore go be le dipego tša tlhakišo ya naga le dinyakišišo tšeo di nepagetšego ka moso malebana le phetošo ya go ba mong wa naga.

src_text: UmThethomlingwa lo ukhibelela umThetho wamaGunya nemiSebenzi yaboMasipala womNyaka wee-2007 (umThetho Nomboro 12 wee-2007).
Iinkhibelelwezi zilawula amagunya wabomasipala ekuthuthukisweni kwehlelo lokubhadelwa kweemali mayelana nokwenziwa kweembawo ezithunyelwa kibomasipala.
tgt_text: Molaokakanywa wa Mokgatlo wa Infrastraktšha wa Mothopo wa Meetse wa Setšhaba (NWRIA) wa 2022 .

src_text: Iinkhibelelwezi zizokuqinisekisa ukuthi abomasipala bahlawulisa ngefanelo, tjhatjhalazi nangokulungileko.
tgt_text: Kabinete dumeletše go phatlalatšwa ga Molaokakanywa wa NWRIA wa 2022 gore setšhaba se swayeswaye ka mo nakong ya matšatši   Molaokakanywa akanywa go beakanywa ga NWRIA gore tšeye maikarabelo go beakanya, go thekga ka ditšhelete le go kaonafatša infrastraktšha ya naga tla ba gape le maikarabelo go hlokomela infrastraktšha ya gonabjale ya meetse.

src_text: IKhabinethi yavumela ukukhutjhelwa emphakathini komThethomlingwa lo ngomnyaka wee-.
tgt_text: Mokgatlo ke wa go kgonthiša go abja ga meetse ga go swarelela, ga go kwagala go sepelelana le maikarabelo molaotheo go fihlelela meetse le go šireletša tikologo ye botse.
Mokgatlo tla beakanywa bjalo ka Lekala la Setšhaba ka fase ga Lenaneo la 2 la Molao wa Taolo ya Ditšhelete tša Setšhaba, wa 1999 (Molao wa 1 wa 1999).

src_text: IsiKhibelelo somThethomlingwa wezeeMali womNyaka wee-.
tgt_text: Mokgatlo tla tšea mešomo yeo šetšego dirwa ke Trans-Caledon Tunnel Authority.

src_text: IKhabinethi ivumele ukwethulwa ePalamende kwesiKhibelelo somThethomlingwa wezeeMali womNyaka wee-.
tgt_text: Molaokakanywa wo Mpshafaditšwego wa Maatla le Mešomo ya Ditšhelete tša Mmasepala .

src_text: UmThethomlingwa lo utjhukumisa ukukhitjelelwa kwemiThetho elikhomba, elandelako (1) i-Associated Institutions Pension Fund Act ka-1963 (umThetho Nomboro 41 wee-1963); (2) umThetho womHlalaphasi wamaJoni (i-Military Pension Act)  womNyaka we-1976 (umthetho Nomboro 84  we-1976); (3) UmThetho wezomHlalaphasi wabaSebenzi bakaRhulumende we-1996; (4) UmThetho wezeeMali neweKomitjhini eLuleka ngeeMali (i-Financial and Fiscal Commission Act) we-1997 (umthetho Nomboro 99 we-1997); (5) UmThetho wokuThuthukiswa kweBhanga yezokuLima neNarha wee-2002 (umThetho Nomboro 15 wee-2002); (6) UmThetho wokuLawula abaHloliincwadi (i-Audit Profession Act) wee-2005 (umthetho Nomboro 26 wee-2005);  (7) nesiKhibelelo somThetho oLawula abaHloliincwadi wee-2021 (umThetho Nomboro 5 wee-2021)..  Iinkhibelelo ezihlongozwako zifaka hlangana, ngaphasi komThetho woMhlalaphasi wamaJoni womnyaka we-1996, ukufakwa kwabalingani abangakathathani babe bazuzi ukuthoma emva mhla ama-27 kuSihlabantangana womnyaka we-.
tgt_text: Kabinete dumeletše go išwa ga Molaokakanywa wo Mpshafaditšwego wa Maatla le Mešomo ya Ditšhelete tša Mmasepala wa.

src_text: Iinkhibelelo zomthetho womhlalaphasi zizokusiza abalingani ukufumana inzuzo khonokho nakutjhatjalaliswa umtjhado.
tgt_text: Molaokakanywa mpshafatša Molao wa Maatla le Mešomo ya Ditšhalete tša Mmasepala, wa 2007 (Molao wa 12 wa 2007).

src_text: Ngaphezu kokuhlathulula indima kaNgqongqotjhe wezeeMali nekuhlolweni kweencwadi, iinkhibelelwezi zihlalisa kuhle igunya lekomiti lapho umhloliincwadi avuma khona umlandu.
tgt_text: Dimpshafatšo di laola maatla mebasepala mo go kgoboketšeng ditshenyagelo tša tlhabollo malebana le dikgopelo tša tlhabollo ya naga tšeo di išitšwego mebasepaleng.

src_text: UmThethomlingwa lo wakhutjhelwa emphakathini ngoMhlolanja wee-2022 ukobana kuvezwe imibono.
tgt_text: Dimpshafatšo tše di tla kgonthiša gore mebasepala diriša ditshenyagelo tše ka go lekana, go sa khutiše selo le gabotse.
Kabinete dumeletše Molaokakanywa ka 2020 gore setšhaba se swayeswaye..     Molaokakanywa wo Mpshafditšwego wa Ditaba tša Ditšhelete wa 2022 .

src_text: IsiKhibelelo semiThetho eVamileko (Ukulwisana nokuKhukhuthiswa kweeMali nokuKhandela ukuSekela  amaVukelambuso ngeeMali) wee-.
tgt_text: Kabinete dumeletše go išwa ga Molaokakanywa wo Mpshafaditšwego wa Ditaba tša Ditšhelete, wa.

src_text: IKhabinethi ivumele ukwethulwa ePalamende kwesiKhibelelo somThethomlingwa wemiThetho eVamileko (UkuLwisana nokuKhukhuthiswa kweeMali nokuKhandela ukuSekela amaVukelambuso ngeeMali).
tgt_text: Molaokakanywa akanya mpshafatšo go Melao ye šupa lego (1) Molao wa Diinstitušene tše di Amanago le Sekhwama sa Diphenšene, wa 1963 (Molao wa 41 wa 1963); (2) Molao wa Diphenšene tša Mašole, wa 1976 (Molao wa 84 wa 1976); (3) Molao wa Diphenšene tša Bašomi ba Mmušo wa 1996; (4) Molao wa Ditšhelete le Khomišene ya Ditšhelete, wa 1997 (Molao wa 99 wa 1997); (5) Molao wa Panka ya Tlhabollo ya Naga le Temo, wa 2002 (Molao wa 15 wa 2002); (6) Molao wa Profešene ya Tlhakišo wa 2005 (Molao wa 26 wa 2005) le (7) Molao wo Mpshafaditšwego wa Profešene wa 2021 (Molao wa 5 wa 2021).

src_text: UmThethomlingwa lo ungomumethe eminye imiThethomlingwa nokhibelela imithetho yanje ebizwa  umThetho weSentha yobuHloli bezeeMali wee-2001 (umThetho Nomboro 38 wee-2001); (ii) UmThetho weenHlangano eziNgasebenzeli  iNzuzo we-1997 (umThetho Nomboro 71 wee-1997); (iii) UmThetho oLawula iPahla eHlanganyelweko (i-Trust Property Control Act) we-1988 (umThetho Nomboro 57 we-1988) (iv) UmThetho wamaKhampani wee-2008 (umThetho Nomboro 71 wee-2008) no  umThetho oLawula amaZiko wezeeMali (i-Financial Sector Regulations Act) wee-2017 (umThetho Nomboro 9 wee-2017).
tgt_text: Dimpshafatšo tše di šišintšwego di akaretša, ka fase ga Molao wa Diphenšene tša Mašole wa 1996, kakaretšo ya balekane ba bophelo ka moka go dikholego go tloga morago go la 27 Phato.

src_text: Iinkhibelelo ziphendula ukutlhayelelwa okutshwaywe lokha nakuhlolwa ikghono lamazwe alinganako siQhema sokuSetjenziswa kweeMali (i-FATF).
tgt_text: Molao wo mpshafaditšwego wa diphenšene tla kgontšha balekane go lemoga dikgahlego tša bona tša diphenšene ka bjako ge ba hlalana.

src_text: Umbiko wokuhlolwa ngokuzinikela uveze iintjhukumiso ezima-40 ezizokusiza ukuthi iSewula Afrika ikhambisane namazinga wamazwe ngamazwe wokulwisana nokukhukhuthiswa kweemali nokusekela iinhlangano zamavukelambuso..  ISewula Afrika yafunyanwa itlhayelelwa khulu emikhakheni ema-.
tgt_text: Go tlaleletša go hlaloša mošomo wa Tona ya Matlotlo le go hlakiša, dimpshafatšo di fetoša gape maatla komiti ya phethagatšo moo motlhakiši amogelago molato.

src_text: UmThethomlingwa lo utjheja imikhakha eli-14 kekhonjiweko.
tgt_text: Molaokakanywa phatlaladitšwe gore setšhaba se swayeswaye ka Dibokwane.

src_text: ISewula Afrika solo yathoma ukuba lilunga le-FATF ngomnyaka wee-.

tgt_text: Molaokakanywa wo Mpshafaditšwego wa Melao ya Kakaretšo (Molaokakanywa wo lego Kgahlanong le go Sepetša Tšhelete ka Tsela yeo Sego Molaong le go Lwantšha go Adimiša Tšhelete ka Tswala ya Godimo) wa.

src_text: IsiKhibelelo somThethomlingwa Olwisana Nokukhukhuthiswa Kweendakamizwa wee-.
tgt_text: Kabinete dumeletše go išwa ga Molaokakanywa wo Mpshafaditšwego wa Melao ya Kakaretšo (Molaokakanywa wo lego Kgahlanong le go Sepetša Tšhelete ka Tsela yeo Sego Molaong le go Lwantšha go Adimiša Tšhelete ka Tswala ya Godimo) wa 2022 Palamaneteng gore lekolwe gape.

src_text: IKhabinethi ivumele ukwethulwa ngePalamende kwesiKhibelelo somThethomlingwa olwisana nokuKhukhuthiswa kweenDakamizwa wee-2022 kobana uhlaliswe kuhle.
tgt_text: Molaokakanywa ke Molaokakanywa wa dikgoboketšo woo mpshafatšago Melao ya gonabjale lego  Molao wa Senthara ya Bohlale bja Ditšhelete, wa 2001 (Molao wa 38 wa 2001); (ii) Molao wa Mokgatlo wo se Nago Poelo, wa 1997 (Molao wa 71 wa 1997); (iii) Molao wa Taolo ya Traste ya Dithoto, wa 1988, (Molao wa 57 wa 1988); (iv) Molao wa Dikhamphani, wa 2008 (Molao wa 71 wa 2008) le  Molao wa Melawana ya Lekala la Ditšhelete, wa 2017 (Molao wa 9 wa 2017).

src_text: UmThetho olwisana neenDakamizwa nokuKhukuthiswa kwazo wee-1992 (umthetho Nomboro 140 we-1992) wenza kube kukwephula umthetho ukukhiqiza nokusabalalisa namkha ngiwuphi umkhiqizo obalwe kuTjhejuli yokuThoma nakuTjhejuli yesiBili yomThetho.
tgt_text: Dimpshafatšo di arabela diphošo tšeo di hweditšwego nakong ya tshekatsheko ya balekane ya naga yeo dirilwego ke Sehlopatšhomo sa Magato Ditšhelete (FATF).

src_text: Iinkhibelelwezi ziqalana nokungasebenzi kwesiGaba sama-63, esafunyanwa sitjhayisana nomthethosisekelo mayelana nokunikelwa kukaNgqongqotjhe amalungelo wokukhibelela amatjhejuli ngaphandle kokulandela ikambiso yokutlanywa komthetho.
tgt_text: Pego ya tekolo yeo kopanetšwego file maele 40 ao ka thušago gore Afrika Borwa sepelelane le magato boditšhabatšhaba go lwantšha go sepetša tšhelete ka mokgwa wo sego molaong le go lwantšha go adimiša tšhelete ka tswala ya godimo..     Go hweditšwe gore Afrika Borwa hlaelela dikarolong tše.

src_text: Ngomnyaka wee-2020, iKhotho yomThethosisekelo yamemezele ukuthi isiGaba sama-63 somThetho olwisana nokuKhukhuthiswa kweenDakamizwa womnyaka we-1992 utjhayisana nomthethosisekelo godu wajanyiswa ekusebenzeni ukufikela nakali-17 kuNobayeni wee-2022 ukunikela iPalamende ithuba lokulungisa ubutjhaphobo  Umnyanya Ozako.
tgt_text: Molaokakanywa šogana le dikarolo tše dingwe tšeo di utollotšwego.

src_text: Iphaliswano lePhasiloke likaMakhakhulararhwe (i-Rugby World Cup Sevens 2022).
tgt_text: Afrika Borwa dutše le leloko la FATF go tloga ka.

src_text: ISewula Afrika izokusingatha iphaliswano lephasiloke likamakhakhularahwe (i-Rugby World Cup Sevens 2022) eKapa mhla ali-9 namhla ali-11 kuKhukhulamungu wee-.
Imbedla yemidlalo le izokubanjwa kokuthoma kukhonthinenthi ye-Afrika begodu iinqhema zabaduna ezima-24 nezabasikazi ezili-16 ezivela ephasini jikelele zizabe ziphalisana  Imilayezo.
tgt_text: Molaokakanywa wo Mpshafaditšwego wa Diokobatši le go Rekišwa ga Diokobatši wa.

src_text: Siyabathokozisa Ikhabinethi ithokozise beyadlulisela neemfiselabuhle zayo kabalandelako: Isiqhema seBholo eRarhwako i-Banyana, ngokwenza umlando ngokuthumba iphaliswano le-Afrika lokuthoma labomma i-Women's Africa Cup of Nations (i-2022 WAFCON), ephaliswaneni egade libanjwe e-Rabat, e-Morocco ngoMgqibelo, nakama-23 kuVelabahlinze wee-.
tgt_text: Kabinete dumeletše go išwa ga Molaokakanywa wo Mpshafaditšwego wa Diokobatši le go Rekišwa ga Diokobatši wa 2022 go lekolwa go ya pele.

src_text: Ngokufanako bebaphumelela ukungenela iPhaliswano leBholo yaboMma lePhasiloke (i-FIFA Women’s World Cup) ezokusingathwa ngokuhlanganyela kwe-Australia ne-New Zealand ukuthoma nakama-20 kuVelabahlinze ukuya nakama-20 kuRhoboyi wee-.
tgt_text: Molao wa Diokobatši le go Rekišwa ga Diokobatši, wa 1992 (Molao wa 140 wa 1992) re ke bosenyi go dira le go aba seokobatši se sengwe le se sengwe seo se akareditšwego ka fase ga Lenaneo la 1 le Lenaneo la 2 la Molao.

src_text: IsiQhema seSewula Afrika (i-Team South Africa), ngokuthumba iimendlela ezima-27 emikhakheni ehlukahlukileko emidlalweni i-2022 Commonwealth Games ebanjelwe e-Birmingham, e-England ethome mhlana ama-28 kuVelabahlinze ukufikela nakabu-8 kuRhoboyi wee-.
tgt_text: Dimpshafatšo di šogana le go se nepagale ga Karolo ya 63, yeo go hweditšwego gore ga sepelelane le molaotheo malebana le ge Tona filwe ditokelo tša go mpshafatša mananeo ntle le go akaretša ditshepetšo tša palamente.

src_text: Baqede iphaliswaneli basebujameni bethoba bafumene iimendlela zerhawuda ezilikhomba, ezilithoba ngezesiliva kanti ezili-11 ngezethusi.Isiqhema saboMma sikaMakhakhulararhwe (i-Springbok Women), ngokubetha i-Spain emdlalweni wabo wokuthoma kuthungelelwano lemidlalo yokulinga emibili i-Winter Test Series, edlalelwa e-Emirates Airline Park ngeJwanisbhege.IKosazana u-Ndavi Nokeri (oneminyaka ema-23), ngokuthumba iphaliswano likaNomhlekhabo weSewula Afrika womNyaka wee-2022 (u-Miss South Afrika 2022).IKosazana Ashleigh Buhai, ngokuthumba i-2022 AIG Women’s Open nokuba mSewula Afrika wesithathu ongumma ukuthumba iphaliswano elingelikhulu likanongorwana werhawuda.
tgt_text: Ka 2020, Kgorotsheko ya Molaotheo tsebišitše gore Karolo ya 63 ya Molao wa Diokobatši le go Rekišwa ga Diokobatši wa 1992 ga go sepelelane le molaotheo gomme gwa emišwa nakwana go se be molao ga gona go fihla ka la 17 Manthole 2022 go fa Palamente nako ya go lokiša     Tiragalo  Tlago.

src_text: Sibalilela Imbiko Ikhabinethi idlulise amezwi wayo wokutjhiriya emndenini nebanganini baka: ● Tokollo “Magesh” Tshabalala (obekaneminyaka ema-46), umbhini, umkhaleli nomtloli wombhino owaduma lokha yena nabangani bakhe ababili batlama Isiqhema sombhino we-Kwaito ngomnyaka we-1996 esibizwa i-TKZee.
tgt_text: Papadi ya Sebjana sa Lefase ya Rugby ya.
Afrika Borwa tla ba monggae wa Sebjana sa Lefase sa Rugby sa 2022 ka Motsekapa gare ga la 9 le la 11 Lewedi.

src_text: Ukuqatjha.
tgt_text: Tiragalo ya papadi swarwa la mathomo ka kontinenteng ya Afrika gomme go tla bonwa dihlopha tša banna ba 24 le basadi ba 16 go tšwa lefaseng ka moka ba phadišana     Melaetša.

src_text: Koke ukuqatjhwa kulawulwa kufakazeleka kweencwadi zefundo kunye nokuhlanjululwa kwebizo lomuntu okufaneleko.
tgt_text: Ditebogišo        Kabinete lebogiša le go lakaletša tše dibotse: Banyana Banyana, ka go dira histori le go thopela Afrika Borwa Africa Cup of Nations ya Basadi (WAFCON), mo makgaolakgang WAFCON 2022 yeo bego swerwe ka Rabat, Morocco ka Mokibelo, 23 Mosegamanye.

src_text: UMm.
tgt_text: Ka nako ye tee, ba fihleletše dinyakwa tša go phadišanela Sefoka sa Lefase sa FIFA go swarwa mmogo ke Australia le New Zealand go tloga ka la 20 Mosegamanye go fihla ka la 23 Phato.

src_text: uZenkosi Dumile Mhlongo esikhundleni sokuba liSekela lomNqophisi Zombelele (i-DDG): ZokuRhubulula ngomThethokambiso nezokuLawula emNyangweni wezemiSebenzi kaRhulumende nezomThangalasisekelo (i-DPWI).
tgt_text: Team South Africa, ka go thopa dimetale tše 27 mo dikarolong tša go fapana mo Dipapading tša Commonwealth tšeo di swerwego Birmingham, England go tloga ka la 28 Mosegamanye go fihla ka la 8 Phato.

Sehlopha sa Basadi sa Springbok, ge ba thopile kgahlanong le Spain mo phadišanong ya mathomo ya tše pedi ya diteko tša Mohlwaela wa Marega tša Basadi mo Emirates Airline Park go la Johannesburg.Mohumagadi Ndavi Nokeri (23), go thopa sefoka sa Mohumagadi Afrika Borwa.

src_text: UDorh.
tgt_text: Mohumagadi Ashleigh Buhai, ka go thopa 2022 AIG Women’s Open gomme ya ba mosadi wa boraro ka Afrika Borwa go thopa sefoka sa gauta se segolo.

src_text: Bongani Elias Sithole esikhundleni sokuba ngu-DDG: iSentha yokuPhathwa kweHlekelele emNyangweni wezokuBusa ngokuHlanganyela..  UNom.
tgt_text: Mahloko         Kabinete romela melaetša ya mahloko go: Tokollo “Magesh” Tshabalala (46), rammino, seopedi le mongwadi wa dikoša yoo ilego tuma ge yena mmogo le bagwera ba gagwe ba babedi ba thoma sehlopha sa bona sa mmino sa kwaito ka 1996 seo se bitšwago TKZee.

src_text: Adam Mthombeni esikhundleni sokuba ngu-DDG: Zetjhebiswano laboRhulumende kwa-DPWI.

Batho ka moka bao ba thwetšwego mešomong mangwalo bona dithuto tla tiišetšwa le go netefatšwa ka maleba..     Mohumagadi Zenkosi Dumile Mhlongo bjalo ka Motlatšamolaodimogophethiši (DDG): Dinyakišišo tša Pholisi le Melawana mo Kgorong ya Mešomo ya Setšhaba le Infrastraktšha (DPWI).

tgt_text: Ekonomi.

src_text: IKhabinethi ikuthokozele ukuphunguka kancani kwenani labantu abangasebenziko, abaphunguke nge-.
tgt_text: Kabinete amogela go ya fase gannyane ga palo ya batho bao ba sa šomego ka nageng, yeo ilego fase ka.

src_text: 6%, ukusukela ku-.
tgt_text: 6%, go tloga go.

src_text: 5 ekoteni yokuthoma yomnyaka bayokuba yi-.
tgt_text: 5% mo kotareng ya mathomo go ya go.

src_text: 9% ekoteni yesibili yomnyaka wee-.
tgt_text: 9% mo kotareng ya bobedi ya.

src_text: Iimbalobalo ezimenyezelwe liZiko leemBalobalo (i-StatsSA) zitjengisa ukuthi lapho imisebenzi ivuleke khona ngobunengi ukudlula kezinye iindawo kube seKorweni yemiSebenzi yomPhakathi (276 000), kezeRhwebo (169 000), kezeeMali (128 000) nemaGontrageni (104 000).
tgt_text: Dipalopalo tšeo di phatlaladitšwego ka Dinyakišišong tša Bašomi tša Kotara ye Nngwe le ye Nngwe ke Dipalopalo tša Afrika Borwa di bontšha gore mešomo ye mentši bile gona ka go Ditirelo tša Setšhaba le tša Leago (276 000), ka lekaleng la Kgwebo (169 000), la Ditšhelete (128 000) le lekaleng la Kago (104 000).

Palomoka ya batho bao ba thwetšwego eme go 15, 6 milione mo kotareng ya bobedi ya 2022, gomme palo ya batho bao ba sa šomego oketšegile ka batho ba 132 000 gomme ya fihla dimilione tše seswai mo kotareng ya bobedi ya 2022 ge go bapetšwa le kotara ya go feta.

src_text: Inani elipheleleko labantu abasebenzako belijame eengidini ezili-15,6 ngekota yesibili yee-2022, kwathi inani labantu abangasebenziko lakhuphuka ngee-132 000 layokuba zii-.
tgt_text: Dipoelo tše tša go kgahliša gape tša go kwagala di bontšha gore maitapišo ao kopanetšwego mmušo le badirišani ba wona ba leago go godiša ekonomi le go hlola mešomo yeo hlokegago thoma go tšweletša dipoelo tše dibotse.

src_text: 0 yeengidi ngekota yesibili yee-2022, nakulinganiswa nekota yaphambilini.
tgt_text: Se ke bohlatse bja gore ge ka moka re šoma mmogo ka go kopanya bokgoni bja rena, re ka fenya ditlhohlo tšeo di lebanego le ekonomi ya rena.
Kabinete kwešiša matshwenyego maAfrika Borwa ge ba palelwa ke go phela gabotse ka lebaka la bophelo bja go bitša tšhelete ye ntši le palo ya godimo ya go hloka mošomo.

src_text: Ukukhuphuka kancazana kodwana okukarisako kwaleziimbalobalo, kutjengisa ukuthi ithoma ukuthela iinthelo imizamo karhulumende nabasebenzisani bakhe bomphakathi yokuhlumisa umnotho bekwakhiwe nemisebenzi edingeke khulu.
tgt_text: Bjalo ka mmušo wo hlokomelago batho ba wona, re dula re tiile le go ikgafa go šoma mmogo le badirišani ba rena ba leago go aga bokamoso bjo bokaone bja yo mongwe le yo mongwe.
Mmušo dula ikgafile go thekga dikgwebo tša gae ka go reka dithoto le go šomiša ditirelo tša tšona.

src_text: Lobu-ke bufakazi bokuthi nasisebenzisana ngokubambisana soke ngokuhlanganisa amandlethu wokusebenza, singazinqoba iintjhijilo esiqalene nazo emnothweni welizwe lekhethu.
tgt_text: Infrastraktšha ya Setšhaba.
Kabinete kgala ka bogala go senywa ga infrastraktšha ke badudi ba Tongaat ka KwaZulu-Natal nakong ya megwanto ya go nyaka meetse.

src_text: IKhabinethi iyawuzwisisa umraro wokujanyelwa ziinhloko kwamaSewula Afrika lokhuya nakalinga ukuphila ipilwawo yangamalanga, ngenca yokudura kwezinto nokukhuphuka kwenani labantu abangasebenziko.
tgt_text: Kabinete ipeletša gore batho ba iše matswalo fase gape ba be le kgotlelelo ka ge mošomo tšwela pele go lokiša Tongaat Water Treatment Works..  Kabinete kwešiša matshwenyego badudi bao ba swanelago ke go šomiša ditanka tša meetse nako ye telele go tloga mola go bago le mafula pejana mo ngwageng wo.

src_text: Njengorhulumende otjhejako, solo sisazibophelele ngokusebenzisana neenhlangano zomphakathi ukwakha ingomuso elingcono kiwo woke umuntu.
tgt_text: Le ge go le bjalo, dikgaruru le tlhakahlakano ga se tharollo, gomme go senywa ga infrastraktšha ya setšhaba go kweša setšhaba seo se dulago moo bohloko.

src_text: Urhulumende solo uzibophelele ngokusekela amabhizinisi welizwe lekhethu ngokuthenga ipahla nezenzelwa ezenziwe khona lapha eSewula Afrika.
tgt_text: Molao wo Mpshafaditšwego wa Mananeo Mebasepala ya Mmušo wa Selegae wa.
Kabinete amogela go saenelwa go ba molao ga Molao wo Mpshafaditšwego wa Mananeo Mebasepala ya Mmušo wa Selegae, wa 2022 (Molao wa 3 wa 2022) ke Mopresidente Cyril Ramaphosa.

src_text: Umthangalasisekelo Womphakathi .
tgt_text: Maikemišetšo molao ke go kaonafatša bokgoni le maemo maitshwaro mmušo wa selegae.

src_text: IKhabinethi ikusolile ukugirizwa komthangalasisekelo ogirizwe zizakhamuzi zeThongathi KwaZulu-Natala lokhuya nazitjhagalela ukuthola amanzi.
tgt_text: Mmušo bopa karolo ya maitapišo go dira gore Tirelo ya Setšhaba be ya profešene le go kgonthiša go swarelela ga kabo ya ditirelo go batho, bjalo ka tokelo ya motheo yeo šireleditšwego ka go Molaotheo wa Repabliki ya Afrika Borwa wa..  Molao hlaloša ditshepetšo tšeo di swanetšwego go latelwa mo go thwaleng ga bahlankedi ba mmasepala maemong godimo.

src_text: IKhabinethi ikhombele izakhamuzi ukuthi zizincenge, zehlise ummoya, njengoba phela nakhu sewuthomile umsebenzi wokulungisa ubuTsengelo baManzi beThongathi.
tgt_text: Bjale ga sa dumela gore bahlenkedibagolo ba mmušo ba sware gape maemo godimo mo mekgatlong ya dipolotiki.

Se sengwe gape ke gore ge molao wo tsene tirišong, diposo tša bolaodi bja mmasepala tšeo di se tlatšwago di swanetše go kwalakwatšwa nageng ka bophara go goka batho ba bantši bao ba nago le maswanedi.

src_text: IKhabinethi iyakuzwisisa ukujanyelwa ziinhloko kwezakhamuzi ezikateleleke ukuthi zisebenzise iinlori ezithutha amanzi isikhathi eside, solo kwasahlela iinkhukhula phambilini nonyaka.
tgt_text: Kabinete tshepa gore diphetogo tše di tla kgonthiša gore bao ba thwetšwego goba ba kgethilwego mo maemong ba tla kgona go phethagatša ditshepišo tša bona gore re fihlelele bophelo bjo bobotse go batho ka moka.

src_text: Nokho-ke nanyana kunjalo, inturhu nokudungeka kwezinto akusizinto ezingaba sisombululo, kanti nokugirizwa komthangalasisekelo womphakathi kunomthelela omumbi phezu kwabantu bendawo le kwaphela.
tgt_text: Bosenyi.

Kabinete retile bahlenkedi ba metšhelo ba Tirelo ya Metšhelo ya Afrika Borwa ka go thopa seokobatši sa crystal meth seo ge se rekiša ka bago R236 milione mo Boemafofaneng bja Boditšhabatšhaba bja OR Tambo ka Lamorena, 28 Phato.

src_text: UmThetho Wee-2022 WamaTjhuguluko Wamahlelo WaboMasipala BeeNdawo  zemaKhaya   .
tgt_text: Go thopša ga seokobatši go tla romela temošo ye maatla go dihlopha tša basenyi gore matseno le matšo maemafofane rena šireleditšwe gabotse gomme bahlankedi ba rena ba šoma ka maatla go fediša bosenyi bofe goba bofe  Diphetho tša Kabinete.

src_text: IKhabinethi ikuthokozele ukutlikitlelwa emthethweni nguMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa ukutjhugululwa komThetho wee-2022 wamaHlelo waboMasipala (umThetho 3 wee-2022).
tgt_text: Pego ya Khansele ya Thuto ya Godimo (CHE) ya Nyakišišo ya Megolo ya Batlatšabakhanseliri ba Diyunibesithi le Baolaodibagolophethiši ka Afrika Borwa.

src_text: UmThetho lo unqophe ukwenza ngcono amandla wokusebenza newokuziphatha kwaborhulumende beendawo.
tgt_text: Kabinete tsebišitšwe ka dipoelo tša nyakišišo ya CHE yeo dumeletšwego ka 2020 ke Tona ya Thuto ya Godimo, Saense le Kaonafatšo, Ngaka Blade Nzimande, go lekola magato megolo le mekgwa ya go phela ya bahlenkediphethiši ba yunibesithi mo nakong ya mengwaga ye 15 go tloga ka 2005 go fihla ka..  Dinyakišišo be le tša go utolla go swarelela, kgonagalo le kaonafatšo ya diyunibesithi goba lekala la thuto ya godimo ka mo nageng.

src_text: Umthetho lo uyingcenye yemizamo karhulumende yokwenza  iKoro yabaSebenzi bemBusweni irage umsebenzi wayo ngekambiso yamakghonofundwa ibe iqinisekise ukuthi abantu bahlala benzelwa izenzelwa ekufanele benzelwe zona, njengelungelo elisisekelo elimumethwe mThethosisekelo weRiphabhligi yeSewula Afrika we-.
tgt_text: Pego ye akaretša dikutollo tša motheo gammogo le maele tukišo ao akantšwego.
Maele akanya, gare ga tše dingwe, tshepetšo ya ditefo ya go se khutiše selo yeo matlafaditšego.

src_text: UmThetho lo uhlathulula ikambiso ekumele ilandelwe nakuqatjhelwa iinkhundla eziphakemeko.
tgt_text: Go beakanya mokgatlo wa taolo wa ka ntle wa go ikema go lebelela tshepetšo ya go tšea sephetho sa megolo akanya gape go matlafatša mananeo tekolo ya phethagatšo mo diinstitušeneng.

src_text: Nje awusavumi ukuthi iimphathimandla zembusweni zeenkhundla eziphakemeko ziphathe neenkhundla eziphakemeko eenqhemeni zepolitiki.
tgt_text: Dinyakišišo di lebeletše gape bogolo bja go fapana bja diinstitušene gape dirile gape papetšo ya boditšhabatšhaba.

src_text: Okhunye, njengoba sekusebenza lomThetho nje, iinkhundla ezivulekileko zabaphathi babomasipala  kulindeleke ukuthi zikhangiswe elizweni loke kobanyana zizokudosa abafakiimbawo abafaneleko babe banengi ngokungakghonakalako.
tgt_text: Go letetšwe gore Tona ya Thuto ya Godimo, Saense le Kaonafatšo boledišane ka pego ye le boetapele bja yunibesithi bjalo ka magato go matlafatša diinstitušene tše tša thuto.
Pego tla re ka morago ya phatlalatšwa wepsaeteng ya Kgoro ya Thuto ya Godimo le Tlhahlo: www.dhet.gov.za.

src_text: IKhabinethi inesiqiniseko sokuthi amatjhuguluko la azakuqinisekisa ukuthi labo abazakuqatjhelwa iinkhundlezi bazakukghona ukugcina iinthembiso zabo kobanyana woke umuntu azokuphila ipilo engcono.
tgt_text: Phetošo ye Potlakišitšwego ya Bokgoni bja Dinyakišišo le Go ruta mo Lekaleng la Thuto ya Godimo.

Kabinete thekgile maele dinyakišišo tše pedi tšeo di dirilwego go eletša ka magato ao swanetšwego go tšewa go potlakiša go bokgoni bja phetošo ya dinyakišišo le go ruta mo diinstitušeneng tša thuto ya godimo.

src_text: Ubulelesi .
tgt_text: Pego ya mathomo dirilwe ke Sehlophatšhomo sa Ditona seo se nyakišišago mapheko ao thibelago kalatšo, go swarelela le tšwelopele ya dirutegi tša maAfrika Borwa bathobaso.

src_text: IKhabinethi ibuke iimphathimandla zeZiko eliButhelela umThelo leSewula Afrika (i-SARS) eziqalene nezomthelo wepahla ekuthengiselanwa ngayo namazwe wangaphandle ngokubamba isidakamizwa i-crystal meth ema-785 kg ebeyingathengiswa ngemali eziingidi ezima-R236, edoyelweni laboflayi i-OR Tambo International ngoSondo nakama-28 kuRhoboyi wee-.
tgt_text: Pego ya bobedi – yeo dirilwego ke Kgoro ya Saense le Kaonafatšo le Setheo sa Dinyakišišo sa Setšhaba – Mokgatlo wa Diyunibesithi wa Afrika Borwa, mokgatlo wo mogolo wa go emela diyunibesithi tše 26 ka mo nageng.

src_text: Ukubanjwa kwalesisidakamizwa kuzakuthumela umlayezo ozwakala kuhle eenqhemeni zehlanganyela yeenlelesi ukuthi siqinile isandla sevikeleko emasangweni wokungena nokuphuma elizweni lekhethu, nokuthi iimphathimandla zelizwe lekhethu zisebenza ngokukhuthala ukucitha nanyana kungaba ngebamhlobobani ubulelesi      Iinqunto Zekhabinethi.
tgt_text: Dipego tše ka moka di akanya mekgwa ya go tsena gare go potlakiša phetogo mo dikarolong tše dikgolo tše hlano lego tatelano ya dialogadigolwane; go kgatha tema ga bašomi; setšo le tirišo ya institušene; pholisi le mekgwa, le methopo ye mennyane.

src_text: Umbiko Wephenyo Womkhandlu Wezefundo Ephakemeko (i-CHE) Ngomrholo Wama-Vice Chancellor Kunye Neenkhulu Eziphethe Iinkhundla Eziphakemeko ESewula Afrika                                                                                                                                .
tgt_text: Tumelelano ya Boditšhabatšhaba ka ga Methopo ya Leabela la Dimela tša Dijo le Temo (Tumelelano).

src_text: IKhabinethi ibikelwe ngomphumela wephenyo le-CHE elatlanywa nguNgqongqotjhe wezeFundo ePhakemeko, zeSayensi nezaMandla wokuSungula uDorh.
tgt_text: Kabinete dumeletše go išwa ga Tumelelano ya Palamente gore hwetšagale.

src_text: Blade Nzimande ngomnyaka wee-2020, kobanyana kuphenywe ngezinga lemirholo yeenkhulu eziphethe amayunivesithi esikhathini seminyaka eli-15 ukusukela ngomnyaka wee-2005 ukuyokufika kowee-.
tgt_text: Se se tla kgontšha Afrika Borwa go ba karolo ya mekgatlo ya Tumelelano, yeo hlahlago maloko dinaga go šireletša le go kgonthiša tšhomišo ya go swarelela ya methopo ya leabela la dimela tša dijo le temo.
Go fihlelela Tumelelano ye go tla matlafatša boikgafo bja naga mo go bolokeng le go swareleleng tšhomišo ya methopo ya leabela la dimela, le go fa thekgo go ditšhaba tša magaeng.

src_text: Umnqopho wephenyweli kuthola ukuthi amayunivesithi namkha ikoro yefundo ephakemeko elizweni lekhethu anobubambelelo obungangani, akghona kangangani ukwenza izinto ekufanele azenze nokuthi athuthuka kangangani.
tgt_text: Tlhako ya Phetogo ye Botse ya Afrika Borwa.

src_text: Umbiko lo uveza amaphuzu aqakathekileko walokho okutholwe nabekuphenywa, okuphekelelwa ziimphakamiso zokuthi kungenziwani ukulungisa lapho kunetlhayelo khona.
tgt_text: Kabinete dumeletše gore Tlhako ya Phetogo ye Botse ya Afrika Borwa phethagatšwe.
Tlhako tšweletša pono ya go abelana ya Afrika Borwa ya go kwagala, ya klaemete ye maatla hlaloša melao le dikarolo tša pholisi go fihlelela se.

src_text: Hlangana nokhunye okuphakanyiswako, kuphakanyiswa nokuthi kuqiniswe iindlela zokurhola, nehlelo lemirholo libe yinto eyenzelwa emkhanyweni.
tgt_text: Tlhako ya phetogo tla huetša mang le mang ka Afrika Borwa, gomme ya fa sebaka sa go šogana le go se lekalekane ga kgale le go hlola ekonomi ye holago batho ka moka.

src_text: Ukusungulwa kwesijamiso sangaphandle esizijameleko esizakwengamela ihlelo lokuthathwa kweenqunto zemirholo.
tgt_text: Khomišene ya Klaemete ya Mopresidente dirile mokgwa wa poledišano wo mogolo le badirišani ba leago gomme ya amogela thekgo ye kgolo ya tlhako.

src_text: Kuphakanyiswa godu nokuqiniswa kwamahlelo wokuhlunga amazinga wokusebenza kilamaziko wezefundo ephakemeko.
tgt_text: Kabinete kgonthišitše gore phetogo go tloga go ekonomi ye se nago khapone ka 2050 swanetše go thekga maikemišetšo tlhabollo ya setšhaba, go akaretša mešomo ye mekaone go batho ka moka, kakaretšo ya leago le go fedišwa ga bohloki.

src_text: Iphenyweli godu liqalelele nobukhulu obuhlukahlukako bamaziko wezefundo la, godu  lalinganisa nangamazinga wamazwe ngamazwe.
tgt_text: Kabinete ipiletša go badirišani ka moka ba leago go thekga le go amogela tlhako ye.
Leano la phethagatšo leo le tletšego la tlhako le tla dirwa, gomme le tla kopanywa le peakanyo ya mmušo le lenaneo la tekanyetšo.

src_text: UNgqongqotjhe wezeFundo ePhakemeko, zeSayensi nezaMandla wokuSungula kulindeleke bona abonisane nabarholi bamayunivesithi njengegadango lokuqinisa leziinjamiso zefundo.
tgt_text: Karata ya Laesense ya go Otlela ye Mpsha ya Afrika Borwa.

src_text: Ngalokho-ke umbiko lo uzakumenyezelwa kubunzinzolwazi bomNyango wezeFundo nokuThwasisa: www.dhet.gov.za.
tgt_text: Kabinete dumeletše gore Karata ya Laesense ya go Otlela ya gonabjale tšeelwe legato ke ye mpsha ya go ba le dibopego tša go bolokega kudu.
Karata ye šomišwago gonabjale thomile go šomišwa go tloga ka.

src_text: ITjhuguluko Elikhanjiswa Msinyana Lephenyo Nekghono Lokufundisa Ekorweni Yezefundo Ephakemeko     .
tgt_text: Theknolotši fetogile gomme go bitša tšhelete ye ntši go hlokomela dikarata tše.

src_text: IKhabinethi iyazisekela iimphakamiso zamaphenyo amabili la athunywe ukuphakamisa amagadango angasetjenziswa kobanyana azokukhambisa msinyana umsebenzi wokwenza amatjhuguluko werhubhululo namandla wokufundisa emaziko wefundo ephakemeko.
tgt_text: Karata ye mpsha ye tla šomišwago tla dira gore laesense ya naga ya rena ya go otlela sepelelane le Theknolotši ya Boditšhaba ya go Obamela Tshedimošo ya Boitsebišo bja Motho mo Laesenseng ya go Otlela (ISO18013).
Pholisi ya Lenaneo la Mešomo ya Setšhaba ye Katološitšwego (EPWP).

src_text: Umbiko wokuthoma uhlanganiswe siQhema somSebenzi saboNgqongqotjhe ebesiphenya ngezinto ebeziliya ukuqatjhwa, nokuhlala kunye nokuthuthuka kweemfundiswa zabantu abanzima eSewula Afrika.
tgt_text: Kabinete dumeletše go phatlalatšwa ka kuranteng ya setšhaba Pholisi ya EPWP ye akantšwego gore setšhaba se swayeswaye.

src_text: Umbiko wesibili ¬–   olayelwe mNyango wezeSayensi nezaMandla wokuSungula kunye nehlangano yezerhubhululo i-National Research Foundation – uhlanganiswe yiYunivesithi yeSewula Afrika (i-UNISA), eyona yengamele nejamele  amayunivesithi womphakathi ama-26 welizwe lekhethu.
tgt_text: EPWP ke ye nngwe ya mananeo motheo mmušo ao maikemišetšo lego go fa kimollo go bohloki le letseno ka go hlola dibaka tša mešomo ya nakwana, kudu go bafsa le basadi.

Pholisi ye mpsha ye akantšwego tla matlafatša lenaneo gomme ya hlaloša dikarolo tša go swana le megolo, mmotlolo wa thekgo ya ditšhelete le tšhireletšo ya leago, ya nyalantšha EPWP le ditirišo tša mešomo tše diswa tla godiša ditirišano gare ga mmušo le lekala la praebete mo go kgonthišeng gore EPWP kgatha tema kudu mo go hloleng mešomo ya seriti le go fokotša bohloki.

src_text: Yomibili imibiko le iphakamisa iindlela ezingasetjenziswa ukukhambisa amatjhuguluko msinyana emakorweni amahlanu angamakhulu, weemfundo ezitholakala ngemva kweziqu zokuthoma zeyunivesithi; ukuhlanganyela kwabasebenzi bemayunivesithi; isiko nejayelo yamaziko wezefundo;  umthethokambiso namahlelo wokwenza izinto, kunye nemithombo yamandla elinganiselweko nofana eyimbijana.
tgt_text: Pholisi tla godiša gape kaonafatšo mo go phethagatšeng ga mananeo mešomo ya setšhaba go phatlalala le naga.
Dimpshafatšo tša Mohlwaela wa Khoine ya Desimale ya Bone ya Afrika Borwa.

src_text: Isivumelwano Samazwe Ngamazwe Ngemithombo Yamandla Yeentjalo Zendabuko Ekugomeni Nakezokulima (isiVumelwano).
tgt_text: Kabinete dumeletše sebopego, moakanyetšo le kgoboketšo ya Mohlwaela wa Khoine ya Desimale ya Bone ya Afrika Borwa dumeletše lenaneo la go šielana la ngwaga le ngwaga la tšhomišo ya dipolelo tša semmušo mo go mohlwaela wa khoine ya desimale ya bone.

src_text: IKhabinethi ivumele ukudluliselwa kwesiVumelwano ePalamende kobanyana iyosiqinisa.
tgt_text: Lentšu “Afrika Borwa” le tla tsenywa ka lehlakoreng le lengwe la dikhoine gomme la gatišwa ka dipolelo ka moka tša semmušo.

src_text: Lokhu-ke kuzakwenza iSewula Afrika ibe yingcenye yeenqhema zalesisiVumelwano, sona esibonisa amazwe amalunga ngokulondwa nokuqinisekiswa kokubabalelwa kokusetjenziswa kwemithombo yamandla yeentjalo zendabuko ekugomeni nakezokulima.
tgt_text: Dipolelo tše tharo di tla šomišwa go khoine ya R5; dipolelo tše pedi go dikhoine tša R2; 50c, 20c le 10c gomme R1 tla ba ka polelo tee.
Dipolelo tše ka moka di tla šomišwa ka go šielana mo mengwageng ye.

src_text: Ukuqiniswa kwalesisiVumelwano kuzakubuye kuqinise namandla welizwe lekhethu wokuzibophelela ekulondeni nekubabaleleni ukusetjenziswa kwemithombo yamandla yeentjalo zemvelo, kusekelwe nabantu beendawo zemakhaya.
tgt_text: Pholisi ya 2022 ye Kopantšwego ya Taolo ya Boleng bja Meetse ye Akanywago.
Kabinete dumeletše go phatlalatšwa ka kuranteng ya mmušo ga Pholisi ya IWQM ye Akanywago gore setšhaba se swayeswaye.

src_text: Umtlamo Olungileko Wokweyamela Ematjhugulukweni ESewula Afrika    .
tgt_text: Pholisi ye akantšwego tla ema legato la Pholisi ya WQM ya kgale ya 1991 le mokgwa wa yona wo beakantšwego ka..  Pholisi hlaloša sehlopha sa melao yeo dirago motheo wa taolo ya boleng bja meetse sepelelana le melao ka moka ye lebanego le meetse le maikgafo ka moka lefase naga go maemo le pabalelo ya meetse bjalo ka mothopo wo hlokegago.

src_text: IKhabinethi ivumele ukuphunyeleliswa komTlamo oLungileko wokweYamela emaTjhugulukweni.
tgt_text: Pholisi ya Mehuta ya Boipoeletšo bja Radio ya Moloko wa go Latela ye Akanywago.

src_text: Umtlamo lo uza nenembombono ekuvunyelanwa ngayo, elungileko, yeSewula Afrika elungele ukujamelana nanyana yitlayimethi enjani.
tgt_text: Kabinete amogetše go phatlalatšwa ga Pholisi ya Mehuta ya Boipoeletšo bja Radio ya Moloko wa go Latela ye Akanywago gore setšhaba se swayeswaye.

src_text: Uhlathulula ikambisolawulo nomthethokambiso wokuphumelelisa lokhu.
tgt_text: Boipoeletšo bja Radio ke mothopo wa tlhago wo monnyane woo lego bohlokwa go kgolo ya ekonomi ya titšitale ya Afrika Borwa le infrastraktšha ya kgokagano.

src_text: Umtlamo wokweyamela ematjhugulukweni lo uzakuthinta woke umuntu eSewula Afrika, kanti unjalo nje godu uvula nethuba lokulungisa okwakungakalungi kusukela eminyakeni eyadlulako, ube wakhe nomnotho ozakuhlomulisa boke abantu.
tgt_text: Pholisi ye akantšwego ikemišeditše go thekga go abelwa ga mehuta ya  dilaesense tša go fihlelela megala ya go thetha ya go se šute, dilaesense tša kgašo, tša mananeokgoparara dikgokagano tša difofane le tša dikepe; tša dinyakišišo le tlhabollo; tša mananeokgoparara go šomišwa ke setšhaba, le diintasteri tše dingwe tša maleba.
Pholisi nyaka gape go godiša tekatekano le kabo ya go kwagala go kgatha tema mo phetošong ya lekala le phihlelelo ya kgokagano ya titšitale le mo go dikarolo tša kgole tša naga.

src_text: IKomitjhini yobeNgameli ngezeTlayimethi ikhe yaphuma ijima elinabileko lokubonisana nababelani, yathola isekelo elikhulu ngomtlamo lo.
tgt_text: Kgopelo ya Afrika Borwa ya Khansele ya Mokgatlo wa Kgokagano ya Boditšhabatšhaba (ITU) le Boto ya Melawana ya Radio.

src_text: IKhabinethi ifakazele ukuthi ukweyamela ehlelweni elizakwenza ukuthi ilizwe lekhethu libe selinganammoya osilaphazekileko ngomnyaka wee-2050, kufuze kusekele iinrhuluphelo zetuthuko yelizwe loke, sekubalwa nemisebenzi ehloniphekileko kibo boke abantu, ukuqalelelwa kwabantu boke kunye nokurarhwa kobuchaka nomtlhago wabo.
tgt_text: Kabinete dumeletše kgopelo ya Morena Mandla Samuel Mchunu go Boto ya Melawana ya Radio ya ITU (Selete sa .

Morena Mchunu gonabjale ke leloko la boto akanyeditšwe go kgethwa gape mo Khanseleng ya ITU go kotara ya 2023 go fihla ka..  Dikgetho di tla swarwa nakong ya Khonferense ya Baemedi ba ITU yeo tla swarwago Bucharest, Romania go tloga ka la 26 Lewedi go fihla ka la 14 Diphalane.

src_text: IKhabinethi ikhombele boke ababelani bomphakathi ukuthi basingathe bebasekele umtlamo lo.
tgt_text: Afrika Borwa dula ikgafile go dinepo le maikemišetšo ITU go kgokaganya karoganyo ya titšitale le go kgokaganya batho ka moka ba lefase  Ditiragalo tše di Tlago.

src_text: Kuzokuhlanganiswa ihlelo eliphelele ngemininingwana lokuphumelelisa umtlamo lo, kanti-ke lizakuthi lingatlanywa bese lihlanganiswa nehlelo likarhulumende lokulungiselela izinto nokuhlelela iimali..     Ikarada Lelayisense Yokutjhayela Elitjha ESewula Afrika   .
tgt_text: Kgwedi ya Bohwa.

src_text: IKhabinethi ikuvumele ukujanyiselelwa kweKarada leLayisense yokuTjhayela esetjenziswa njenganje, ijanyiselelwe ngekarda eliphephe ngcono.
tgt_text: Kgwedi ya Bohwa ya Lewedi ngwaga wo tla ketekwa ka fase ga morero: “Go keteka Bohwa bja Solomon Linda le Mmino wa Setšo wa Afrika Borwa”.
Kabinete hlohleletša maAfrika Borwa ka moka go šomiša Kgwedi ya Bohwa go keteka bohwa bja rena bja setšo bja go huma le phapano yeo nago le maatla go kopanya setšhaba.

src_text: Ihlelo ekusebenza ngalo ilayisense yekarada yanje solo lathoma ukusebenza ngomnyaka we-.
tgt_text: Ka moka re swanetše go ikgafa go šoma mmogo go fediša dikarologanyo le go hloka toka ga nako ya go feta le go godiša temogo ya go ikgantšha ka go ba maAfrika Borwa  Melaetša.

src_text: Ikarada elitjha ekuphakanyiswa ukuthi kujanyiselelwe ngalweli lizakwenza ilayisense yokutjhayela yekhethwapha ikhambisane nechwephetjhe lethekhnoloji yamazwe ngamazwe, i-International Information Technology Personal Identification Compliant Driving Licence (i-ISO18013).
tgt_text: DitebogišoKabinete lebogiša le go lakaletša tše dibotse go:Bathopasefoka ka moka, bathopa dimetale le baphadišani bao ba kgathilego tema mo Lebelong la Comrades, leo le tsebegago bjalo ka “Lebelo la Batho la go Phala ka Moka, ka Lamorena, 28 Phato.

Lebelo la banna le thopilwe ke Tete Dijane (Diiri tše 5, metsotso ye 30, metsotswana ye 38) go tšwa Mahikeng ka Leboa Bodikela mola mokitimi wa Russia Alexandra Morozova thopile lebelo la basadi (Diiri tše 6, metsotso ye 17, metsotswana ye 47).

src_text: Umthethokambiso Wehlelo Elinabileko Lemisebenzi Yomphakathi (i-EPWP).
tgt_text: MahlokoKabinete romela melaetša ya mahloko go:Mama Rita Alice Ndzanga (88), molwelatokologo wa kgale yoo bego le moamogedi wa Sefoka sa Setšhaba sa Luthile ka 2004 ka “go kgatha tema ga gagwe mo go lweleng tokologo ya ditokelo tša bašomi le temogo go go se kgetholle ka mmala, ka bong, le Afrika Borwa ye lokologilego ya toka”.Bahlenkedi ba Ditirelo tša Maphodisa Afrika Borwa (SAPS) ba bahlano bao bego le banamedi ba sefofane sa SAPS seo se welego Boemafofaneng bja Rand, Germiston ka Labobedi, 30 Phato.

src_text: IKhabinethi ivumele ukugazedwa komtlamo womThethokambiso we-EPWP kobanyana kuyokubonisanwa ngawo nomphakathi.
tgt_text: SAPS nyakišiša seo se hlotšego go wa ga sona.

src_text: I-EPWP ingelinye lamahlelo karhulumende aqakathekileko anqophe ukuphungula ubuchaka asize nangengeniso yemali ebantwini abadingileko, ngokwakha amathuba wemisebenzi wesikhatjhana, khulu khulu elutjheni nebantwini abasikazi.
tgt_text: Kabinete lakaletša mofofiši yoo gobetšego kudu gore fole ka pela  Bao ba Thwetšwego Mešomong.

Batho ka moka bao ba thwetšwego mešomong mangwalo bona dithuto tla tiišetšwa le go netefatšwa ka maleba  Mohumagadi Gugulethu Abigail Thimane bjalo ka Motlatšamolaodimogophethiši (DDG):Tekolo ya Lekala la Mmušo le Tlhabollo ya Bokgoni ka go Kgoro ya Peakanyo, Tekodišišo le Tshekatsheko ya Phethagatšo ya Mošomo  Mohumagadi Kwena Komape bjalo ka DDG: Tlhabollo ya Ekonomi, Kgwebo le Papatšo ka go Kgoro ya Temo, Peakanyoleswa ya Naga le Tlhabollo ya Dinagamagae  Ngaka Bongani Elias Sithole bjalo ka DDG: Senthara ya Taolo ya Masetlapelo Setšhaba mo Kgorong ya Pušotirišano.

src_text: Zamandla.
tgt_text: Mohlagase.

src_text: Ikhabinethi ibikelwe nguNgqongqotjhe womNyango wezamaBubulo kaRhulumende u- Pravin Gordhan ngekghono le-Eskom lokukhandela ukucinywa-cinywa kwegezi kwenzelwa ukuyonga begodu ifumene umbiko weKomidi eTjheja ubuJamo obuQokamileko beGezi eliZweniloke.
tgt_text: Tona ya Dikgwebo tša Mmušo Pravin Gordhana begetše kabinete ka bokgoni bja Eskom bja go fokotša go kgaotšwa ga mohlagase ga nako le nako gape filwe pego ya seo se šetšwego se dirilwe go tšwa Komiting ya Semmušo ya Komiti ya Mathata Mohlagase ya Setšhaba.
Go tla dirwa ditsebišo tše dingwe go latela go phethwa ga dipoledišano tša go tsenelela tša dipego tše.

src_text: Ezinye iimmemezelo zikokwethulwa ngemva kokubanjwa kwemikhulumiswano engeneneleko yokuqalisisa imibiko le.
tgt_text: Kabinete tšweleditše manyami ka tšhitišo le mathata ao hlolwago ke go kgaolwa ga mohlagase go dikgwebo le magae, kudu di direga ka nako yeo mmušo swaraganego le ditsenogare tšeo di tsebišitšwego ke Mopresidente Cyril Ramaphosa ka Mosegamanye.

src_text: Ikhabinethi iveze ukudana kwayo ngokuphazamiseka nokugugunywa kucinywa cinywa kwegezi okuthikameza amabhizinisi namakhaya, khulukhulu ukucinywokhu nakwenzeka lokha urhulumende nakalukana namano wokungenelela amenyezelwa nguMengameli u-Cyril Ramaphosa ngoVelabahlinze wee-.
tgt_text: Peeletšo.

Kabinete amogela go thakgolwa ga Lefelo le lefsa la Tšweletšo la Sandvik Khomanani ka Kempton Park, leo bego le karolo ya peeletšo ya R350 milione yeo tshepišitšwego mo Khonferenseng ya bone ya Dipeeletšo ya Afrika Borwa (SAIC) yeo bego swerwe Senthareng ya Dikopano ya Sandton ka Johannesburg ka la 24 Hlakola..  Mothopo wo mofsa wa dikwere metara tše 62 000 kopanya ditshepetšo tšeo di thomilwego pele mo mafelong go fapana mahlano gomme di akaretša bašomi bao ka bago ba.

src_text: Zamasiso .
tgt_text: Ke ye nngwe ya methopo ye megolo go feta ka moka ya Sandvik gape ya maemo godimo lefaseng ka moka, gomme na le bokgoni bja go tšweletša metšhene ya go laiša ya ka fase ga mabu ya go ba le ditšweletšwa tša Afrika Borwa tša 60%.

src_text: Ikhabinethi yemukele ukuhlonywa kwesiKhungo sokuKhiqiza i-Sandvik Khomanani e-Kempton Park esingesitjha esaba yingcenye yesithembiso samasiso aziinGidi ezima-R350 esenziwa kuKhomferensi yesiNe yamaSiso yeSewula Afrika (i-SAIC) egade ibanjelwe e-Sandton Convention Centre eJwanasbhege mhla ama- 24 kuNtaka wee-..     Isikhungo esitjhesi esiziinkwere zamamitha azii-62 000 sihlanganisa imisebenzi egade ngaphambilini ebeyenziwa eendaweni ezihlanu ezihlukeneko begodu simumethe abasebenzi ababalelwa ema-.
tgt_text: Kabinete amogela gape ketelo ya tekolo ya Mopresidente Ramaphosa ka KwaZulu-Natal nakong ya thakgolo ya mothopo wa tšweletšo wa Hesto Harnesses ka Stanger, KwaDukuza ka la 13 Lewedi.

src_text: Lesi singesinye seenkhungo zakwa-Sandvik ezikulu nezithuthuke khulu ephasini zombelele begodu sikghona ukukhiqiza imitjhini/abomakalanyana bokulayitjha emathunjini wephasi abakhandwe ngeengcenye zeensimbi ezenza ama-60% zeSewula Afrika..     IKhabinethi ilemukele nevakatjho likaMengameli u-Ramaphosa lokuyokuHlola KwaZulu-Natala nagade kuhlonywa isikhungo sokukhiqiza i-Hesto Harnessese e-Stanger, KwaDukuza mhla ali-13 kuKhukhulamungu wee-.
tgt_text: Mothopo wo ke wo mongwe wa diprotšeke tša dipeeletšo tša tšhelete tše hlano tšeo di dirago karolo ya boikgafo bja  4 bilione bja Metair Investments Limited go thekga katološo le go dira Ford Ranger ye mpsha ya gae.

src_text: Isikhungwesi sihlangana nezinye ezihlanu zamaphrojekthi ayingcenye wokusisa ayingcenye yesithembiso samaBhiliyoni ali-R. 4 esenziwe yikhampani i-Metair Investments Limited ukusekela umsebenzi wokunatjiswa nokukhuliswa komkhiqizo womhlobo omutjha we-Ford Ranger elizweni lekhethu.
tgt_text: Mopresidente tsenetše gape go bulwa ga mpshafatšo le katološo ya protšeke ya Sappi Saiccor Mill ye bitšago R7,7 bilione ka Umkomaas, yeo maikemišetšo yona lego go godiša bokgoni le katlego ya lefase ya khamphani mola ka go le lengwe hlola dibaka tša mošomo tša nako ye kopana le nako ye telele.

src_text: UMengameli ubuye wahlangela  ukuvulwa kwephrojekthi evuselelweko nenatjisiweko  i-Sappi Saiccor Mill ebize  amaBhiliyoni ali-R7,7 eMkhomazi, ekunqotjhwe ngayo ukwandisa ikghono lekhampani lokuphalisana ephasiniloke ngokunjalo kuvuleke namathuba womsebenzi wesikhatjhana newesikhathi eside..     Amasiso la ayingcenye yeenthembiso ezenziwa bosomabubulo kukhomferensi ye- SAIC.
tgt_text: Dipeeletšo tše di dira karolo ya maikano ao dirilwego ke boraintasteri mo SAIC.

src_text: Amasiso amatjha ngelizweni lekhethu asiza ekwakhiweni kabutjha nekuvuseleleni umnotho weKhethu godu amasiso la abeka iSewula Afrika ebujameni bokukarekelwa ngamanye amazwe ayibone ililizwe lapho kungasiswa khona.
tgt_text: Peeletšo ye nngwe le ye nngwe ye mpsha ka nageng ya rena thuša go kagolefsa le kaonafatšo ya ekonomi ya rena, gomme tšwela pele go akaretša Afrika Borwa bjalo ka nepo ya peeletšo ya kgetho.

src_text: Ukuthuthukiswa Komthangalasisekelo.
tgt_text: Tlhabollo ya infrastraktšha.

src_text: IKhabinethi yemukele ukuvulwa kwengcenye etja yendlela i-Musina Ring Road e-Limpopo ezokwenza kukhambeke lula ngaphakathi kwedrobha ye-Musina begodu ngokuvumela ukwanda kwerhwebo nokwabelana ngezomnotho hlangana neSewula Afrika neHlangano eThuthukisa amaZwe angeSewula ye-Afrika.
tgt_text: Kabinete amogela go bulwa ga karolo ye mpsha ya Tsela ya Manyokenyoke ya Musina ka Limpopo yeo tla dirago gore go be bonolo go batho go sepela ka Musina, gomme ya dumelela gape mešongwana ya kgwebo le ekonomi gare ga Afrika Borwa le dinaga tša Ditšhaba tša Tlhabollo tša Borwa bja Afrika.

src_text: Iphrojekthi le ebize iinGidi ezima-R640 ivulele abantu bekhethu imisebenzi yasafuthi engaphezulu kwama-275 yanikela nangamathuba emiphakathini yendawo le kunye namabhizinisi asakhasako (ama-SMME)..     Ukwakhiwa kwendlela i-Musina Ring Road kuyingcenye yehlelo likarhulumende lokuthuthukisa umthangalasisekelo, ngokusebenzisa iHlelo lokwAkha nokuVuselela umNotho (i-ERRP), kunqotjhwe ukukhulisa umnotho ohlanganyelweko namathuba wemisebenzi emikhakheni yoke nemiphakathini ehlukahlukeneko.
tgt_text: Protšeke ya R640 milione hlotše mešomo ye 275 ya go ya go ile ya batho ba gae gomme ya aba dibaka go ditšhaba tša gae le dikgwebo tše dinnyane le tše dikgolo gammogo le dikgwebopotlana (di-SMME).

src_text: Ihlekelele ye-Jagersfontein.
tgt_text: Go agwa ga Tsela ya Manyokenyoke ya Musina ke karolo ya lenaneo la infrastraktšha ya mmušo, ka ERRP, yeo nyakago go hlola kgolo ya kakaretšo le dibaka tša mešomo go phatlalala le makala le ditšhaba.

src_text: 1     Ikhabinethi ibalilela imbiko beyiyaduduza emindenini yalabo abahlongakele ngemva kokugirika kwamaboda wedamu lekhucukhucu yemikhiqizo yemayini ese-Jagersfontein eFreyistata lapha kwadaleka iinkhukhula zedaka ezadala umonakalo ngokuphuma kwelanga ngoSondo nakali-11 kuKhukhulamungu wee-.
tgt_text: Masetlapelo Jagersfontein.

src_text: Ihlekelele le yone khulu umthangalasisekelo, ipahla yabantu eziinkoloyi neenkumba ezithileko.. 2     Ngesikhathi nakavakatjhele indawo yehlekelele ngoMvulo, mhla ali-12 kuKhukhulamungu wee-2022, uMengameli u-Ramaphosa uthokoze imizamo eyenziweko ukuhlenga ipilo nokufunyanwa kwabongazimbi endaweni leya.
tgt_text: Kabinete rometše melaetša ya mahloko go malapa bao ba lahlegetšwego ke maphelo bona ka morago ga tirigalo ya masetlapelo ya go palega le go tšhologa ga leraga mo moepong wa selegae wo tlogetšwego sa šome ka Jagersfontein ka Freistata mo maseng Lamorena, 11 Lewedi.

src_text: Wathembisa ukuthi urhulumende uzokunikela abahlali abathintekileko be-Jagersfontein ngesekelo elifaneleko.
tgt_text: Masetlapelo tlogetše gape infrastraktšha ya selegae, dithoto tša batho tša go swana le dikoloi le magae mmalwa senyegile kudu.

src_text: Ikhabinethi ikhuthazekile ngokuthi abanikazi bemayini bathe bajame ngomumo ekunikeleni ngesizo lecwephetjhe nokusekela lokha nakungenzeka umKhandlu wezeNjiwa weSewula Afrika ubakhombele.
tgt_text: Nakong ya ketelo ya gagwe mo lefelong la masetlapelo ka Mošupologo, 12 Lewedi 2022, Mopresidente Ramaphosa lebogile maitapišo go phološa le go hwetša batho le dithoto ao dirilwego mo lefelong la masetlapelo ikanne gape gore mmušo tla fa thekgo yeo hlokegago go badudi bao ba amegilego ba Jagersfontein.

src_text: 3    Ibubulo lezeemayini lihlala limfakisandla oqakathekileko emnothweni ngemisebenzi enqophileko nengakanqophi, inzuzo ethunyelwa ngaphandle kwemikhawulo, namasiso wamazwe wangaphandle anqophileko godu lilima indima eqakathekileko ekwenzeni ngcono ipilo yemiphakathi emagega neemayini.
tgt_text: Kabinete hlohleletšwa ke gore beng ba moepo ba re ba ikemišeditše go aba thušo ye hlokegago le thekgo go mmušo ge ka kgopelwa ke Khansele ya Diminirale ya Afrika Borwa.

src_text: 4    Urhulumende neenhlangano ezingasebenzeli ukwenza inzuzo zingenelele msinyana ngokunikela iindawo zokufihla ihloko kwesikhatjhana, ukwelulekwa ngokomkhumbulo neendingoqangi eziziingubo, abomatrasi neemphuthelwana zokugoma.
tgt_text: Intasteri ya meepo dula le mothekgi yo bohlokwa wa ekonomi ka go thwala thwii goba go se thwale thwii, megolo ya kišontle, le peeletšo ya thwii ya dinaga tša ka ntle, gomme kgatha tema ye bohlokwa mo go kaonafatšeng maphelo ditšhaba tša meepong.

src_text: Ukuphakelwa kwamanzi nokusatjalaliswa kwegezi sekubuyiselwe esigeni.
tgt_text: Mmušo le mekgatlo ye mengwe yeo sego ya mmušo ba tsene ka bogare ka bjako ka go fa batho bao ba amegilego madulo nakwana tšhoganetšo, thobamatswalo ya kgatelelo ya monagano le letšhogo le dilo tšeo di hlokegago go swana le mapai, materase le diphuthelwana tša dijo.
Kabo ya meetse le mohlagase mo lefelong bušeditšwe sekeng.

src_text: 5    Nasele kuhlwengiswe icabazi lehlekelele, abosonjiniyera balindeleke bona bayokuhlola umonakalo owenzekileko nokuphepha kweenkumba.
tgt_text: Go letetšwe gore dientšenere di dire tekolo ya dibopego tša dintlo, ge lefelo la masetlapelo le hlwekišitšwe.

src_text: IKhabinethi ithokoze besizo elirhabako, iinhlangano zomphakathi namalunga womphakathi ngeminikelo nesizo labo.
tgt_text: Kabinete leboga ditirelo tša tšhoganetšo, mekgatlo ya setšhaba ya segae le maloko setšhaba ka tema yeo ba kgathilego ye kgolo le thušo yeo ba filego batšwasehlabelo.

src_text: Zomnotho .
tgt_text: Ekonomi.

src_text: IKhabinethi ikhulumisene ngobujamo bomnotho welizwe ngemva kweembalobalo zamhlapha ezikhutjhwe LiZiko leemBalobalo leSewula Afrika (i-Stats SA)   ezitjengisa ukuthi iNgeniso yangeKhaya ePheleleko (i-GDP) kukota yesibili emnyakeni wee-2022 yehle nge-0,7%.
tgt_text: Kabinete tšweleditše maemo ekonomi ka nageng ka morago ga ge dipalolopalo tša kgauswanyane tša Kgoro ya Dipalopalo ya Afrika Borwa (Stats SA) di bontšha gore palomoka ya tšweletšo ya gae (GDP) ya kotara ya bobedi ya 2022 fokotšegile ka 0,7%.

src_text: Abonobangela bokwehlokhu bafaka hlangana ukucinywacinywa kwegezi kwenzelelwa ukuyonga, ipi ehlangana kwe-Russia ne-Ukraine nezinga lepilo elikhuphukileko kunye nentengotjhuguluko.
tgt_text: Dilo tšeo di hueditšego phokotšego ye di akareditše kgaotšo ya mohlagase, ntwa ya Russia le Ukraine, le maemo go phela go bitša tšhelete ye ntši le inflešene.

src_text: Amagadango athethweko ngaphasi kwe-ERRP adambise umthelela omumbi obewulethwa miraro yomnotho yamazwe wangaphetjheya, avikela godu imisebenzi neendlela zokuziphilisa zabantu.
tgt_text: Ditsenogare tšeo di dirilwego ke Leano la Kaonafatšo le Kagolefsa ya Ekonomi (ERRP) di fokoditše kudu naga go dikhuetšo tša boditšhabatšhaba, gape tša šireletša mešomo le letseno.

src_text: Ukungenelela kukarhulumende kuthoma ukuba nemiphumela emihle njengokutjho kwemiphumela yeHlolo yezomSebenzi yaQobe Kota ekhutjhwe yi-StatsSA etjengise ukuthi kwavulwa imisebezi engaphezu kweenkulungwana ezima-648 hlangana kwekota yokuthoma neyesibili yomnyaka wee-     IinQunto zeKhabinethi.
tgt_text: Ditsenogare tše maatla tša ekonomi tša mmušo di thoma go tšweletša dipoelo tše dibotse, bjale ka ge go hlatsetšwe ka go dipoelo tša Dinyakišišo tša Bašomi tša Kotara ye nngwe le ye nngwe tša Stats SA, tšeo di bontšhitšego gore go bile le mešomo ye 648 000 mo kotareng ya mathomo le ya bobedi tša  Diphetho tša Kabinete.

src_text: Umtlamo wokuTjheja nokuHlunga (i-M&E) umThethomgomo weLutjha weliZweloke (i-NYP).
tgt_text: Tlhako ya Tlhahlobo le Tekolo (M&E) ya Pholisi ya Bafsa ya Setšhaba (NYP).

src_text: IKhabinethi ivumele umtlamo we-M&E ozokghonakalisa ukutjhejisisa nokuhlola umthelela weensika ze-NYP ka-2020-.
tgt_text: Kabinete dumeletše tlhako ya M&E yeo tla kgontšhago tlhahlobo le kelo ya khuetšo ya dintlha tša bohlokwa tša NYP ya 2020-.

src_text: Umtlamo lo unikela ngamatshwayo amahlanu akhambisana neensika ze-NYP.
tgt_text: Tlhako fa ditaetši tša legato la godimo tše hlano tšeo di sepelelanago le dintlha tša bohlokwa tša NYP.

src_text: Amatshwayo la atlanywa nababambisani abanqophileko abanetjisakalo ekuthuthukisweni kwelutjha ngelizweni.
tgt_text: Ditaetši di dirilwe le bakgathatema ba maleba bao ba nago le kgahlego mo tlhabollong le matlafatšong ya bafsa ka mo nageng.

src_text: Ukubuthelelwa kwemininingwana kuzokuhlukaniswa ukuya ngokweminyaka, ubulili, ukukhubazeka, ubutjhaba nobujamo bendawo ngamano la wokungenelela..     Ukuhlunga kuzokwenziwa kiyo yoke imikhakha karhulumende, amabubulo nemakhapanini wangeqadi..     ITlhatlha lomThethomgomo weHlelo eliHlanganyelweko.
tgt_text: Tshedimošo tla kgoboketšwa ka go aroganywa ka dikarolo go ya ka mengwaga, bong, bogolofadi, sehlopha sa merafe le tikologo ya thutafase ya ditsenogare tše.

src_text: Ikhabinethi ivumele iTlhatlha lomThethomgomo weHlelo eliHlanganyelweko kurhulumende, elinqophe ukuqalana neenkhala ezikhona kumthethomgomo wokuhlela ehlelweni lokuhlela lagadesi.
tgt_text: Dikgato tše tša go dira ditlhahlobo di tla dirwa ka mafelong ka moka mmušo, ka ditheong ka moka le lekaleng la praebete.

src_text: Amano wokungenelela ahlongozwako azokuqalana nokutlhayela kokulinganiswa kokuhlela nemikhakha yomithathu karhulumende.
tgt_text: Dipego tša tšona di tla dirwa kotareng ye nngwe le ye nngwe gomme tša phatlalatšwa gabedi ka ngwaga.

src_text: Ukungenelela lokhu kuzokwethula ihlelo lokuhlunga elifakazelekako.
tgt_text: Tlhako ya Pholisi ya Peakanyo ye Kopantšwego.

src_text: Itlhatlheli lomthethomgomo lethula godu ihlelo elibonakala lula ngokuhlela emikhakheni karhulumende isikhathi eside ukuya kesiphakathi nesifitjhani.
tgt_text: Kabinete dumeletše Tlhako ya Pholisi ya Peakanyo ye Kopantšwego ya mmušo, yeo nyakago go šogana le mafokodi peakanyo ya pholisi ao utollotšwego mo lenaneong la peakanyo la gonabjale.

src_text: Lizokusebenzela ukwethula amatjhuguluko wezomthetho ukuThuthukisa ukukhambelana nomphumela olindelekileko ekuhleleni kukarhulumende nekuhlungeni..     Ukwamukelwa kwesiVumelwano sokuTlanywa kwe-Ejensi yemiTjhoga ye-Afrika (i-AMA).
tgt_text: Ditsenogare tšeo di šišintšwego di tla re gare ga tše dingwe tša šogana le tlhokego ya tlhopo ya peakanyo mo dikarolong tše tharo tša mmušo.

src_text: IKhabinethi ivumele ukutlikitlwa kwesiVumelwano sokuTlanywa kwesiVumelwano i-AMA nokwethulwa kwaso ePalamende.
tgt_text: Ditsenogare di tla tsebiša mokgwa wa tlhahlobo wo theilwego go bohlatse.

src_text: Lokhu kuzokuphumelelisa isivumelwano esasayinwa siGungu seHlangano yobuNye bamaZwe we-Afrika ngomnyaka wee-.
tgt_text: Tlhako ya pholisi tsebišitše gape kakanyo ye bonolo ka peakanyo ya nako ye telele go ya magareng le peakanyo ya nako ye kopana go phatlalala le mmušo tla šomela go thoma dimpshafatšo tša melao go kaonafatša kopano le kakanyo mo peakanyong le tlhahlobong ya mmušo.

src_text: Isivumelwanesi sethulela ikhonthinenti i-AMA ngokusemthethweni.
tgt_text: Tumelelo ya Tumelelano ya go Thongwa ga Mokgatlo wa Dihlare tša Seafrika (AMA).

src_text: I-ejensi le izokulawula imikhiqizo yezokwelapha godu ithuthukise ukuphepha kufikelelwe imiphumela enqotjhiweko ngemikhiqizo yokwelapha kukhonthinenti.
tgt_text: Kabinete dumeletše go saenwa ga Tumelelano ya go Thongwa ga AMA le go išwa ga yona Palamenteng go ka dumelelwa.

src_text: Ukutlikitlwa nokuvunyelwa kwesivumelwanesi kuzokuthuthukisa ukuzibophelela kweSewula Afrika ephasini nakukhothinenti mayelana nokuqinisa ihlelo lokulawula imikhiqizo yezepilo..     Umbiko ngokuSebenza kweHlelo leKuthazomthelo kezokuRhubhulula nokuThuthukisa  (i-R&D)  – yomnyaka wee-2019/20 newee-2020/.
tgt_text: Se se tla phetha tumelelano yeo amogelwago ke Kopano ya Tumelelano ya Afrika ka.

src_text: Ikhabinethi ivumele ukwethulwa ePalamende kweHlelo leKuthazomthelo kezokuRhubhulula nokuThuthukisa (i-R&D) leminyaka emibili edlulileko (Umnyaka wee-2019/20 newee-2020/21).
tgt_text: Tumelelano thoma semmušo AMA ya kontinente.

src_text: Lokhu kukhambisana nesigaba se-11D (17) somThetho weButhelelo lomThelo we-1962 (umThetho Nomboro 58 we-1962), odinga bona imibiko le yethulwe ePalamende.
tgt_text: Mokgatlo tla laola ditšweletšwa tša dihlare, gomme wa kaonafatša polokego le bokgoni bja ditšweletšwa tša dihlare ka kontinenteng.

src_text: Ihlelo leKuthazomthelo linqophe ukukhuthaza amakhampani wangeqadi ukusisa ku-R&D kobana kunzinziswe ukukhula kwamasiso.
tgt_text: Go saenwa le go dumelelwa ga tumelelano ye go tla kaonafatša boikgafo bja Afrika Borwa mo lefaseng le mo kontinenteng mo go matlafatšeng lenaneo la taolo ya kontinente mo go ditšweletšwa tša maphelo.

src_text: Likghonakalisa ukuthuthukiswa kwesayensi nekghono lokusungula imikhiqizo emitjha ngehloso yokukhulisa umnotho begodu kukhuthaza nokuphalisana.
tgt_text: Pego ka ga Lenaneo la Tlhohleletšo ya Motšhelo la Phethagatšo ya Dinyakišišo le Tlhabollo (R&D) – 2019/20 le 2020/.

src_text: Ikhabinethi ithabile ukuthi umbiko utjengisa ukuthi amakhampani amatjha enze isibawo sesibonelelo somthelo.
tgt_text: Kabinete dumeletše go išwa ga Lenaneo la tlhohleletšo ya Motšhelo la R&D Palamenteng mo mengwageng ye mebedi ya go feta (2019/20 le 2020/21).

src_text: Ukhuthaza amanye amakhampani ukufikelela iskimu lesi njengengcenye yokukhulisa amasiso wawo nokusimamisa ukukhula komnotho.
tgt_text: Se se sepelelana le karolo ya 11D (17) ya Molao wa Motšhelo wa Letseno, wa 1962 (Molao wa 58 wa 1962), woo nyakago go alwa ga dipego tše ka Palamenteng.

src_text: Amakhampani aphezulu amane ekungiwo afumana isibonelelo somthelo asemkhiqizweni wezokulima, zeemayini, amakhemikhali; ubunikazi beemayini; amakhemikhali, zokuziphotjhonga, imikhakha yeenhlahla yobuqharhaqharha bethekniki nelwazi lamakhompyutha evunyelwe yiKhabinethi njengemikhakha emaqaloqangi eHlelweni lokuThuthukisa amaBubulo.
tgt_text: Lenaneo la tlhohleletšo ya motšhelo le nyaka go hlohleletša dikhamphani tša praebete go beeletša mo go R&D gore go hlohleletšwe kgolo ya ekonomi, le go godiša katlego.

src_text: Umbiko ozeleko uyafumaneka kubunzinzolwazi bomNyango wezeSayensi nobuKghwari ku-www.dst.gov.za..     IForamu Yokukhuliswa Komnotho namaThuba e-Afrika (i-AGOA) Yomnyaka wee-.
tgt_text: Kabinete thabela gore pego bontšha gore dikhamphani tše difsa di dirile kgopelo ya tlhohleletšo ya motšhelo hlohleletša dikhamphani tše dintši go hwetša setlamo se bjalo ka karolo ya go godiša dipeeletšo tša bona le go hlohleletša kgolo ya ekonomi.

src_text: IKhabinethi ivumele ukuhlonywa kweForamu i-AGOA ngomnyaka wee-.
tgt_text: Dikhamphani tše nne tša godimo tšeo di hweditšego tlhohleletšo ya motšhelo di ka makaleng tshepetšo ya ditšweletšwa tša temo; kaonafatšo ya meepo; dikhemikhale, dibotsefatši, dihlare le elektrotheknikhale le Theknolotši ya Tshedimošo tšeo Kabinete di dumeletšego bjalo ka dikarolo tše bohlokwa mo Leanong la Katlego ya Pholisi ya Intasteri.

src_text: I-AGOA yenziwa yabamthetho yi-United States of America (i-USA) ngomnyaka wee-2000 ukunikela ukuzikhethela ngezerhwebo emazweni amanengi we-Afrika engeSewula nemamakethe we-USA.
tgt_text: Pego ka botlalo ka hwetšwa mo wepsaeteng ya Kgoro ya Saense le Kaonofatšo: www.dst.gov.za.

src_text: Imikhiqizo yeSewula Afrika ngaphasi kwe-AGOA ifaka hlangana iinthelo ezigonywako, amantongomani, iinkoloyi, iinsimbi zeenkoloyi, i-ayoni, isimbi nemikhiqizo yekhemikhali.
tgt_text: Foramo ya Molao wa Dibaka le Kgolo ya Afrika (AGOA) -.

src_text: Kusazokumenyezelwa ilanga nendawo ekuzokubanjelwa kiyo iforamu le.
tgt_text: Kabinete dumeletše go swarwa ga Foramo ya AGOA ka.

src_text: UmButhano waboNgqongqotjhe wesiQhema esiThunywe ukuButhelela iLwazijikelele ngePhasi (i-GEO) womnyaka wee-.
tgt_text: AGOA dumeletšwe ke Amerika (USA) ka 2000 go fa phihlelelo ya go ikgetha ya kgwebo ya go ikema go bontši bja dinaga tša Afrika tša Borwa bja Sahara le mebaraka ya gae ya USA.

src_text: IKhabinethi ivumele iSewula Afrika ukubamba umButhano waboNgqongqotjhe we- GEO eKapa ngomnyaka wee-.
tgt_text: Dikišontle tša Afrika Borwa ka fase ga AGOA di akaretša dienywa tša go butšwa, dimake, dikoloi, didirišwa, tšhipi, setala le ditšweletšwa tša khemikhale.

src_text: I-GEO iyihlangano yaborhulumende eyahlonywa ngomnyaka we-2003 ngemva komButhano wePhasiloke weTuthuko eNzinzileko.
tgt_text: Tšatšikgwedi la nnete le lefelo di sa tlo tsebišwa.

src_text: Umbuthano lo usebenza njengekundla emikhakhaminengi lapho amazwe azinikela ngokufaka isandla emnqopheni ofanako wokwakha amahlelo we-GEO.
tgt_text: Samiti ya Ditona ya Sehlopha sa Ditlhahlobo tša Lefase (GEO) –.

src_text: I-GEO njenganje inaborhulumende bamazwe abangaphezu kwe-113, abama-30 babo ngebe-Afrika kanti iinhlangano ezizibandakanyako ezili-140, ezili-11 zazo ngeze-Afrika.
tgt_text: Kabinete dumeletše gore Afrika Borwa sware Samiti ya Ditona ya GEO ka Motsekapa ka.

src_text: ISewula Afrika kade ililunga leKomidi yesiGungu esiPhezulu ukusukela ngomnyaka wee-2005 begodu njenganje abososayeni belizwe lekhethu bayazibandakanya emahlelweni wezerhubhululo adoswa phambili yi-GEO.
tgt_text: GEO ke mokgatlo wa mebušo ya boditšhabatšhaba woo hlomilwego ka 2003 ka morago ga Samiti ya Lefase ya Tlhabollo ya go Swarelela šoma bjalo ka sefala sa kopano moo dinaga di kgathago tema ka go ithaopa go fihlelela nepo ya go swana ya go aga mananeo GEO.

src_text: USewula yiNyanga yeenThuthi (i-OTM) –.
tgt_text: Gonabjale GEO na le mebušo ya bosetšhaba ya go feta 113, ye 30 ya yona tšwago ka Afrika gomme mekgatlo ye ka bago 140 kgatha tema, gomme ye 11 ya yona tšwa Afrika.

src_text: IKhabinethi ivumele ukuhlonywa kwejima le-OTM ngoMgqibelo nali-1 kuSewula wee-2022 ngaphasi kommongondaba othi: “Sishov’ingolovane: sisoke sakha umthangalasisekelo weenthuthi owakha nonzinzisa iindlela zokuziphilisa”.
tgt_text: Afrika Borwa dutše le leloko la Komitiphethiši go tloga ka 2005 gomme boramahlale ba rena gonabjale ba kgatha tema mananeong dinyakišišo mmalwa ao etilwego pele ke GEO.

src_text: I-OTM yaqobe mnyaka iyelelisa ngeenthuthi njengenye yamatshwayo aqakathekileko ekukhuleni komnotho nokuthuthuka okusabaleleko.
tgt_text: Kgwedi ya Dinamelwa ya Diphalane (OTM) –.

src_text: Kunezinto ezizokwenziwa ukukhangisa imikhakha ehlukileko yomthangalasisekelo weenthuthi kezemmoyeni, zemanzini, iinthuthi zomphakathi neendlela.
tgt_text: Kabinete dumeletše go thakgolwa ga lesolo la OTM ka Mokibelo, 1 Diphalane 2022, ka fase ga morero: “Sishov’ingolovane: mmogo re aga infrastraktšha ya dinamelwa yeo agago mešomo ya go swarelela”.

src_text: Okhunye okuzokwenziwa kuzokuba kuyelelisa mayelana nokuphepha ngaphakathi kweenthuthi nokuvikeleka emkhakheni weenthuthi.
tgt_text: OTM ya ngwaga le ngwaga šomišwa go godiša temošo ka dinamelwa bjalo ka dikarolo tše bohlokwa mo kgolong ya ekonomi le tlhabollo ya mahlakore mararo.

src_text: Urhulumende uhlala azibophelele ekuthuthukiseni umthangalasisekelo wezeenthuthi, eendaweni zemakhaya nezedrobheni, ukuze kuphunyeleliswe ukuthuthwa kwepahla nabantu..     UmHlangano weHlangano yeenTjhaba eziBumbeneko (i-UN) weHlelo lezokuHlaliswa kwabaNtu (i-UN-HABITAT).
tgt_text: Go tla ba le ditiragalo tše mmalwa go bontšha dikarolo tše mmalwa tša infrastraktšha ya dinamelwa ka go difofane, dikepe, dinamelwa tša bohle le ditsela.

src_text: IKhabinethi ivumele ukubanjwa komhlangano wamalunga we-UN-HABITAT eJwanisbhege mhla ali- 16 ukufikela nakali-17 kuSewula wee-.
tgt_text: Ditiragalo di lemoša gape ka polokego le tšhireletšo ya dinamelwa.
Go tla akaretšwa gape bakgathatema go boledišana ka ditlhohlo tša go fapana mo lekaleng la dinamelwa.

src_text: UmNyango wezokuHlaliswa kwabaNtu uzokuhlela umhlangano lo wamalanga amabili ozokukhanjelwa badosiphambili bezepolitiki, izazi ezibasebenzi kilomkhakha nabarhubhululi, kufaka hlangana amalunga aqakathekileko weKomidi yabaJameli basaFuthi be-UN-HABITAT abanzinze e-Nairobi, e-Kenya.
tgt_text: Mmušo dula ikgafile mo go kaonafatšeng infrastraktšha ya dinamelwa ya naga, bobedi mo mafelong segae le setoropong, gore go sepetšwe tshepelo ye botse gape ya bokgoni ya dithoto le batho.

src_text: Amaphuzu aqakathekileko azokufaka hlangana ukungenelela kwamatjhuguluko eendaweni zemitlhatlhana nalezo eziminyeneko..     Imiphumela yemikhulumiswano le izokufikela esitlhorini sokuhlonywa kweTlhatlha leHlelo lokuSebenza lePhasiloke, elizokwethulwa emKhandlwini we-UN-HABITAT ngomnyaka wee-     ImiThethomlingwa.
tgt_text: Kopano ya Lenaneo la Magae la Bodulo bja Batho (UN-HABITAT) la Kopanoditšhaba (UN).

src_text: UmThethomlingwa womKhandlu weliZweloke wezeNturhu eQothele bobuLili obuThileko nokuBulawa kwabaNtu abaSikazi (i-GBVF) womnyaka wee-.
tgt_text: Kabinete dumeletše go swarwa ga kopano ya maloko UN-HABITAT ka Johannesburg ka la 16 Diphalane..  Kgoro ya Bodulo bja Batho tla sepetša kopano ye ya matšatši mabedi yeo tla tsenelwago ke ditsebi tša dipolotiki, ditsebi le banyakišiši, go akaretša malokomagolo Komiti ya go ya go ile ya Baemedi ba UN-HABITAT bao ba lego Nairobi, Kenya.

src_text: Ikhabinethi ivumele ukwethulwa ePalamende komThethomlingwa womKhandlu weliZweloke we-GBVF womnyaka wee-.
tgt_text: Ditaba tše bohlokwa tšeo go tla bolelwago ka tšona di tla akaretša ditsenogare tša phetogo go badudi ba mekhukhung le metsesetoropo go tlala kudu.

src_text: UmThethomlingwa lo uqalelela itlhatlha lomthetho lokuhlonywa kwehlangano ezokusiza ngokungenelela ekuruthuleni ngomrabhu i-GBVF.
tgt_text: Dipoelo tša dipoledišano tše di tla phethwa mo thakgolong ya Tlhako ya Leano la Katlego la Lefase, yeo tla alwago Kopanong ya UN-HABITAT gore dumelelwe ka  Melaokakanywa.

src_text: Uqalelela godu ukuhlonywa kweBhodi yomKhandlu ezokusiza nokutjheja ukwethulwa kweQhinga lokulwisana ne-GBVF leliZweloke, elavunyelwa yiKhabinethi ngoSewula wee-.
tgt_text: Molaokakanywa wa Khansele ya Setšhaba ya Dikgaruru tša Bong le Dipolao tša Basadi le Bana (GBVF) wa.

src_text: Ibhodi le izokuba nobujameli beenhlangano zomphakathi obuma-51% nama-49% wembusweni.
tgt_text: Kabinete dumeletše go išwa ga Molaokakanywa wa Khansele ya Setšhaba ya 2021 Palamenteng gore go šoganwe le wona.

src_text: UmThethomlingwa lo sele udlule esigabeni sokulalelwa mphakathi bewuveze amazizo ngawo..     UmThethomlingwa Wokulawulwa Kwemikhiqizo yeGwayi  neGwayi Elibhenywa Ngeensetjenziswa ezibuLekthroniki wee-.
tgt_text: Molaokakanywa wo fa tlhako ya molao mo go hlongweng ga mokgatlo wa molao gore go be le tsenogare ye nepišago mo go šoganeng le GBVF dumelela gape go thongwa ga Boto ya Khansele yeo tla fago taolo yeo beakantšwego gomme ya laola phethagatšo ya Leano la Taolo ya Setšhaba ka ga GBVF, leo le dumeletšwego ke Kabinete ka Diphalane 2020 go phethagatšwa.

src_text: IKhabinethi ivumele ukwethulwa ePalamende komThethomlingwa wemiKhiqizo yeGwayi neGwayi Elibhenywa Ngeensetjenziswa ezibu-Lekhthroniki wee-2018, onqophe ukwesula umThetho we-1993 (umThetho Nomboro 83 womNyaka we-1993)  wokuLawula imikhiqizo yeGwayi, njengombana ukhitjelelwe.
tgt_text: Boto tla le kemedi ya 51 go tšwa go setšhaba sa gae le 49% go tšwa mmušong.

src_text: UmThethomlingwa lo unqophe ukuqinisa amagadango wezamaphilo womphakathi ngomnqopho wowuwukhambelanisa nesiVumelwano seKoro yeHlangano yezePilo ePhasiniloke eQalelela ukuLawula ukuBhenywa kweGwayi.
tgt_text: Molaokakanywa šetše swayaswayilwe ke setšhaba.

src_text: UmThethomlingwa lo utjhukumisa hlangana nokhunye, iindawo ezingaphakathi nezingaphandle kwemakhiwo ekungakafaneli nakancani ukukhokhelwa igwayi ngakizo; ukupheliswa kokuthengwa kwegwayi emitjhinini, uqinise nokupakwa kwegwayi netshwayo eliyelelisako.
tgt_text: Molaokakanywa wa Ditšweletšwa tša Motšoko le Didirišwa tša go Kgoga Motšoko tša Elektroniki wa.

src_text: UmThethomlingwa lo sele udlulile esigabeni esingeneleleko sokukhulumisana nababelani, kufaka hlangana ibubulo legwayi, iinhlangano zomphakathi neminyango karhulumende ethintekako     Iminyanya Ezako.
tgt_text: Kabinete dumeletše go išwa palamenteng Ditshwayotshwayo tša Molaokakanywa wa Ditšweletšwa tša Motšoko le Didirišwa tša go Kgoga Motšoko tša Elektroniki wa 2018, tšeo di nyakago go phumola Molao wa gonabjale wa go Laola Ditšweletšwa tša Motšoko, (Molao wa 83 wa 1993) go ya le ka moo mpshafaditšwego ka gona.

src_text: UmButhano wama-77 weBandla Jikelele le-UN (i-UNGA77).
tgt_text: Molaokakanywa nyaka go matlafatša magato maphelo setšhaba naga gomme dire gore sepelelane le Tumelelano ya Tlhako ya Mokgatlo wa Maphelo Lefase ka ga Taolo ya Motšoko.

src_text: ISewula Afrika iyingcenge ye-UNGA77 ebanjwe e-Ofisi eliKhulu le-UN e-New York City e-USA ukuthoma mhlana ama-20 ukufikela nakama-27 kuSewula wee-2022 ngaphasi kommongondaba othi: “Isikhathi Somlando: Ukutherhula ipengu ezokuletha amatjhuguluko emirarweni ehlobanako”.
tgt_text: Molaokakanywa šišinya gare ga tše dingwe, gore go se sa folelwa ka gare ga meago le mafelo mangwe ka ntle ga meago; go fedišwa ga thekišo ya sekerete mo metšheneng ya go rekiša, le go thekga taba ya diphuthelwana tša disekerete le maswao temošo.

src_text: Emazweni angeSewula, umthelela kezomnotho nakezehlalakuhle wehlekelele yobuLwele beNgogwana i-Corona (i-COVID-19) awulingani mayelana nokuvuselelwa emazweni athuthukileko ngeTlhagwini godu lokhu kubiza ukubambisana kizo zoke iintjhaba ukuqinisekisa kobana akunalizwe elisalelako..     Ukwandulela iKulumopikiswano ye-UN, uNobhala Zombelele we-UN, uNom.
tgt_text: Molaokakanywa fetišitšwe dikgatong tša go tsenelela tša go nyaka maikutlo setšhaba go fapana, go akaretša intasteri ya metšoko mekgatlo ya badudi le dikgoro tša mmušo tša maleba  Ditiragalo tše di Tlago.

src_text: António Guterres, uzokubiza umhlangano omayelana “Nokuletha Amatjhuguluko kezeFundo” abambe nomhlangano wezinga eliphezulu omayelana nemiNqopho yokuThuthukisa ukuNzinza (ama-SDG).
tgt_text: Kopano ya bo 77 ya Kopanokakaretšo ya UN (UNGA77).

src_text: Kulindelwe ukuthi umhlangano omayelana nama-SDG utjheje iindlela ekungavuselelwa ngazo ikuthalo begodu kurhatjiswe nokusungulwa kwama-SDG.
tgt_text: Afrika Borwa kgatha tema ka go UNGA77 yeo lego ka go dikantorokgolo tša UN ka Toropokgolong ya New York ka USA go tloga ka la 27 Lewedi 2022 ka fase ga morero: “Nako ya mathata: Go tšweletša ditharollo go kgokaganya ditlhohlo”.

src_text: Ilanga LamaGugu.
tgt_text: Go Borwa bja lefase, khuetšo ya ekonomi le ekonomi ya leago ya leuba la Bolwetši bja Coronavirus (COVID-19) bile bothata kudu malebana le tsošološo go Leboa leo le hlabologilego gomme se se nyaka maitapišo ao kopanetšwego go tšwa dinageng ka moka go kgonthiša gore ga go na yoo tlogetšwego morago.

src_text: UMengameli u-Ramaphosa uzokwethula ikulumo eqakathekileko emnyanyeni wokugidinga iLanga lamaGugu womnyaka wee-2022 e-Union Buildings ngoMgqibelo, mhla ama-24 kuKhukhulamungu wee-.
tgt_text: Pele ga Ngangišano ya Kakaretšo ya UN, Mongwaledikakaretšo wa UN, Morena António Guterres tla beakanya samiti ka ga “Go fetoša Thuto” le go swara kopano ya maemo godimo yeo nepišago Dinepo tša Tlhabollo ya go Swarelela (di-SDG).

src_text: Umnyanya lo uzokubanjwa ngaphasi kommongondaba othi: “Ukugidinga Ilifa lika-Solomon Linda noMbhino Wesintu weSewula Afrika”..     INyanga yamaGugu yanonyaka itjheja umvumo wesintu weSewula Afrika khulukhulu umbhino wengomabusuku (Isicathamiya) nendima yawo ekulu kezemidlalo, ubukghwari, ubugwali, zamasiko namagugu.
tgt_text: Kopano ya di-SDG swanelwa ke go nyakišiša ditsela tšeo go ka tsošološago maatla le go potlakiša phethagatšo.

src_text: Ummongondaba lo wethulela ingwani umnyaka wama-60 wokudlula ephasini kombhini nomtlami weengoma u-Solomon Popoli Linda (1909-1962), obekaziwa godu ngelika-Solomon Ntsele, owaziwa khulu njengomtlalmi wengoma ethi, “Mbube”.
tgt_text: Letšatši la Bohwa.

src_text: UmNyanya Ozokwenzeka Ngesikhathi Sinye Welanga Lephasiloke Leenthuthi Zelwandle wee-2022 .
tgt_text: Mopresidente Ramaphosa tla fa polelokgolo mo meketekong ya Letšatši la Bohwa la Setšhaba mo Union Buildings ka Mokibelo, 24 Lewedi.

src_text: ISewula Afrika izokubamba Umnyanya Ozokwenzeka Ngesikhathi Sinye Welanga Lephasiloke Leenthuthi Zelwandle wee-2022 e-Durban ukusukela mhla ali-12 ukufikela nakali-14 kuSewula wee-.
tgt_text: Moletlo tla swarwa ka fase ga morero: “Go keteka Bohwa bja Solomon Linda le Mmino wa Setšo wa Afrika Borwa”.

src_text: Umnyanya lo uzokubanjwa ngesikhathi sinye ne-OTM, begodu uzokuba yingcenye yokuyelelisa ngomkhakha weenthuthi zelwandle.
tgt_text: Kgwedi ye ya Bohwa nepiša mmino wa setšo wa Afrika Borwa ka nepišo ya mmino wa Isicathamiya le tema yeo ikgathago go dipapadi, bokgabo, setšo le bohwa.

src_text: Umnyanya lo uzokuletha abajameli bemazweni ahlukileko abazokubona ibubulo leenthuthi zelwandle zeSewula Afrika.
tgt_text: Morero hlompha matswalo bo 60 go hlokofala ga rammino, seopedi le motšweletši Solomon Popoli Linda (1901-1962), yoo tsebegago gape bjalo ka Solomon Ntsele, yoo tsebegago kudu bjalo ka motšweletši wa koša ya, “Mbube”.

src_text: ISewula Afrika ibe lilunga leHlangano Yamazwe Ngamazwe yeenThuthi zeLwandle ukusukela ngomnyaka we-1995, ekumkhakha okhethekileko we-UN oqalene nokulawulwa komsebenzi wokuthutha ngeenkebhe.
tgt_text: Moletlo wa go Lebana wa Letšatši la Dikepe la.
Afrika Borwa tla be swara Moletlo wa go Lebana wa Letšatši la Dikepe la 2022 ka Durban go tloga ka la 14 Diphalane.

src_text: INyanga yezeVakatjhobukela.
tgt_text: Moletlo tla swarwa nakong ya OTM, woo le wona tla bago karolo ya go godiša tsebo ya lekala la rena la dikepe.

src_text: INyanga yezeVakatjhobukela kilomnyaka igidingwa ngaphasi kommongondaba weLanga lezokuVakatjha lePhasiloke (nakama-27 kuKhukhulamungu) othi “Sicabanga kabuTjha ngeVakatjhobukela”.
tgt_text: Moletlo tla tliša baemedi go tšwa dinageng tša go fapana bao ba tla itemogelang intasteri ya dikepe ya Afrika Borwa.

src_text: Zevakatjhobukela ngelizweni ziqakathekile ekuvuselelweni komkhakha wezokuvakatjha, osiza khulu ku-GDP yeSewula Afrika nokuvula imisebenzi.
tgt_text: Afrika Borwa bile leloko la Mokgatlo wa Dikepe wa Boditšhabatšhaba go tloga ka 1995, woo lego mokgatlo wa go ikgetha wa UN wa go laola dikepe.

src_text: IKhabinethi ikuthokozele ukubona umkhakha wezokuhlaliswa nokuphathwa kwabayeni ukhula ngokwesibalo sabantu abavakatjhako  ngemva kwesikhathi salokha nakwehle ingogwana i-COVID-.
tgt_text: Kgwedi ya Boeti.

src_text: Amakhambo wangaphakathi kwelizwe abe ziingidi ezili-.
tgt_text: Kgwedi ya Boeti ngwaga wo ketekwa ka fase ga morero wa Letšatši la Boeti la Lefase (27 Lewedi) wa “Nagana gape ka Boeti”.

src_text: 2 engcenyeni yokuthoma yomnyaka wee-2022 anda nge-114% nakumadaniswa ngesikhathi esifanako somnyaka wee-.
tgt_text: Boeti bja gae bo bohlokwa kudu mo go tsošološeng lekala la boeti, leo le kgathago tema kudu go GDP ya Afrika Borwa le go hlola mošomo.

src_text: Lokhu kutjengise ikukhula ekubonakalako ngesikhathi esifanako somnyaka wee-2019, lapha kwaba namakhambo wangaphakathi kwelizwe aziingidi ezi-.
tgt_text: Kabinete thabišwa ke gore lekala la kamogelo ya baeti le begile kgolo ya baeti ka morago ga nako ya COVID-.

src_text: Njengengcenye yokugidinga iNyanga yezeVakatjhobukela, iKhabinethi ikhuthaza amaSewula Afrika ukuthatha amakhambo ‘we-Shotleft’ ukuya eemfundeni zelizwe lekhethu ezihlukahlukeneko.
tgt_text: Go tšerwe maeto gae  2 milione mo seripeng sa mathomo sa 2022 begile koketšego ya 114% ge go bapetšwa le nako ya go swana ka.

src_text: IKhabinethi yemukele ngokukhululeka isiqunto sekampani yaboflayi i-Air Belgium sokusungula umsebenzi wamakhambo waboflayi babo abeza eSewula Afrika ngeenkhathi ezithileko zonyaka, ukuthoma inyanga yona le (uKhukhulamungu), okuzokusiza khulu ikoro yezevakatjho bekuqinise nobujamo bethu bokuba lilizwe elingavakatjhelwa.
tgt_text: Se se bontšha kaonafalo ya mmaraka ya nako ya go swana ka 2019, yeo bonego maeto ao tšerwego gae  6 milione.

src_text: Lokhu kufaka hlangana amakhambo waqobe ngeveke wokuya eKapa neJwanisbhege     Imilayezo.
tgt_text: Bjalo ka karolo ya go keteka Kgwedi ya Boeti, Kabinete hlohleletša maAfrika Borwa go tšea maeto ‘Shortleft’ go ya diprofense tša rena tša go fapana.

src_text: SiyabathokozisaIkhabinethi ithokozise beyathumela iimfiselabuhle ku: UMengameli u-William Samoei Ruto weRiphabhliki ye-Kenya, obekwe esitulweni ngeLesibili, nakali-13 kuKhukhulamungu wee-2022, ngemva kwamakhetho welizweloke agade anokuthula abanjwa mhla ali-9 kuRhoboyi wee-.
tgt_text: Kabinete amogela gape sephetho sa Air Belgium go fofiša difofane tša sehla go ya Afrika Borwa, go thoma kgwedi yona ye (Lewedi), seo se tla matlafatšago boeti gomme sa tiišetša maemo rena bjalo ka nepo ya boeti ya kgetho.
