src_text: ISekela likaMengameli u-David Mabuza wakhambela umnyanya lowo ajamele uMengameli u-Ramaphosa, norhulumende nabantu beRiphabhliki yeSewula Afrika.
tgt_text: Se tla akaretša difofane tša beke ye nngwe le ye nngwe go ya Motsekapa le Johannesburg  Melaetša.

src_text: IHlangano kaMakhakhularahwe yeSewula Afrika kunye neDrobha leKapa ngokubamba ngepumelelo iphaliswano i-Rugby World Cup Sevens phakathi kwamhlana ali-9 namhlana ali-11 kuKhukhulamungu wee-.
tgt_text: DitebogišoKabinete lebogiša le go lakaletša tše dibotse go:Mopresidente William Samoei Ruto wa Repabliki ya Kenya, yoo hlomamišitšwego ka Labobedi, 13 Lewedi 2022, go latela dikgetho tša bosetšhaba tša khutšo tšeo di swerwego ka la 9 Phato.

src_text: Bekungekokuthoma ukuthi umdlalo  omkhulukazi lo ubanjelwe elizweni le-Afrika kwathi iinkulungwana zabalandeli zazitika ngokubukela imidlalo kamakhakhulararhwe esezingeni eliphezulu bathabela nepatho ehle nefuthumeleko  yeSewula Afrika enikelwa abayeni.
tgt_text: Motlatšamopresidente David Mabuza tsenetše tlhomamišo legatong la Mopresidente Ramaphosa, le mmušo le batho ba Repabliki ya Afrika Borwa.South African Rugby Union le Toropokgolo ya Motsekapa go swara phadišano ya bo seswai ya Rugby World Cup Sevens gare ga 9 le 11 Lewedi be le lekga la mathomo tiragalo ye ye bohlokwa swarwa ke naga ya Afrika gomme barati ba diketekete bao ba tsenetšego ba ilwe ba thabišwa ka dijo tša rugby le kamogelo ye lemogwago ya Afrika Borwa.

src_text: Amezwi Wokutjhiriya Ikhabinethi idlulise amezwi wokutjhiriya emindenini nabangani: Abentwana besikolo abali-18 nabantu abadala ababili abahlongakele engozini emasikizi ePongola, KwaZulu-Natala ngeLesihlanu mhla ali-16 kuKhukhulamungu wee-2022 ngemva kokuthi itrogo itjhayisane bunqopha neveni egade ilayitjhe abafundi     Ukuqatjhwa.
tgt_text: MahlokoKabinete romela melaetša ya mahloko go malapa le bagwera ba:Bana ba sekolo ba 18 le batho ba bagolo ba babedi bao ba hlokofetšego mo kotsing ye šoro ka Pongola, KwaZulu-Natal ka Labohlano, 16 Lewedi 2022 ka morago ga go thulana ga lori le bene yeo bego nameditše bana ba sekolo  Bao ba Thwetšwego Mešomong.

src_text: Koke ukuqatjhwa kulawulwa kufakazeleka kweencwadi zefundo ezikhambisana nomsebenzi umuntu aqatjhelwe wona kunye nokuhlanjululwa kwebizo lomuntu okufaneleko     UNom.
tgt_text: Batho ka moka bao ba thwetšwego mešomong mangwalo bona dithuto tla tiišetšwa le go netefatšwa ka maleba  Morena Makgothi Samuel Thobakgale bjalo ka Molaodimogolophethiši (DG): Mokhomišinare wa Setšhaba wa Kgoro ya Ditirelo tša Tshokollo  Ngaka Malixole Percival Mahlati bjalo ka Motlatšamolaodimogolophethiši (DDG: lefapheng la go šoma ka merero ya Dikolo tša Maokelo tša Thuto ya Godimo ka moka le ya Tlhabollo ya Bašomi mo Kgorong ya Maphelo  Morena Siyabonga Blessing Mdubeki bjalo ka Mohlahlobimogolophethiši mo Kgorong ya Temo, Tsošološo ya Naga le Tlhabollo ya Dinagamagaed.

src_text: Makgothi Samuel Thobakgale esikhundleni sokuba mNqophisi Zombelele (i-DG): UKomitjhinara womNyango wokuVuselelwa kwesiMilo weliZweloke     UDorh.
tgt_text: Morena Phaswa Phineas Mamogale bjalo ka Mohlankedimogolo wa Ditšhelete mo Kgorong ya Maphelo.

src_text: Ukutholakala Kwamanzi.
tgt_text: Tšhireletšego ya Meetse.

src_text: IKhabinethi ithokoze amaSewula Afrika ngokuhlonipha kwawo imibandela yokuqinteliswa kwamanzi ekhe yabekelwa iindawo ezithileko zangeJwanisbhege, e-Tshwane kunye ne-Ekurhuleni ngomnqopho wokunzinzisa umthamo wamanzi eenlulwini zamanzi kileziindawo.
tgt_text: Kabinete lebogile MaAfrika Borwa ka moka ge ba obametše taelo ya go fokotšwa ga meetse ye phethagaditšwego dikarolong tše dingwe tša Johannesburg, Tshwane le Ekurhuleni go boetša sekeng maemo matamo.

src_text: Amadamu neenlulu zamanzi zilokhu zingaphasi kwegandelelo e-Gauteng ngenca yomtjhiso osahleleko amalanga la, kanti-ke njengoba asolo afunwa ngobunengi nje amanzi, i-Rand Water ibe yakateleleka ukuthi ibanciphisele khulu amanzi abomasipala beendawezi.
tgt_text: Matamo ka mehutahuta ka fase ga kgatelelo ye kgolo kudu ka baka la dithemphereitšha tša go fiša tšhiritšhiri gola Gauteng, ebile nyakego ye golelago godimo ya meetse gapeleditše Rand Water go fokotša ka bontši meetse ao abelwago mebasepala.

src_text: Ihlangano yamanzi le iphakela umthamo wamanzi abantu abangaphezulu kweengidi ezili-11 e-Gauteng, nakezinye iindawo zeMpumalanga, iFreyistata kunye neTlhagwini Tjingalanga.
tgt_text: Rand Water aba meetse go nwega mantši bathong ba go feta 11 milione go la Gauteng, dikarolong tše dingwe tša Mpumalanga, Freistata le Leboa Bodikela.
Tšona diphokotšo tše tša go se efogege di nepile go boloka kabo ya meetse ebile di tla dula di le gona go ba go fihlela ge seemo se kaonafala.

src_text: Lokhu kuqinteliswa kwamanzi esingeze sakubalekela kunqophe ukuqinisekisa ukutholakala kwamanzi, kanti-ke azokusolo aqinteliswe njalo bekube mhlazana kuba nobungcono kilobubujamo bezinto.
tgt_text: Kabinete dirile boipiletšo setšhabeng go tšwelapele go obamela magato phokotšo ya meetse le go kgatha tema ya bona ka go šomiša ka tshwanelo ka ge le sedirišwa sa go hlokwa kudu.

src_text: IKhabinethi ikhombele umphakathi ukuthi usolo ulandela imibandela yokuqinteliswa kwamanzi, ulime indimawo ngokubabalela amanzi njengoba ayindlala kangaka nje.
tgt_text: Mogwanto wa Transnet.

src_text: Ukunghalwa Komsebenzi Kwa-Transnet.
tgt_text: Kabinete amogetše kwano ya meputso ya mengwaga ye meraro ye kwanetšwego ke Transnet le Yunione ya Mohlakanelwa ya Bosetšhaba ya Dinamelwa (UNTU), ye tlo dirišwago pakeng ya 1 Moranang 2022 go fihla ka la 31 Hlakola.

src_text: IKhabinethi isithokozele isivumelwano seminyaka emithathu esenziwe hlangana kwe-Transnet neyuniyoni yabasebenzi i-United National Transport Union (i-UNTU), esithoma ukusebenza ngomhla wo-01 kuSihlabantangana wee-2022 ukuyokufika nakama-31 kuNtaka wee-.
tgt_text: Khomišene ya Poelano, Bonamodi le Ditherišano namotše kwano ye, gomme magato bona dirile gore boipelaetšo ka maloko UNTU bo fedišwe ka ponyo ya leihlo.

src_text: Imikhulumiswano yalesisivumelwano beyenganyelwe yiKomitjhini yokuThobelana, ukuColela nokuLamula, lesisivumelwano-ke siqede khonokho ukunghalwa komsebenzi malunga we-UNTU.
tgt_text: Kabinete amogetše gape sephetho sa go fediša mogwanto ka Yunione ya Dinamelwa ya Afrika Borwa le ya Bašomi.

src_text: IKhabinethi ibuye yasithokozela nesiqunto seyuniyoni i-South African Transport and Allied Workers Union (i-SATAWU) sokuqeda ukunghalwa komsebenzi.
tgt_text: Kabinete amogetše boikgafo bja Transnet bja go bea šedi godimo ga go fediša ditšhalelomorago tše bilego gona go ralala boemakepe le dipeakanyong tša ditimela nakong ya magato boipelaetšo, ao bilego le seabe se se mpe ikonoming le makaleng ao tshepetšego godimo ga Transnet go aba ditirelo..   Kabinete bontšhitše tebogo ya yona godimo ga thekgo le tšhomišanommogo ye laeditšwego ke dikgwebo ka nako ya mogwanto hlohleletša kamano ye sa felego magareng ga balaodi ba Transnet le bašomi gore khamphani ye le ikonomi ya naga ka bophara di holege.
Dikamano tša Afrika Borwa le Saudi Arabia.

src_text: IKhabinethi isithokozele isibopho se-Transnet sokuqalana nokuqeda ukusalela emva komsebenzi okwenzeke emadoyelweni wemikhumbi nesiporweni njengoba bekunghalwe umsebenzi nje, ngaleyindlela kwathikaziseka umnotho namakoro athembele kiwo.
tgt_text: Kabinete amogetše Ketelo ya Mošomo ye atlegilego ya go ya kua the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia ka Mopresidente Cyril Ramaphosa ka la 15 le 16 Diphalane.

Nakong ya keteko ye, dinaga tše ka bobedi di saenetše Dimemorantamo tše 17 tša Kwešišano go magoro go fapafapana go swana le temo, boreatlhapi, meepo, enetši ya go mpšhafatšega, tšhireletšego, dinamelwa le temo ya diphedi le dimela tša ka meetseng.

src_text: IKhabinethi izwakalise ukuthokoza kwayo ngesekelo nebambiswano elinikelwe mabhizinisi njengoba bekunghalwe umsebenzi nje.
tgt_text: Dimemorantamo tše dingwe tša kwešišano tšeo di saenetšwego ke tša mabapi le go hlongwa ga Khansele ya Mohlakanelwa ya Dikgwebo, tšhomišano legorong la diintasteri tša sešole le dithekišetšano, tšhomišano ya ditekolonyakišišo tša thutaswika.

src_text: Ikhuthaza ubudlelwano obungapheliko hlangana kwabaphathi bakwa-Transnet nebamayuniyoni kobanyana kuzokusizakala ikhampani le nomnotho welizwe.
tgt_text: Mopresidente šomišitše ketelo ye go mema dikgwebo tša Saudi Arabia go iponagatša khonferenseng ya bohlano ya dipeeletšo ya Afrika Borwa ye tlo swarwago ka.

src_text: Ubudlelwano BeSewula Afrika Ne-Saudi Arabia.
tgt_text: Saudi Arabia ke mogwebišani wa bobedi wo mogologolo wa Afrika Borwa seleteng sa Bohlabelagare ebile ke mothopo wo mogologolo wa diromelwa ka nageng go tšwa go sona selete se.

src_text: IKhabinethi ilithokozele iVakatjho lomSebenzi elibe yipumelelo likaMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa lokuya emBusweni we-Saudi Arabia ngomhla we-15 ukufikela ngomhla we-16 kuSewula wee-.
tgt_text: Dikamano tša boditšhabatšhaba magareng ga dinaga tše ka bobedi di bile le ditlamorago tše botse godimo ga ditlwaedi tša kgwebišano le dipeeletšo.

src_text: Evakatjhwenelo, amazwe amabili lawa atlikitle iimVumelwano zokuZwana (ama-MoU) ezili-17 emakorweni ahlukahlukileko, njengeyezokulima, yokuthiya iinhlambi, yokumayina, yegezi evuselelwako, yezokuphepha, zokuthutha kunye nokufuywa kweenyamazana zamanzi nokulinywa kweentjalo zamanzi.
tgt_text: Dipeeletšo tša Mananeokgoparara.

src_text: Amanye ama-MoU atlikitliweko ngamalungana nokusungulwa komKhandlu wezamaBhizinisi oHlanganyelweko, ukusebenzisana kezamabubulo weenkhali nokuthengwa kweensetjenziswa zepi kunye nezokusebenzisana ngerhubhululo lebhoduluko.
tgt_text: Kabinete amogetše go thongwa ga polante ya tšweletšo ya plastiki ya maemo godimodimo lefaseng ka khampani ya go dira plastiki yeo tšwago pele maemong boditšhabatšhaba, ya go bitšwa ALPLA Group, go la Lanseria kua Gauteng.

Se se tlaleletša maikgafo Mopresidente Ramaphosa go bea sekeng tlhabollo ya mananeokgoparara bjalo ka mokgwa wa go hlohleletša kgolo ya ikonomi le go atiša mešomo..   Dipeeletšo tša boleng bja US$50 milione di kgatha tema ye kgolo godimo ga Leanolegolo la Toropo ya Mabonwa ya Lanseria leo le tlo hlohleletšago seemo seo se tieletšego le tšhomišoleswa le gape go hlola le go šireletša mešomo ye.

src_text: UMengameli usebenzise ivakatjhweli ukumema abosomabhizinisi be-Saudi Arabia ekhonferensini yamasiso yesihlanu yeSewula Afrika ezokubanjwa ngomnyaka wee-.
tgt_text: Godimo ga dipeeletšo tše go akaretšwa le lenaneo la go ithutela mošomo la batsebi ba 36 ba bointšineere bja dikgerekgere le ba tšhomišogape ba ditiro tša ALPLA Group go ralala selete sa Borwa bja Afrika.

src_text: I-Saudi Arabia ililizwe lesibili ngobukhulu emazweni we-Middle East arhwebelana neSewula Afrika, kanti-ke ngiyo emthombo omkhulu ukudlula yoke esiphandeni sekhabo kathengisela iSewula Afrika ipahla.
tgt_text: Lenaneo le la boithutelamošomo le tlo thoma ka 2023, ka baithutelamošomo ba mathomo ba 12 ba MaAfrika Borwa ba go tšwa mafelong ka mo nageng.

src_text: Ubudlelwano bamazwe ngamazwe hlangana kwamazwe amabili la, benze ukuthi kube nokurhwebelana nokusiselana okuhle.
tgt_text: Meepo ye Sego Molaong.

src_text: Ukusisa Kumthangalasisekelo.
tgt_text: Meepo ye sego molaong kweša setšhaba bohloko le go gobatša ikonomi ya gaborena, ebile dipoelo tša yona ke tobo ya letseno go bobedi mmušo le lefapha la meepo..   Kabinete amogetše go amogwa ga dithunya tšeo di bego di utilwe le go golegwa ga bagononelwa ba 20 ba go amana le meepo ye sego molaong ka nako ya lesolophuruphutšo kua mokoting wa moepo wa Stilfontein go la Leboa Bodikela.

src_text: IKhabinethi ikuthokozele ukugunyazwa kokwakhiwa kwefemu eyenza iplastiki yezinga eliphezulu e-Lanseria, e-Gauteng, ezakwakhiwa yi-ALPLA Group emkhiqizi wamazwe ngamazwe.
tgt_text: Kabinete dira boipiletšo go MaAfrika Borwa go tšwelapele go šomišana le mabotho phethagatšo ya molao go netefatša go atlega ga masolo kamoso twantšho ya bosenyi.
Se se tla romela molaetša wo bogale wa gore bosenyi ga bo thuše ka selo, le gore badirabosenyi ba tlo golegwa le go sekišwa ntle poifo goba go šokelwa..  Enetši.

src_text: Lokhu-ke kuqinisa isibopho sikaMengameli Ramaphosa sokulungiselela ukuthuthukiswa komthangalasisekelo njengendlela yokukhuthaza ukuhluma komnotho nokwandiswa kwemisebenzi.
tgt_text: Eskom saenetše dikwanelo tša go hiriša tša mengwaga ye 30 gotee le babeeletši ba bane ba batšweletši ba go ikema ba mohlagase go aga metšhene ye mefsa ya go fehla enetši ya go hlweka kua ditišing tša mohlagase tša Majuba le Tutuka gola Mpumalanga.
Khirišo ye ya seripa sa naga tla goketša dipeeletšo tše phopholeditšwego tša go batamela R40 bilione.

src_text: Amasiso weengidi ezima-US$50 aliliqha eliqakathekileko eplanini ye-Lanseria Smart City ezakusekela ukubambelela nokusetjenziswa kweensetjenziswa ngobutjha beyisize nokuvulwa nokulondwa kwemisebenzi ema-.
tgt_text: Babeeletši ba ba bane – HDF Energy South Africa, Red Rocket SA, Solar Group le Mainstream Renewable Power Developments South Africa – ba tlo fehla mohlagase wa go lekana dimekawate tše 2 000 godimo ga mohlagase wa go tšweletšwa setšhabeng.

src_text: Hlanganapho kubalwe nehlelo lokuthwasisela abantu abama-36 umsebenzi wama-mechatronic nabosocwephetjhe bokusebenzisa iinsetjenziswa ngobutjha emisebenzini ye-ALPLA Group e-Afrika engeSewula.
tgt_text: Phehlo ye ye mpsha ya mohlagase go letetšwe gore kgokaganywe le mohlagase wo tšweletšwago nageng ka bophara mo dikgweding tše 24 go fihla go tše 36 go tloga ge ngwaga wo wa ditšhelete fela, ka go latela ditumelelo tša tikologo, tša karolo ya mafelo le tše dingwe tša taolo.

src_text: Ihlelo lokufundiselwa umsebenzeli lizokuthoma ngomnyaka wee-2023, la kuzokuthonywa khona ngabantu abali-12 beSewula Afrika abavela eendaweni zakhona kilesisifunda.
tgt_text: Tšhireletšego ya Dijo.

src_text: Ukumayina Ngokungasi Semthethweni.
tgt_text: Kabinete amogetše go swarwa ka mo nageng ga Lekgotla la 2022 la Agri SA go la Pretoria ka la 13 le la 14 Diphalane 2022 ka fase ga morero wo: “Kgodišo ya Tšweletšo ya ka Nageng”.

src_text: Ukumayina ngokungasi semthethweni kulimaza umphakathi nomnotho welizwe lekhethu, bekubangele nokuthi urhulumende nekoro yeemayini balahlekelwe yimali.
tgt_text: Lekgotla le le rerišane ka merero ya go swana le go dira gore maanakgolo temo šomele batšweletši ba ka mo nageng; mananeokgoparara go swarelela dijo tša go tšweletšwa ka mo nageng; go dira gore tikologo ya ka mo nageng tšee nako ye telele godimo ga tšweletšo ya dijo ya ka mo nageng le ka bokamosong, le go matlafatša mabokgoni tšweletšo ya dijo go diriša ditšweletšo tšeo di tšweleditšwego ka mo nageng.

Ka gona go bea pele tšhireletšego ya dijo kamoso, Kabinete amogetše go tsebagatšwa ga Hapo ya Bosetšhaba ya Tšhireletšego ya Tlhago, ka Kgoro ya Saense le Lenaneo la Kgwebišano ya Temo ya Ikonomi ya Diphedi, ka tšhomišano le Yunibesithi ya Pretoria.

src_text: IKhabinethi ikuthokozele ukufunyanwa kwetjathokazi leengidi nokubotjhwa kwabasolwa abama-20 abahlotjaniswa nokumayina ngokungasi semthethweni, ababotjhwe lokhuya abathobelisimthetho nabebahlola umgodi wemayini ye-Stilfontein eTlhagwini Tjingalanga.
tgt_text: Hapo ye tla thekga thibelo, phokotšo le taolo ya dipuno le malwetši diphoofolo, ao tlo bago le seabe sa tšweletšo ye hlatlogetšego godimo, tšhireletšego ya dijo le tlhabollo ye swarelelago ya dinagamagae   Diphetho tša Kabinete.
Go Dumelelwa ga Tšhatha ya Kopano ya Afrika (AU) ya go Hlongwa ga Makala.

src_text: IKhabinethi ikhombela amaSewula Afrika ukuthi aragele phambili asebenzisane nabathobelisimthetho ukuqinisekisa ipumelelo yamajima alwisana nobulelesi.
tgt_text: Kabinete dumeletše tlhagišo Palamenteng ga Tšhatha ya AU ka Mehola le Metheo ya go Hlongwa ga Makala, Pušoselegae le Tlhabollo ya ka Nageng gore dumelelwe.

src_text: Lokhu-ke kuzakuthumela umlayezo onamandla othi ubulelesi abunamvuzo, nothi izelelesi zizakubotjhwa bezitjhutjhiswe ngaphandle kwevalo nokurhawukelwa.
tgt_text: Afrika Borwa saenetše tšhatha ye ka Phato.

src_text: Iindaba Zegezi.

Mhlapha u-Eskom utlikitle iimvumelwano zama-30 weminyaka zokuthenga sakuqatjha nabaphehli begezi abazijameleko abane abazakwakha iimphehligezi ezitja ezingasilaphazi ummoya eMajuba neThuthuka, eMpumalanga.
tgt_text: Tšhatha ye ya go Hlongwa ga Makala fana ka tlhako go mebušo ka moka ye lego maloko ka sengwalwa sa tlhahlo ka khuetšo ya go hlongwa ga makala le mehola ya ona go tloga mmušong wa bosetšhaba go ya didikong tše dingwe tša mmušo.

src_text: Ukuqatjhiswa kwenarha kilelijima kuzakudosa amasiso alinganiselwa ema-R40 wamabhiliyoni.
tgt_text: Tšhatha ye swaragane kudu le phatlalatšo ya taolo le mehola, tlhako ya pušo le tlhabollo ya ka mo nageng.
Khansele ya bo-32 ya Ngwaga ka Ngwaga ya Boditšhabatšhaba ya Polokego ya Ditimela (IRSC).

src_text: Abasisaba begezi abane – i-HDF Energy South Africa, i-Red Rocket SA, i-Sola Group kunye ne-Mainstream Renewable Power Developments South Africa – ubuncani bakhona bazakungezelela igezi ezii-2000 zama-megawatt ethungelelwaneni legezi lelizwe.
tgt_text: Kabinete dumeletše go swarwa ga Kopano ya bo-32 ya Ngwaga ka Ngwaga ya IRSC gola Johannesburg go thoma ka la 1 go fihla ka la 6 Diphalane 2023 ka fase ga morero wo: “Phetošo ya sebopego sa ditimela mo Lefaseng leo go sa tsebjego tša kamoso”.

IRSC ke foramo ya boditšhabatšhaba ya go kopantšha mmogo ditsebi tša polokego ya ditimela go tšwa lefaseng ka bophara go fana maitemogelo go kaonafatša polokego ya ditimela..   Bjalo ka leloko la IRSC, Kemedi ya Afrika Borwa ya Polokego ya Ditimela swere foramo ye la mafelelo ka.

src_text: Amandla amatjha wokuphehlwa kwegezi kulindeleke ukuthi athungelelwe ethungelelwaneni legezi kungakapheli iinyanga ezima-24 ukuya kezima-36 ukusukela esikhathini sokutlikitlwa kwemitlolo yesekelo leemali, kuye ngokuthi iindaba zebhoduluko, zokusikwa kwenarha nezinye ezifuna imvumo zizakusetjenzwa ziqedwe ngesikhathi esingangani.
tgt_text: Seakanywa sa Leano la Bosetšhaba sa Mananeokgoparara 2050 (NIP 2050) Kgato ya.
Kabinete dumeletše phatlalatšo kuranteng ya mmušo ya Kgato ya Bobedi ya seakanywa sa NIP sa 2050 gore setšhaba se fe ditshwayotshwayo tša sona.

src_text: Ukutholakala Kokugoma Okwaneleko.
tgt_text: Leano le le fa tlhahlo matlafatšong le kaonafatšong ya diprotšeke tše logetšwego maano tša mmušo tša mohlakanelwa..   Seakanywa se se hlaola diprotšeke tše logetšwego maano madulong batho; mohlagase wa mmasepala; meetse; dilahlwa tše thata; dinamelwa tša banamedi; thuto le mananeokgoparara maphelo; mananeokgoparara titšithale, le bosenyi le bomenetša.

src_text: IKhabinethi ikuthokozele ukusingathwa kweKhongresi yezokuLima yeSewula Afrika (i-Agri SA Congress 2022) ePitori ngomhla we-13 ukuya kumhla we-14 kuSewula wee-2022 ngaphasi kommongondaba othi: “Silimela Ekhaya.” Ikhongresi le ibonisene ngeendaba ezinjengokuthi amaplani wezokulima ngokuphelela kwawo awenziwe abe asebenzele abalimi bekhethu; umthangalasisekelo obambelelako wokugoma okulinywe ekhethwapha; ibhoduluko langekhethu alenziwe lihlale likulungele ukutjalela nokukhiqizela ingomuso lekhethu ukugoma, kuqiniswe namandla nekghono labalimi lokusebenza nokulungisa ukugoma okulinywe ekhethwapha.
tgt_text: Sebopego sa leano le se fana ka ponelopele ya fao go swanetšego go fiwa šedi, se fana ka phetleko ya seemo sa bjale, se hlatholla dipeelano tše bohlokwa tša go atlega le go bolela gore go swanetše gore go dirwe eng go fihlelela ponelopele ye.
Se šišinya tshepedišo ya phethagatšo ye swanetšego go latelwa mo leanong la magato la go gagaba tekano ya mengwaga ye meraro.

src_text: Ukuqalelela iqalontanzi lokutholakala kokugoma ukuya phambili, iKhabinethi ibuye yathokozela nokuvulwa kwe-National Biosecurity Hub evulwe liHlelo lokuSebenzisana i-Agricultural Bio-economy Innovation lomNyango wezeSayensi naMandla wokuSungula, ngokubambisana neYunivesithi yePitori (i-TUKS).
tgt_text: Tlhako ya Phethagatšo ya Bosetšhaba ya go Fihlelela Bokgoni Ditirelong tša Mmušo.

src_text: IZikweli lizakusekela ukukhandelwa, ukuphungulwa nokulawulwa kwezifo zeentjalo nefuyo, khona-ke okuzakusiza ekuphakamiseni inani lomkhiqizo, ukutholakala nokuvikeleka kokugoma kunye nokuphakanyiswa komsebenzi wokuthuthukiswa kweendawo zemakhaya okubambelelako   Iinqunto Zekhabinethi.
tgt_text: Kabinete dumeletše Tlhako ya Phethagatšo ya Bosetšhaba ya go fihlelela Bokgoni Ditirelong tša Mmušo.

src_text: Ukufakazelwa Kokusatjalaliswa Komtlolo Wesivumelwano SeHlanganisela YamaZwe WoBunye Be-Afrika (i-AU).
tgt_text: Tlhako ye phatlaladitšwe ka 2021 gore setšhaba se ntšhe sa mafahleng sona..   Tlhako ye fana ka maikokotlelo mahlano mo magatong go hloma bokgoni Ditirelong tša Mmušo.

src_text: IKhabinethi ikuvumele ukudluliselwa ePalamende komTlolo wesiVumelwano samaGugu neKambisolawulo yokuSatjalaliswa, iLawuleko likaRhulumende weeNdawo zemaKhaya kunye nokuThuthukiswa kweeNdawo zemaKhaya kobanyana uyokufakazelwa.
tgt_text: Metheo ye ya boikokotlelo akaretša kgoketšo ya pele tsena le tlhokolo mo Ditirelong tša Mmušo; kgakolo le tlwaetšo; thulaganyo le taolo ya bodiragatši; thuto ye tšwelagopele, kgatelopele ya kgetho ya mošomo le ditiragalo tša mabapi le kgetho ya mošomo.

src_text: ISewula Afrika yatlikitla umtlolo wesivumelwano lo ngoRhoboyi wee-.
tgt_text: Diphetogo ka Gare ga Dipeelano tša Mošomo tša Balaodipharephare (di-DG).
Kabinete dumeletše pego ya go šišinya magato go matlafatša mabokgoni le bokgoni bja Balaodipharephare (di-DG) Ditirelong tša Mmušo.

src_text: UmTlolo wokuSatjalaliswa lo unikela umtlamo oyikombandlela kiwo woke amazwe amalunga ngokusatjalaliswa kwamandla nemisebenzi ukusukela kurhulumende welizwe loke ukuya keminye imikhakha karhulumende.
tgt_text: Pego ye dirile ditšhišinyo tše mmalwa, go akaretšwa le paka ya ka kantorong ya di-DG le taolo ya baromiwa ka Lekgotlaphethiši go bahlankedi ba taolo..   Pego ye šišintše gape le gore Molaodipharephare Kantorong ya Mopresidente tla neelwa Hlogo ya Ditirelo tša Mmušo.

src_text: Umtlolo lo uqalene khulukhulu nokusatjalaliswa kwamandla nemisebenzi, umtlamo welawuleko likarhulumende kunye nokuthuthukiswa kweendawo zemakhaya.
tgt_text: Kua diprofenseng, mošomo wo tla neelwa Balaodipharephare dikantorong tša Ditonakgolo.

src_text: Umhlangano Wezokuphepha Weentimela Emazweni Ngamazwe (i-IRSC) Wehlandla Lama-32 Waqobemnyaka.
tgt_text: Pego ye šišintše gape le magato go hlahla dikgoro ka taolo ya dikontraka le Balaodipharephare.

src_text: IKhabinethi ivumele ukusingathwa koMhlangano we-IRSC wehlandla lama-32 waqobemnyaka ozakubanjelwa eJwanisbhege ukusukela mhlana li-01 ukuya nakasi-6 kuSewula wee-2023, ngaphasi kommongondaba othi: “Sivuselela Imizila Yeentimela Ebujameni Obunganatlha.”               .
tgt_text: Peakanyo ye Fetlekilwego ya Taolo ya Bodiragatši go Balaodipharephare gare ya fetlekwa gore gate ka mošito tee le diphetogo tšeo di dumeletšwego.

src_text: I-IRSC yikundla yamazwe ngamazwe ehlanganisa abosomakghonofundwa bezokuphepha kweentimela bephasi loke kobanyana bazokubonisana ngabakwaziko, ngomnqopho wokwenza bona imizila yeentimela iphephe ngcono.
tgt_text: Tona ya Motšwaoswere ya Ditirelo tša Mmušo le Tsamaišo, Ntate Thulas Nxesi tlare mo bekeng ye tlago sware kopano ya tshedimošetšo ya babegaditaba go hlatholla Tlhako ya Bosetšhaba ya Phethagatšo go fihlelela Bokgoni Ditirelong tša Mmušo le gape go hlatholla gabotse diphetogo tše dumeletšwego dipeelanong tša go thwalwa ga Balaodipharephare.
Pego ya Bohlano ya Mošomo ka Phethagatšo ya Sengwalwa sa Makgoraditsela ka Ditokelo tša Batho ba go Phela ka Bogole (WPRPD) 2020-.

src_text: Njengelunga le-IRSC, umLawuli wezokuPhepha kwemiZila yeenTimela eSewula Afrika ugcine ukusingatha lekundla ngomnyaka wee-.
tgt_text: Kabinete dumeletše Pego ya Bohlano ya Mošomo ka phethagatšo ya WPRPD, yeo fanago ka seemo sa bjale ka phethagatšo ya WPRPD.

src_text: Umtlamo Womthangalasisekelo Welizweloke Wee-2050 (i-NIP 2050) Wesigaba sesi-.
tgt_text: Pego ye akaretša le ditshwayotshwayo go tšwa dikgorong tša mmušo tša bosetšhaba le tša profense fana ka seemo sa bjale ka phethagatšo ya pholisi ye akaretšago diriparipana tša ditekanyetšokabo..   Pego ya mathomo ya seemo sa mošomo ya ngwaga ka ngwaga phatlaladitšwe ka.

src_text: IKhabinethi ikuvumele ukugazedwa komtlamo we-NIP 2050 kobanyana kuyokubonisanwa ngawo nomphakathi.
tgt_text: Pego ye ya bohlano dumeletšwe go gatišwa kuranteng ya mmušo le go phatlalatšwa ke Kgoro ya Basadi, Baswa le Batho ba go Phela ka Bogole.

src_text: Ihlelweli likhanyisa indlela ngokuqiniswa nokungezelelwa kwamaphrojekthi karhulumende aqakathekileko nalungelelweko.
tgt_text: Phetošo ya Athikele ya 20(1) ya Kopano ya Phedišo ya Mehuta ka Moka ya Kgethollo Kgahlanong le Basadi (CEDAW).
Kabinete dumeletše tlhagišo Palamenteng ya Phetošo ya Athikele 20(1) ya CEDAW gore dumelelwe.

src_text: Umtlamo lo ukhomba amaphrojekthi aqakathekileko ekwakhelweni kwabantu iindawo zokuhlala; egezini kamasipala, emanzini; ekulahlweni kweenzibi; iinthuthi zomphakathi; umthangalasisekelo wezefundo newezepilo; umthangalasisekelo wehlelo ledijithali kunye nobulelesi nobukhohlakali.
tgt_text: Diphetošo tše di fana ka nako ye teletšana ya dikopano tša komiti tša go lebelela dipego tša mebušo ye lego maloko.

src_text: Isakheko sehlelweli siveza inembombono yomsebenzi ekufuze wenziwe, sicozulule ubujamo bezinto banje, sendlale ubujamo obuqakathekileko obuzakuphumelelisa izinto sibe sitjho nokuthi kufuze kwenziweni ukuphumelelisa inembombono.
tgt_text: Afrika Borwa saenetše kwano ye ka 1993 le go dumelela moragonyana ga fao ka Manthole.

src_text: Siphakamisa ukuthi ihlelo lokuphumelelisa lokhu lenziwe ngeminyaka emithathu.
tgt_text: Tlhagišo ye Palamenteng šetšane le go tsamaiša ka mošito tee kwano ye dumeletšwego kua morago gotee le phetošo ya Athikele 20(1) ya kwano ye.
Kwano ya Lefase ka Bophara ka Kamogelo ya Mangwalo Thuto Mabapi le Thuto ya Godingwana.

src_text: Umtlamo Womthetho Welizwe Onqophe Ukwenza Ikoro Yezabasebenzi Bakarhulumende Isebenze Ngokukhanyiselwa Makghonofundwa.
tgt_text: Kabinete dumeletše tlhagišo Palamenteng ya Kwano ya Lefase ka Bophara ka Kamogelo ya Mangwalo Thuto mabapi le Thuto ya Godingwana gore dumelelwe.

src_text: IKhabinethi ivumele umTlamo wokuPhumelelisa weliZweloke onqophe ukwenza iKoro yezabaSebenzi bakaRhulumende isebenze ngobucwephetjhe.
tgt_text: Ge šetše dumeletšwe tla romelwa Mokgatlong wa Ditšhabakopano (UN) wa Thuto, Saenthefiki le tša Setšo le go kgontšhwa go šoma ka mo nageng ka Molao wa Bosetšhaba wa Tlhako ya Mangwalo Thuto, 2008 (Molao 67 wa 2008).

src_text: Umtlamo lo wamenyezelwa ngomnyaka wee-2021 kobanyana kubonisanwe ngawo nomphakathi.
tgt_text: Kwano ye ya Lefase ka Bophara hloma metheo ya motlalanaga ya temogo ya go se tšee lehlakore le ya go se kgetholle ya mangwalo thuto ya godingwana le mangwalo thuto ka kakaretšo dumelela temogo ya mangwalo thuto dinagašele mo mebušo ye 193 ye lego maloko UN.
Kgogelomorago ya Diphetošo tša Tlhahli ya Maloko Komitiphethiši.

src_text: Umtlamo lo uqalelela iingaba zeensika ezihlanu zokuphumelelisa umsebenzi wokwenza iKoro yezabaSebenzi bakaRhulumende iragwe ngobucwephetjhe.
tgt_text: Kabinete dumeletše kwalakwatšo ye kwalakwaditšwego ke Kantoro ya Mopresidente ka Mošupologo, 17 Diphalane 2022 go gogelamorago diphetošo tšeo di dirilwego go Tlhahli ya Maloko Komitiphethiši, yeo bitšwago Pukukgakollo ya Ditona, ya..   Diphetošo tše di dirilwego ka Moranang 2022 di fane ka thekgo ya tlaleletšo go tše dingwe tša dikantoro tša Ditona tšeo di rwelego maikarabelo lefapha la go feta le tee.

src_text: Sigaba sokufuna abantu abasese ngaphandle kwekoro yabaSebenzi bakaRhulumende nokukhetha esele bangaphakathi; kujayezwa indawo nokulungelelwa nomsebenzi; ukulungiselela umsebenzi nokulawulwa kwendlela yokusebenza; ukufunda isiphelani nokuthuthuka ngobucwephetjhe, nokuthuthuka ngebizelo lomsebenzi nangezehlakalo zemsebenzini.
tgt_text: Diphetošo tše di be di nyaka gore Mmušo rwale maikarabelo ka botlalo disenyegelo tša go amana le kabo ya mohlagase le meetse madulong semmušo go dulwa ke maloko komitiphethiši..   Kabinete lemogile dipelaelo tšeo di hlagišitšwego ke maloko setšhaba ebile tšeere sephetho sa go sekaseka Tlhahli ya Maloko Komitiphethiši.

src_text: Amatjhuguluko Wemibandela Yomsebenzi KubaNqophisi Zombelele (ama-DG).
tgt_text: Tshepedišo ye šogašogwa ke setheo sa go se tšee lehlakore ebile ge fihlile mafelelong, tlhahli ye tlo phatlalatšwa setšhabeng ka wepsaete ye ya Kgoro ya Ditirelo tša Mmušo le Tsamaišo: www.dpsa.gov.za.

src_text: IKhabinethi ivumele umbiko ophakamisa amagadango wokuqinisa amandla nekghono labo-DG eKorweni yemBusweni.
tgt_text: Kgwerano Diphetogong tša Enetši tša go se Tšee Lehlakore (JETP) le Leano la Dipeeletšo la JETP (JETP-IP).

src_text: Umbiko lo wenze iimphakamiso ezimbadlwana, hlangana nazo ekukhona nezikhuluma ngesikhathi ekumele sihlalwe bo-DG eenkhundleni zabo kunye nokulawulwa kwemisebenzi yokuphathiswa ziimPhathimandla eziPhetheko eemphathimandleni ezilawulako.
tgt_text: Ka morago ga go amogela tlhagišo ka JETP le JETP-IP, Kabinete thekgile ka atla pedi ETP-IP le go laetša ka fao kgotsofetšego ka gona ka mošomo wa go tsenelela wo dirilwego go kaonafatša..   JETP-IP hlatholla dipeeletšo tšeo di nyakegago go fihlelela maikgafo go fediša khabone ao dirilwego ke Mmušo wa Afrika Borwa mola ka go le lengwe go hlohleletšwa tlhabollo ya go swarelela nako ye teletšana, le go netefatša gore go fihlelelwa diphetogo tša go se tšee lehlakore go bašomedi bao ba amegago le setšhaba..   Komiti ya Magareng ga Ditona ka Phetogo ya Klaemete tlare go se goye kae ya swara tshedimošetšo le babegaditaba go fana ka tshedimošo ka botlalo   Melaokakanywa.
Molaokakanywa wa 2022 wa Dinamelwakepe tša Bagwebi.

src_text: Umbiko lo godu uphakamise nokuthi u-DG e-Ofisini kaMengameli uzakubekwa esikhundleni sokuba yiHloko yokuLawula ukuSebenza emBusweni.
tgt_text: Kabinete dumeletše tlhagišo Palamenteng ya Molaokakanywa wa 2022 wa Dinamelwakepe tša Bagwebi gore lebelelwe goya pele.

src_text: Eemfundeni, umsebenzi lo uzakunikelwa abo-DG ema-ofisini waboNdunakulu.
tgt_text: Molaokakanywa wo mpshafatša Molao wa Dinamelwakepe tša Bagwebi wa go ba le mengwaga ye 70 ka bogolo, 1951 (Molao 57 wa 1951).

src_text: Ukudlula lapho, umbiko lo uphakamise namagadango wokubonisa iminyango karhulumende ngokuphathwa nokulawulwa kwamakontraga womsebenzi wabo-DG.
tgt_text: Ge šetše dumeletšwe, Molaokakanywa wo tlo fana ka tlhako ya semolao ya dinamelwakepe tša Bagwebi go laola magatokamano dikepe.
Molaokakanywa wo, magareng ga tše dingwe tla laola tlhamo, boingwadišo, go rea maina le go ntšhwa ga dikepe.

src_text: Ihlelo elibuyekeziweko lokuLawulwa kweNdlela yokuSebenza kwabo-DG lisabuyekezwa njenganje, kobanyana lizokukhambisana namatjhuguluko avunyiweko.
tgt_text: Diphetošo tše di tlo ba le seabe tsošološong ya lefapha la dinamelwa tša mabopong le go tsamaiša naga ye ka mošito tee le Kwano ya Mokgatlo wa Boditšhabatšhaba wa tša Mabopo.
Afrika Borwa dumeletše kwano ye.

src_text: UmJaphethe kaNgqongqotjhe weKoro yezabaSebenzi bakaRhulumende nokuPhatha, uNom.
tgt_text: Molaokakanywaphetošwa wa 2020 wa Dipalopalo.

src_text: Thulas Nxesi, ngeveke ezako le uzokubiza umhlangano weendaba lapho ayokwethula khona umtlamo wokuPhumelelisa weliZweloke ngokwenza iKoro yabaSebenzi bakaRhulumende isebenze ngokuletha ubucwephetjhe, abuye ahlathulule namatjhuguluko avunyiweko emibandeleni yokusebenza yabo-DG.
tgt_text: Kabinete dumeletše tlhagišo Palamenteng ya Molaokakanywaphetošwa wa 2022 gore lebelelwe goya pele.

src_text: Umbiko Wesihlanu Ngokuphunyeleliswa Kombikomthethokambiso Ngamalungelo Wabantu Abanokukhubazeka (i-WPRPD) 2020-.
tgt_text: Molaokakanywa wo šišinya phetošo ya Molao wa Dipalopalo, 1999 (Molao 6 wa 1999).

src_text: IKhabinethi ivumele umBiko weNdima weHlandla lesiHlanu ngokuphunyeleliswa kwe-WPRPD, enikela ubujamo bezinto bamva nje ngokuphunyeleliswa kwe-WPRPD.
tgt_text: Diphetošo tše di fana ka tlhabollo le phethagatšo ya Peakanyo ya Bosetšhaba ya Dipalopalo yeo thekgago diphetho tša go ba le bohlatse..   Di matlafatša tšhomišano ye lego gona magareng ga Dipalopalo tša Afrika Borwa le ditho tše dingwe tša mmušo, ebile di nabiša tlhako ya taolo ya Molao wo   Ditiragalo tšeo di Tlago.

src_text: Umbiko lo uphethe imibono evela eminyangweni karhulumende welizwe loke neyeemfunda.
tgt_text: Samiti ya Bosetšhaba ya Lesolo la Mopresidente ka Dikgwebopotlana, tše Nnyane le tša Magareng (di-SMME) le Dikoporasi.

src_text: Uphethe zamva nje ngokuphunyeleliswa komthethokambiso ophethe nokwabiwa kwesabelo seemali.
tgt_text: Kgoro ya Tlhabollo ya Dikgwebo tše Nnyane, ka kgwebišano le bakgathatema ba lefapha la praebete tla swara Samiti ya Bosetšhaba ya Lesolo la Mopresidente ka Dikgwebopotlana, tše Nnyane le tša Magareng (di-SMME) le Dikoporasi gola Bryanston, Gauteng go tloga ka la 13 go fihla ka la 15 Dibatsela..   Samiti ye tla kopantšha mmogo bakgathatema ba bohlokwa ba praebete le ba lekala la mmušo ka gare ga peakanyo ya dikgwebo tše nnyane, go rerišana ka go hwetša ditsela tša go šomišana mmogo go matlafatša lefapha le.
Bakgathatema bao ba letetšwego ba akaretša lekgotla la dikgwebo, ditsebi tša di-SMME, bahlami ba dipholisi le ditheo tša tlhabollo ya ditšhelete.

src_text: Umbiko wokuthoma waqobemnyaka wamenyezelwa ngomnyaka wee-.
tgt_text: Samiti ye tla rerišana le ka Leanolegolo la Bosetšhaba la Mohlakanelwa la Dikgwebo tše Nnyane, leo le fanago ka tlhako ye logetšwego maano ya go matlafatša lefapha la di-SMME.

src_text: Umbiko wendima wehlandla lesihlanu lo uvunyelwe ukugazedwa bewumenyezelwe mNyango wezaboMma, zeLutjha nezabaNtu abanokuKhubazeka.
tgt_text: Samiti ye go letetšwe gape gore tsebagatše Difoka tša Ngwaga ka Ngwaga tša Bosetšhaba tša Mopresidente tša di-SMME.

src_text: Ukutjhugululwa Kwendinyana 20(1) Yesivumelwano Sokuqedwa Kwazo Zoke Iindlela Zokubandlululwa Kwabantu Abasikazi (i-CEDAW).
tgt_text: Go Swarwa ga Samiti ya bo-2022 ya Dikgaruru tša go Ikala ka Bong le Polao ya Basadi.

src_text: IKhabinethi ivumele ukudluliselwa ePalamende kwamatjhuguluko weNdinyana 20(1) ye-CEDAW kobanyana ayokufakazelwa.
tgt_text: Mopresidente Ramaphosa tla swara Samiti ya Bobedi ya Mopresidente ya GBVF kua Sentharengkgoparara ya Gallagher gola Gauteng ka la 1 le la 2 Dibatsela.

src_text: Amatjhuguluko la avula ithuba lokwelulwa kwesikhathi semihlangano yekomidi esebenza imibiko yemibuso emalunga.
tgt_text: Samiti ya mathomo ye bego swerwe ka 2018 šomišitšwe go itlama ka boswa ga mmušo le bagwebišani ba leago go fediša ditiragalo tše lego godimo tša dikgaruru kgahlanong le basadi ka mo nageng..   Samiti ya bobedi tla šomišwa go sekaseka pele kgatelopele ye fihleletšwego ya Leano la Bosetšhaba le Logetšwego Maano ka GBVF.

Yona tlo swarwa ka fase ga morero wo: “Boikarabelo, Potlakišo le Tlaleletšo GONA BJALE”..   Samiti ye tla rerišana ka, magareng ga tše dingwe, go hwetša mekgwa ya go potlakiša magato le boikarabelo go tšwa dikgorong tše bohlokwa le bakgathatema ka moka ba go akaretša mekgatlo ye lego setšhabeng, lefapha la praebete le bašomi..   Imbizo ya Bohlano ya Mopresidente kua Kapa Leboa.

src_text: ISewula Afrika yatlikitla isivumelwanesi ngomnyaka we-1993 yase ilandelisa ngokusiqinisa ngokusifakazela ngoNobayeni we-.
tgt_text: Imbizo ya Mopresidente ya Mmotlolo wa Bohlano wa Tlhabollo ya Dilete (DDM) go la Upington, Kapa Leboa tla phethagala ka Labohlano, 21 Diphalane 2022 Lepatlelong la fao la Mxolisi Dicky Jacobs Stadium..   Imbizo ya Mopresidente ya DDM tlo sekaseka kgatelopele ya kabo ya ditirelo le ditlhotlo tša kua Kapa Leboa le go tsena seemo seo ka bogare go rarolla ditlhotlo tšeo.

src_text: Ukudluliselwa ePalamende kunqophe ukuthomanisa isivumelwano esasifakazelwe phambilini nesikhibelelo seNdinyana 20(1) yesivumelwanesi.
tgt_text: DDM netefatša gore thulaganyo ya kabo ya ditirelo, phethagatšo le bolekanyetši ba monwana le lenala go kaonafatša kabo ya ditirelo bathong..   Ka gona go itokišetša Imbizo ye, Ditona, maloko makgotlaphethiši le dimeyara ba tlo tsenela ditiragalo tša go fihlelela setšhaba ka gare ga Upington le go potologa..   Pego ya Pholisi ya Tekanyetšokabo ya Paka ya Magareng (MTBPS).

src_text: Isivumelwano Sephasi Loke Ngokwamukeleka Kweencwadi Zefundo Ephakemeko.
tgt_text: Kabinete dumela gore MTBPS ya 2022 yeo tlo hlagišwago ke Tona ya Ditšhelete Enoch Godongwana ka Laboraro, 26 Diphalane 2022 ke karolo ye bohlokwa ya tshepedišo ya phatlalatša le ya boikarabelo ya bolekanyetši..   MTBPS ke mokgwa wa go phethagatša maikgafo mmušo ntle le go fetiša magomokakaretšo disenyegelo ao mmušo ka kgonang hlatholla goya pele ka fao mmušo tla netefatšago gore disenyegelo ga di fete letseno, le go dira tše ntši ka didirišwa tše lego gona..   Ditlhahlobo tša Marematlou.

src_text: IKhabinethi ivumele ukudluliselwa ePalamende kwesiVumelwano sePhasiloke ngokwaMukeleka kweeNcwadi zeFundo ePhakemeko kobanyana siqinisekiswe ngokufakazelwa.
tgt_text: Ditlhahlobo tša 2022 tša Bosetšhaba tša Mphato wa Marematlou di thoma ka la 31 Diphalane le go fela ka la 7 Manthole.

src_text: Sizakuthi singafakazelwa bese sifakwa ePhikweni lezeFundo nezeSayensi nezamaSiko leHlangano yeenTjhaba eziBumbeneko (i-UNESCO), bese sinikelwa amandla wokusebenza ekhethwapha ngomthetho wee-2008 weeNcwadi zeFundo zeliZwe (umThetho 67 wee-2008).
tgt_text: Kabinete lakaletša Barutwana ba Marematlou ba 2022 mahlatse le mahlogonolo ge ba le gare ba tsena kgatong ya mafelelofelelo ya leeto la dithuto tša bona.

Thekgo ye tšwelagopele go tšwa go barutiši, batswadi le bahlokomedi tla fihla kgole go thuša bona barutwana ba go itebanya le ditlhahlobo tše ka boitshepho..   Kabinete hlohleletša batswadi le bahlokomedi go kgatha tema ya bona ka go hlohleletša le go šušumetša barutwana, le go dira gore go kgonagale gore ba kgone go ithuta ge ba le gae.

src_text: IsiVumelwano sePhasi lesi sivula ikambisolawulo eyembatha koke, ngokwamukelwa kweencwadi zefundo ephakemeko ngendlela elungileko, neyenzelwa emkhanyweni nengabandlululiko.
tgt_text: Leanotlhabollo la Bosetšhaba (NDP) le Khonferense ya Mabokgoni Mmušo.

src_text: Ivumela ukwamukeleka kweencwadi zefundo zamazwe wangaphandle emazweni ali-193 amalunga weHlangano yeenTjhaba eziBumbeneko (i-UN).
tgt_text: Kgoro ya Ditirelo tša Mmušo le Tsamaišo, ka tšhomišano le Khomišene ya Bosetšhaba ya Dithulaganyo le Sekolo sa Yunibesithi ya KwaZulu-Natal sa Thutotlhabollo tlo swara Khonferense ya NDP le ya Mabokgoni Mmušo go thoma ka la 7 go fihla ka la 9 Dibatsela 2022 Khamphaseng ya Kholetše ya Howard, Yunibesithing ya KwaZulu-Natal..   Khonferense ye tlo lebelela mabokgoni mmušo bodiragatši ka mengwaga ya mathomo ye lesome ya NDP, ebile tlo swarwa ka fase ga morero wo: “Tebeledišišo ya Mabokgoni Mmušo le Bodiragatši bja Mmušo ka mengwaga ya mathomo ye lesome ya NDP”.

src_text: Ukubuyiselwa Emva Kwamatjhuguluko Wekombandlela Yamalunga Wesigungu Esiphetheko   .
tgt_text: Neelano ya Sethikifikeithi sa go Amogela Kgoši Misuzulu KaZwelithini Bjalo ka Kgoši.

src_text: IKhabinethi ivumele isimemezelo esenziwe yi-Ofisi kaMengameli ngoMvulo womhla we-17 kuSewula wee-2022 sokuwabuyisela emva amatjhuguluko weKombandlela yamaLunga wesiGungu esiPhetheko, ebuye ibizwe nangokuthi yiNcwajana YaboNgqongqotjhe, yomnyaka wee-.
tgt_text: Mopresidente Ramaphosa tla neelana ka Sethifikeithi sa go Amogela Kgoši Misuzulu KaZwelithini bjalo ka Kgoši Lepatlelong la Moses Mabhida go la Durban ka Mokibelo, 29 Diphalane.

src_text: Iinkhibelelo ezenziwa ngoSihlabantangana wee-2022 bezivumela ukungezelelwa kwabasebenzi neensetjenziswa kamanye ama-ofisi waboNgqongqotjhe abaphethe iinkhundla ezingaphezu kesisodwa.
tgt_text: Se se latela moletlo wa setšo wa go hlomamiša kgoši wa go bitšwa “Ukungena eSibayeni” wa yena Kgošikgolo wo bego swerwe ka la 20 Phato 2022, fao go ona hlomamišitšwego bjalo ka kgoši ya Setšhaba sa MaZulu   Melaetša.

src_text: Bekafuna nokuthi umBuso uwugcine ngokupheleleko umthwalo weendleko zegezi namanzi ezindlini zombuso ezihlala amalunga wesigungu esiphethe umbuso.
tgt_text: DitebogišoKabinete lebiša ditebogišo tša yona le go lakaletša bao ba latelago mahlatse: Ntate Sam Matekane, Tonakgolo ya Mmušo wa Lesotho.

Kabinete bile le Baromiwa ba AU ba Bahlokomedi ba Dikgetho Dikgethong tša Kgothakgothe tša Bosetšhaba Pušong ya Lesotho ge ba be ba reta peakanyo ye buditšwego ya dikgetho ya sepolotiki ya Batho ba Pušo ya Lesotho ge ba swere dikgetho tše atlegilego.

src_text: IKhabinethi izitjhejile iinghonghoyilo ezizwakaliswe mphakathi yabe yaqunta ukuthi iyibuyekeze iKombandlela YamaLunga WesiGungu EsiPhetheko.
tgt_text: Afrika Borwa santše ikgafetše go maatlafatša le go boelanya dikamano tša magareng ga dinaga gotee le go kaonafatša tšhomišano mererong ya selete, ya kontinente le ya lefase ka bophara ya go tsenelana.

src_text: Lomsebenzi-ke uzakusetjenzwa sijamiso esithiyeleleko, esizakuthi singaqeda, bese ikomba le imenyezelwa emphakathini ngobunzinzolwazi bomNyango weKoro yabaSebenzi bakaRhulumende obuthi: www.dpsa.gov.za.
tgt_text: Mahloko Kabinete lebiša mahloko yona go ba lapa le bagwera ba: Ntate Albert Nolan (88), Moruti wa Boikgafo wa Kereke ya Afrika Borwa ya Khatholiki yo bego sa dumelelane le mebono ya sedumedi ya go hlohleletša le go šireletša peakanyo ya mmušo wa kgethollo.

src_text: Ukusebenzisana Ngobulungiswa[okulungileko] Ngezeembaseli (i-JETP) Nehlelo Lamasiso Le-JETP  (i-JETP-IP).
tgt_text: Ka 2003, Mopresidente wa nako yeo Thabo Mbeki mo file Sefoka sa Luthuli sa Silibere ka boikgafo bja gagwe bja bophelo ka moka phenkgišanong ya temokrasi, ditokelo tša botho le toka le go se kwane le ditlwaedi tša sedumedi kudukudu tšeo di fahlelago ka mabaka go bea gabotse le go šireletša mmušo wa kgethollo   Bao ba Thwetšwego Mešomong.

src_text: 1  Ngemva kokwamukela kwayo ukwethulwa kwe-JETP ne-JETP-IP, iKhabinethi iyivumile i-JETP-IP, yabe yezwakalisa nokuthokozela kwayo umsebenzi ongeneleleko esele uthonyiwe wokuyakha.
tgt_text: Batho ka moka bao ba thwetšwego mešomong mangwalo bona thuto tlo kgonthišišwa ka tsela ye maleba   Moadbokheiti James Mlawu – Molaodipharephare: Kgoro ya Dinamelwa   Ntate Shabeer Khan – Mmaledipharephare: Matlotlo Bosetšhaba.
Kabinete kwanetše go thwalwa ga bao ba latelago:.

src_text: I-JETP-IP icozulula amasiso afunekako ukufika emnqopheni osibopho esenziwe ngurhulumende weSewula Afrika sokuqeda irhasi ikhabhoni-dayoksayidi, ukube ngahlanye ukhwezelela ituthuko ebambelelako, bekuqinisekiswa nokuthi abasebenzi abathintekako nomphakathi othintekako bakghone ukweyamela ehlelweni lamatjhuguluko nokuvikelwa kwebhoduluko.
tgt_text: Maloko Boto ya Afrika Borwa ya tša Boeti   Ngaka Nondumiso Maphazi (Modulasetulo)   Ngaka Aubrey Mhlongo (Motlatša Modulasetulo)   Mme Pretty Ntombela   Mme Nomahlubi Mazwai   Ntate Odwa Mtati   Ntate Ravi Nadasen thwetšwe leboelela)   Ntate Enver Duminy thwetšwe leboelela)   Mme Nandipha Mzileni Mbulawa   Ntate Mduduzi Zakwe thwetšwe leboelela)   Mme Rosemary Anderson   Mme Lehlohonolo Rapodile; lel.
Mme Nonkqubela Silulwane (Moemedi wa Kgoro).

src_text: IKomidi eyiHlanganisela yaboNgqongqotjhe ngezamaTjhuguluko weTlayimethi khona duze nje izokubamba umhlangano weembikiindaba lapho izakumemezela khona eminye imininingwana     Imithethomlingwa.
tgt_text: Maloko Boto ya Lekoko la Taolo ya Sephethephethe Mebileng   Ngaka Eddie Mogalefi Thebe thwetšwe leboelela)   Mme Thandi Clara Thankge thwetšwe leboelela)   Moprofesara Maredi Mphahlele   Mme Nomusa Mufamadi (Modulasetulo)   Moadbokheiti Xola Stemela   Mme Lerato Magalo   Moprofesara Chitja Twala   Ntate Nkumeleni John Kudzingana   Mme Jaxa (Moleloko wa Tlaleletšo); le   Mme HM Mbanyele-Ntshinga (Moleloko wa Tlaleletšo).

src_text: Umthethomlingwa Wezerhwebo Lepahla Ekhanjiswa Ngemikhumbi Wee-.
tgt_text: Ntate Tshepo Monaheng – Mohlankediphethišimogolwane (CEO): Khamphani ya Kagodithokgwa ya Afrika Borwa (Kontraka ya gagwe mpshafaditšwe tekano ya mengwaga ye meraro).

src_text: IKhabinethi ivumele ukudluliselwa ePalamende komThethomlingwa wezeRhwebo lePahla eKhanjiswa ngemiKhumbi wee-2022 kobanyana iyowuqedelela.
tgt_text: Ntate Reginald Lavhelesani Demana – CEO: Kemedi ya Afrika Borwa ya Bosetšhaba ya Ditsela..   Mme Ditebogo Kgomo – CEO: Molekanyetši wa Bosetšhaba wa Nyuklea.

src_text: UmThethomlingwa lo uvuselela bewulungisa umThethomlingwa we-1951 wezokuRhweba ngePahla eKhanjiswa ngemiKhumbi esele uneminyaka ema-70 (umThetho 57 we-1951).
tgt_text: Ntate Risenga Maluleka – Radipalopalopharephare (Kontraka mpshafaditšwe).

src_text: Issues in the environment.
tgt_text: Issues in the environment.

src_text: Presidential Summit on Gender-Based Violence and Femicide (GBVF).
tgt_text: Presidential Summit on Gender-Based Violence and Femicide (GBVF).

src_text: Cabinet welcomed the hosting of the second Presidential Summit on GBVF at the Gallagher Estate in Midrand, Gauteng on 1 and 2 November 2022 under the theme: “Accountability, Acceleration and Amplification, NOW!”.
tgt_text: Cabinet welcomed the hosting of the second Presidential Summit on GBVF at the Gallagher Estate in Midrand, Gauteng on 1 and 2 November 2022 under the theme: “Accountability, Acceleration and Amplification, NOW!”.

src_text: The summit reflected on progress made in the implementation of declarations proposed during the 2018 Presidential Summit, which reaffirmed the country’s commitment to united, comprehensive and effective response to GBVF..
tgt_text: The summit reflected on progress made in the implementation of declarations proposed during the 2018 Presidential Summit, which reaffirmed the country’s commitment to united, comprehensive and effective response to GBVF..

src_text: Participants at the two-day summit accounted for work being done towards the implementation of the National Strategic Plan (NSP) on GBVF, which aims to provide multi-sectoral, coherent strategic policy and programming framework to strengthen coordinated national response to the crisis of GBVF by the government and country as whole..
tgt_text: Participants at the two-day summit accounted for work being done towards the implementation of the National Strategic Plan (NSP) on GBVF, which aims to provide multi-sectoral, coherent strategic policy and programming framework to strengthen coordinated national response to the crisis of GBVF by the government and country as whole..

src_text: The summit was the ideal platform to engage in honest and robust discussions around successes and challenges in the fight against GBVF.
tgt_text: The summit was the ideal platform to engage in honest and robust discussions around successes and challenges in the fight against GBVF.

src_text: It also showcased the need for collective action and how significant success can be achieved if adequate resources are provided and managed correctly.
tgt_text: It also showcased the need for collective action and how significant success can be achieved if adequate resources are provided and managed correctly.

src_text: The agreements reached at the summit have demonstrated the importance of the partnership that government has forged with civil society, business, development partners, the faith-based sector and other sectors to work together to deal with the scourge of GBVF..
tgt_text: The agreements reached at the summit have demonstrated the importance of the partnership that government has forged with civil society, business, development partners, the faith-based sector and other sectors to work together to deal with the scourge of GBVF..

src_text: Some of the interventions agreed upon included the need to allocate adequate funding to the NSP on GBVF, to implement consequence management mechanisms to ensure accountability, and to strengthen national, provincial and local accountability structures..
tgt_text: Some of the interventions agreed upon included the need to allocate adequate funding to the NSP on GBVF, to implement consequence management mechanisms to ensure accountability, and to strengthen national, provincial and local accountability structures..

src_text: Cabinet reiterated that all acts of violence and abuse will not be tolerated in our society.
tgt_text: Cabinet reiterated that all acts of violence and abuse will not be tolerated in our society.

src_text: Communities are urged to tackle the scourge of GBVF head-on by reporting perpetrators to law-enforcement agencies.
tgt_text: Communities are urged to tackle the scourge of GBVF head-on by reporting perpetrators to law-enforcement agencies.

src_text: Each sector of our society must play its part by creating conditions that make it difficult, if not impossible, for GBVF to thrive.
tgt_text: Each sector of our society must play its part by creating conditions that make it difficult, if not impossible, for GBVF to thrive.

src_text: Safety and security .
tgt_text: Safety and security .

src_text: Cabinet has reassured the public that the National Joint Operational and Intelligence Structure (NATJOINTS) – which comprises various government departments led by the State Security Agency, South African Police Service and South African National Defence Force – has an intelligence-driven capacity to deal with threats to our national security, including terrorism.
tgt_text: Cabinet has reassured the public that the National Joint Operational and Intelligence Structure (NATJOINTS) – which comprises various government departments led by the State Security Agency, South African Police Service and South African National Defence Force – has an intelligence-driven capacity to deal with threats to our national security, including terrorism.

src_text: Through NATJOINTS, the security of the country is assessed regularly for any possible security threat.
tgt_text: Through NATJOINTS, the security of the country is assessed regularly for any possible security threat.

src_text: As part of the cooperation agreements with other intelligence agencies from other countries, South Africa also benefits from the exchange of relevant intelligence information that can ensure the safety of the nation..
tgt_text: As part of the cooperation agreements with other intelligence agencies from other countries, South Africa also benefits from the exchange of relevant intelligence information that can ensure the safety of the nation..

src_text: Cabinet calls on the public to remain vigilant and to report any suspicious and illegal activities to law enforcement agencies.
tgt_text: Cabinet calls on the public to remain vigilant and to report any suspicious and illegal activities to law enforcement agencies.

src_text: Do not keep quiet; if you see something, say something – together we can keep the nation safe.
tgt_text: Do not keep quiet; if you see something, say something – together we can keep the nation safe.

src_text: 2022 Medium-Term Budget Policy Statement (MTBPS).
tgt_text: 2022 Medium-Term Budget Policy Statement (MTBPS).

src_text: Cabinet welcomed the bold measures introduced in the 2022 MTBPS to restore the health of our public finances, just as the world economy is taking dangerous turn for the worse..
tgt_text: Cabinet welcomed the bold measures introduced in the 2022 MTBPS to restore the health of our public finances, just as the world economy is taking dangerous turn for the worse..

src_text: The steps announced by Finance Minister Enoch Godongwana in Parliament, Cape Town on Wednesday, 26 October 2022, included narrowing our budget deficit greatly to improve our fiscal framework, support our economic standing and give South Africans every confidence in the future prospects of our economy.
tgt_text: The steps announced by Finance Minister Enoch Godongwana in Parliament, Cape Town on Wednesday, 26 October 2022, included narrowing our budget deficit greatly to improve our fiscal framework, support our economic standing and give South Africans every confidence in the future prospects of our economy.

src_text: The planned increase in contingency reserves allows us to deal with emergencies such as natural disasters.
tgt_text: The planned increase in contingency reserves allows us to deal with emergencies such as natural disasters.

src_text: The 2022 MTBPS further boosts our key priorities of infrastructure and service-delivery programmes, and provides additional relief to support the poor and vulnerable in our nation..
tgt_text: The 2022 MTBPS further boosts our key priorities of infrastructure and service-delivery programmes, and provides additional relief to support the poor and vulnerable in our nation..

src_text: Cabinet calls on all socio-economic sectors to partner with the government to uplift our economy to improve the lives of our citizens across the country.
tgt_text: Cabinet calls on all socio-economic sectors to partner with the government to uplift our economy to improve the lives of our citizens across the country.

src_text: South Africa – Spain relations.
tgt_text: South Africa – Spain relations.

src_text: Cabinet welcomed the outcome of the Official Visit to South Africa by Prime Minister Pedro Sánchez Pérez-Castejón of Spain to solidify the already strong relations between the two countries.
tgt_text: Cabinet welcomed the outcome of the Official Visit to South Africa by Prime Minister Pedro Sánchez Pérez-Castejón of Spain to solidify the already strong relations between the two countries.

src_text: The Prime Minister was accompanied by the Spanish Minister for Industry, Trade and Tourism, Ms Reyes Maroto, and business delegation.
tgt_text: The Prime Minister was accompanied by the Spanish Minister for Industry, Trade and Tourism, Ms Reyes Maroto, and business delegation.

src_text: The visit created opportunities for various South African sectors to meet with their Spanish counterparts and to deepen cooperation in trade and investment, science and innovation, arts and culture, sports and education.
tgt_text: The visit created opportunities for various South African sectors to meet with their Spanish counterparts and to deepen cooperation in trade and investment, science and innovation, arts and culture, sports and education.

src_text: This visit provided another boost to the country’s investment and economic growth drive.
tgt_text: This visit provided another boost to the country’s investment and economic growth drive.

src_text: Ethiopia – Tigray Peace Talks.
tgt_text: Ethiopia – Tigray Peace Talks.

src_text: South Africa, under the auspices of the African Union, hosted formal peace talks between the warring sides in the conflict in Ethiopia's Tigray region, from 25 to 30 October.
tgt_text: South Africa, under the auspices of the African Union, hosted formal peace talks between the warring sides in the conflict in Ethiopia's Tigray region, from 25 to 30 October.

src_text: The dialogue was facilitated by Nigeria’s former President Olusegun Obasanjo, Kenya's former President Uhuru Kenyatta and South Africa's former Deputy President Phumzile Mlambo-Ngcuka.
tgt_text: The dialogue was facilitated by Nigeria’s former President Olusegun Obasanjo, Kenya's former President Uhuru Kenyatta and South Africa's former Deputy President Phumzile Mlambo-Ngcuka.

src_text: Cabinet expressed its support for peaceful and sustainable solution to the conflict, in line with South Africa’s foreign policy objectives of secure and conflict-free continent   Cabinet Decisions.
tgt_text: Cabinet expressed its support for peaceful and sustainable solution to the conflict, in line with South Africa’s foreign policy objectives of secure and conflict-free continent   Cabinet Decisions.

src_text: National Integrated Small Enterprise Development (NISED) Strategic Framework.
tgt_text: National Integrated Small Enterprise Development (NISED) Strategic Framework.

src_text: Cabinet approved the NISED Strategic Framework for implementation.
tgt_text: Cabinet approved the NISED Strategic Framework for implementation.

src_text: The initial Integrated Strategy for the Promotion of Entrepreneurship and Small Enterprises (ISPESE) was adopted in.
tgt_text: The initial Integrated Strategy for the Promotion of Entrepreneurship and Small Enterprises (ISPESE) was adopted in.

src_text: The ISPESE and the subsequent NISED give effect to the 1995 White Paper on the National Strategy for the Development and Promotion of Small Business in South Africa.
tgt_text: The ISPESE and the subsequent NISED give effect to the 1995 White Paper on the National Strategy for the Development and Promotion of Small Business in South Africa.

src_text: The NISED Strategic Framework provides an integrated strategy to strengthen and support entrepreneurship for small and medium-sized enterprises.
tgt_text: The NISED Strategic Framework provides an integrated strategy to strengthen and support entrepreneurship for small and medium-sized enterprises.

src_text: It provides structured coordination framework for all key ecosystem role players in small to medium enterprise development.
tgt_text: It provides structured coordination framework for all key ecosystem role players in small to medium enterprise development.

src_text: In April this year, Cabinet approved the publication of the draft NISED strategic framework for public comment.
tgt_text: In April this year, Cabinet approved the publication of the draft NISED strategic framework for public comment.

src_text: Through the wide consultations, the strategy was enhanced by inputs from the public and from the National Economic Development and Labour Council, which is forum comprising business, civil society, labour, academics and government that seeks to deal with economic, labour and development issues and related challenges facing the country.
tgt_text: Through the wide consultations, the strategy was enhanced by inputs from the public and from the National Economic Development and Labour Council, which is forum comprising business, civil society, labour, academics and government that seeks to deal with economic, labour and development issues and related challenges facing the country.

src_text: Draft Policy on Social Development Services to Persons with Disabilities.
tgt_text: Draft Policy on Social Development Services to Persons with Disabilities.

src_text: Cabinet approved the publishing for public comment of the draft Policy on Social Development Services to Persons with Disabilities.
tgt_text: Cabinet approved the publishing for public comment of the draft Policy on Social Development Services to Persons with Disabilities.

src_text: The policy gives effect to the White Paper on the Rights of Persons with Disabilities and the United Nations (UN) Convention on the Rights of Persons with Disabilities (UNCPRD).
tgt_text: The policy gives effect to the White Paper on the Rights of Persons with Disabilities and the United Nations (UN) Convention on the Rights of Persons with Disabilities (UNCPRD).

src_text: The policy guides the Department of Social Development in the provision of its services to persons with disabilities and their respective families.
tgt_text: The policy guides the Department of Social Development in the provision of its services to persons with disabilities and their respective families.

src_text: It outlines the restrictive environment and barriers that continue to marginalise and exclude persons with disabilities from mainstream society, and from participating in social and economic activities.
tgt_text: It outlines the restrictive environment and barriers that continue to marginalise and exclude persons with disabilities from mainstream society, and from participating in social and economic activities.

src_text: It proposes monitoring mechanisms that will ensure closer tracking of its implementation and mainstream interventions within the relevant departments.
tgt_text: It proposes monitoring mechanisms that will ensure closer tracking of its implementation and mainstream interventions within the relevant departments.

src_text: South Africa is signatory to the UNCPRD and the African Charter on Human and People’s Rights on the Rights of Persons with Disabilities in Africa..   Intergovernmental Panel on Climate Change (IPCC) Meeting.
tgt_text: South Africa is signatory to the UNCPRD and the African Charter on Human and People’s Rights on the Rights of Persons with Disabilities in Africa..   Intergovernmental Panel on Climate Change (IPCC) Meeting.

src_text: The IPCC Bureau will be convening its seventh assessment cycle meeting in June.
tgt_text: The IPCC Bureau will be convening its seventh assessment cycle meeting in June.

src_text: The IPCC – which comprises panel of 195-member governments under the UN – is responsible for assessing the available scientific, technical and socio-economic knowledge, so as to advise decision-makers about the causes, impacts and responses to climate change.
tgt_text: The IPCC – which comprises panel of 195-member governments under the UN – is responsible for assessing the available scientific, technical and socio-economic knowledge, so as to advise decision-makers about the causes, impacts and responses to climate change.

src_text: During its meeting in 2023, the IPCC is expected to elect new chairperson for its seventh assessment cycle.
tgt_text: During its meeting in 2023, the IPCC is expected to elect new chairperson for its seventh assessment cycle.

src_text: Cabinet has endorsed the nomination of Prof Debra Roberts from the University of KwaZulu-Natal for this position.
tgt_text: Cabinet has endorsed the nomination of Prof Debra Roberts from the University of KwaZulu-Natal for this position.

src_text: Prof Roberts has championed increased IPCC outreach work in Africa.
tgt_text: Prof Roberts has championed increased IPCC outreach work in Africa.

src_text: She is currently member of the IPCC Bureau.
tgt_text: She is currently member of the IPCC Bureau.

src_text: If elected she would be the first woman and person from Africa to chair this body.
tgt_text: If elected she would be the first woman and person from Africa to chair this body.

src_text: Her election will send positive message on the good work being done by female scientists from Africa  Upcoming events.
tgt_text: Her election will send positive message on the good work being done by female scientists from Africa  Upcoming events.

src_text: 2022 16 Days of Activism Campaign.
tgt_text: 2022 16 Days of Activism Campaign.

src_text: South Africa will join the world in participating in the annual 16 Days of Activism against GBV, which kicks off on 25 November, the International Day for the Elimination of Violence against Women, and runs until 10 December, Human Rights Day.
tgt_text: South Africa will join the world in participating in the annual 16 Days of Activism against GBV, which kicks off on 25 November, the International Day for the Elimination of Violence against Women, and runs until 10 December, Human Rights Day.

src_text: Cabinet approved this year’s concept and the theme as “Socio-Economic Rights and Empowerment to build women’s resilience against Gender-based violence and Femicide: Connect, Collaborate, Contract”.
tgt_text: Cabinet approved this year’s concept and the theme as “Socio-Economic Rights and Empowerment to build women’s resilience against Gender-based violence and Femicide: Connect, Collaborate, Contract”.

src_text: During the 16 Days of Activism for No Violence against Women and Children this year, South Africa will focus its awareness activities on the implementation of the NSP on GBVF.
tgt_text: During the 16 Days of Activism for No Violence against Women and Children this year, South Africa will focus its awareness activities on the implementation of the NSP on GBVF.

src_text: The plan aims to provide multi-sectoral, coherent strategic policy and programming framework to strengthen coordinated national response to the crisis of GBVF by the government and the country as whole.
tgt_text: The plan aims to provide multi-sectoral, coherent strategic policy and programming framework to strengthen coordinated national response to the crisis of GBVF by the government and the country as whole.

src_text: Disability Rights Awareness Month (DRAM) and National Day of Persons with Disabilities.
tgt_text: Disability Rights Awareness Month (DRAM) and National Day of Persons with Disabilities.

src_text: Cabinet approved the concept and the theme for the 2022 DRAM and National Day of Persons with Disabilities, which runs from 3 November to 3 December.
tgt_text: Cabinet approved the concept and the theme for the 2022 DRAM and National Day of Persons with Disabilities, which runs from 3 November to 3 December.

src_text: The theme is: “Empowering Persons with Disabilities through resourceful, sustainable and safe environments”..
tgt_text: The theme is: “Empowering Persons with Disabilities through resourceful, sustainable and safe environments”..

src_text: The theme emphasises the importance of resolving existing barriers affecting people with disabilities.
tgt_text: The theme emphasises the importance of resolving existing barriers affecting people with disabilities.

src_text: This includes ensuring resourceful, sustainable and safe environments for persons with disabilities, and also recognising that not all disabilities are visible.
tgt_text: This includes ensuring resourceful, sustainable and safe environments for persons with disabilities, and also recognising that not all disabilities are visible.

src_text: The month-long activities will raise awareness and also showcase the progress the country has made in ensuring the protection of the rights of persons with disabilities, as enshrined in the Constitution of the Republic of South Africa of.
tgt_text: The month-long activities will raise awareness and also showcase the progress the country has made in ensuring the protection of the rights of persons with disabilities, as enshrined in the Constitution of the Republic of South Africa of.

src_text: The activities will also highlight the need to address challenges experienced by persons with disabilities in the workplace and society   Messages.
tgt_text: The activities will also highlight the need to address challenges experienced by persons with disabilities in the workplace and society   Messages.

tgt_text: Congratulations Cabinet extended its congratulations and well-wishes to:  Edendale Technical Secondary School in KwaZulu-Natal for winning the CAF African School Football Championship.
