src_text: Ukuhlanganiswa kweenkampanezi, okuyokwakha abakhiqizi abakhulu botjwala elizweneli, kwenziwa ngokulandela imibandela ehlukahlukeneko yekareko yomphakathi, ekubalwa hlangana nayo ukuphakanyiswa kwetuthuko kezokuthumela, ukulungisa ukutholakala komkhiqizo welizwe, ukuphakanyiswa kwamasiso kezokurhubhulula nokuthuthukisa nokwandiswa kwamandla wokukhiqiza elizweneli.
tgt_text: Difatanaga tšeo di šomišwago ke Ditona le Batlatšatona ba tšona di sepelelana le Ministerial Handbook gomme mollwane wa theko bewa ke Tona ya Ditšhelete ka therišano le Tona ya Maphodisa ka ga didirišwa tša tšhireletšo tšeo di lokelwago difatanageng.

src_text: Ikhampani ehlanganyelweko le izokuphakamisa nobunikazi bezabelo kubasebenzi ngokusungula ihlelo labasebenzi lobunikazi bezabelo nokunikela abasebenzi ukujameleka ebhodini.
tgt_text: Didirišwa tša tšhireletšo ke karolo ye bohlokwa ge go etla go beweng ga mollwane wa theko, gomme ditiragalo tša gabjale tše bohloko tša Balekgotlaphethiši bao ba lahlegetšwego ke maphelo goba ba amegilego dikotsing tše kgolo tša difatanaga di gatelela bohlokwa bja taba ye gomme di swanetše go se amantšhe taba ye le go nyaka go holega ka sepolotiki..     Maloko ka moka Palamente na le maswanedi go ba le bašomi bao ba thušago go phethagatšeng mošomo wa bona.

src_text: Ukweluswa Kwetuthuko Yesizo Ngeenkhukhula Zomnyaka wee-.
tgt_text: Diphapano tša palo ya bašomi ba thekgo ka dikantorong tša Ditona ke ditlamorago tša nako yeo Tona ye itšego thwetšwego, ka ge bašomi ka moka ba na le dikonteraka tša go sepelelana le nako ya go thwalwa ga Tona.

src_text: Ikhabinethi yemukele umsebenzi owenziwe nguNgqongqotjhe wezokuHlaliswa kwabaNtu, uMma u-Mmamoloko Kubayi namalunga weMinMEC kezokuHlaliswa kwabaNtu ukuqalisisa iragelo phambili ngokuhlaliswa safuthi nokufunela indawo imindeni eyathintwa ziinkhukhula zango-2022 KwaZulu-Natala, njengombana ilizwe seliyokuhlanganisa umnyaka kwasahlela iinkhukhula ezimbi ezehlela ilizweli.
tgt_text: Se se hlolwa ke gore Ministerial Handbook ke tokomane ye šomago yeo lekolwago kgafetšakgafetša.

src_text: Ukudurhiswa Okumalungana neeMbonelelo Zemirholo yaboNgqongqotjhe namaSekela waboNgqongqotjhe.
tgt_text: Mopresidente fetišeditše Ministerial Handbook ya gabjale go Khomišene ye Ikemego ya Meputso ya Bahlankedi ba Setšhaba, yeo šetšego šomana le meputso ya bahlankedi ba mmušo yeo swanetšego go lekolwa     Diphetho tša Kabinete.

src_text: Ikhabinethi izwakalise ukutshwenyeka ngokungakhulunywa kuhle kweembonelelo zemirholo yaboNgqongqotjhe namaSekela waboNgqongqotjhe, ngokwendlela kutlolwe ngakho ku-Guide for Members of the Executive, eveza iimbonelelo zemirholo, zokurhwebelana neembonelelo zamalunga aphezulu embusweni ekwenzeni imisebenzi yawo ngefanelo.
tgt_text: Sethalwa sa Pholisi ya Basadi ka Dipapading.

src_text: Ukuhleleka kwe-Ministerial Housing kumphumela we-1910 Consensus mhlazana kusungulwa i- Union of South Africa eyayiveza amadorobha amathathu amakhulu weSewula Afrika, iPitori njengendawo yokuSebenzela komBuso, i-Bloemfontein njengendawo yeBandla lezomThetho, iKapa njengendawo yePalamende.
tgt_text: Kabinete dumeletše go phatlalatšwa ga sethalwa sa Pholisi ya Basadi ka Dipapading gore setšhaba se fane ka ditshwayatshwayo go yona.

src_text: Izindlu lezo ekuthiwa batjho ziinthabathaba zikanokutjho zoke njalo zatholakala ngaphambi komnyaka we-1994 kanti urhulumende owalandelako odoswa phambili yi-African National Congress – akwenzileko kuqinisekisa bona ziyalungiswa bona zibe sebujameni obufaneleko kobanyana kuzuzwe ngazo ekukhuphukeni kwentengo yokuthengiswa kwezindlu.
tgt_text: Pholisi ye hlaloša mekgwa yeo tlo tšweletšago pele le go thekga basadi ka dipapading le go netefatša gore mananeo go rarolla go se lekalekane ga bong ka dipapading tša go fapafapana le ka ditheong tša dipapadi ba gona lebelela gape mapheko go thibela basadi go tsena ka dipapading bjalo ka tlhlaelelo ya tšhelete ya thekgo, thekgo ya mašelengka dikhamphani gape le meputso ye sa kgotsofatšego.

src_text: AboNgqongqotjhe namaSekela waboNgqongqotjhe abasebenzisa izindlu zombuso bayayibhadela irente njengombana kusenza namalunga wePalamende.
tgt_text: Pholisi ye šišintšwego ikemišeditše go tšweletša pele koketšego ya go kgatha tema ka mafolofolo ga basadi ka dipapading le boetapeleng go swana le go ruta go ba mohlahli le go ba mohlankedi wa tshepedišo ya papadi.

src_text: Yeke-ke, kuzabe kuyinto engakalungi ukuthi aboNgqongqotjhe namaSekela waboNgqongqotjhe abanganavikeleko emsebenzinabo ukuthi bazitholele izindlu zangeqadi zokuhlala ibe basebenzela isitjhaba.
tgt_text: Pholisi lemoga gore go kgatha tema mo go oketšegilego ga basadi maemong dipapadi le boetapele go tla fokotša kudu gomme mafelelong gwa fediša go se lekalekane ga bong le mehuta ye fapafapanego ya kgethollo kgahlanong le basadi nyaka gape go tšweletša pele tekatekano le go netefatša gore basadi ba hwetša tlhompho goba temogo ka maemong profešenale, go akaretšwa meputso ya go lekana le ya boradipapadi ba banna.

src_text: Iinkoloyi ezisetjenziswa boNgqongqotjhe namaSekela waboNgqongqotjhe zikhambisana ne-Ministerial Handbook kanti isilinganiso sentengo yazo sibekwa nguNgqongqotjhe wezeeMali ngokusebenzisana noNgqongqotjhe wamaPholisa ehlangothini leemfanelo zokuvikela.
tgt_text: Go Swarwa ga Khonferentshe ya Boditšhabatšhaba ya Maphelo Bomme le Masea sa Tšwago Belegwa ya.

src_text: Iimfanelo zokuphepha ziqakatheke khulu ekubekweni kwentengo yazo kanti izehlakalo zamhlapha nje ezingakhange zibe zihle zokubhubha kwaboSomkhandlu namkha ukuthinteka eengozini ezimbi ngeenkoloyi kugandelele ukuqakatheka kwendaba le kanti kumele kususe indabamlonyeni le ekuphikisaneni ngokwepolotiki.
tgt_text: Kabinete file tumelelo ya gore Afrika Borwa sware Khonferentshe ya Boditšhabatšhaba ya Maphelo Bomme le Masea sa tšwago go belegwa, ka Cape Town go tloga ka la 8 go fihla ka la 11 Mopitlo 2023, moo bakgathatema ba go feta 1 000 go tšwa lefaseng ka bophara ba tlago kgobokana go akgofiša ditharollo tša go kaonafatša go phela ga bomma le masea ao sa tšwago go belegwa, le thibelo ya go goma tseleng ga basadi.

src_text: Woke amalunga wePalamende anefanelo yokuthi abe nabasizi ababasiza ukwenza imisebenzi yabo.
tgt_text: Afrika Borwa bile le kgatelopele ye kgolo tabeng ya go fihlelela diphetho tša Dinepo tša Tlhabollo ye Swarelelago tša Ditšhabakopano (UN) tša maphelo bomma le masea ao sa tšwago go belegwa, le thibelo ya go goma tseleng.

src_text: Umehluko okhona ngesibalo sabasebenzi ema-Ofisini waboNgqongqotjhe mphumela wesikhathi uNgqongqotjhe loyo akhethwe ngaso.
tgt_text: Naga tla holega gape kudu ka ge baemedi ba khonferentshe ba tla abelana, gareng ga tše dingwe, maano bona ao šomago gabotse le dilo tše mpsha ka ga merero ya maphelo bomma le masea ao sa tšwago go belegwa.

src_text: Lokhu kubangelwa kukuthi i-Ministerial Handbook imtlolo osebenzako onande ubuyekezwa.
tgt_text: Protšeke ya Tsela ya Bohwa bja Bolwalekgatelelo le Tokologo (RLHR).

src_text: UMengameli uthumele i-Ministerial Handbook esebenza kukunje ekomitjhinini ezijameleko i-Independent Commission for the Remuneration of Public Office Bearers, esebenza ngokubhadelwa kwabo boke abasebenzi bembusweni abaphethe iinkhundla bona ibuyekezwe  IinQunto zeKhabinethi.
tgt_text: Kabinete amogetše pego ya kgatelopele ye tletšego ka ga phethagatšo ya protšeke ya RLHR.

src_text: Umtlamo Womthethokambiso Wabomma Kezemidlalo.
tgt_text: Kabinete dumeletše gape gore Tona ya Dikamano tša Boditšhabatšhaba le Tirišano, le ya Toka le Ditirelo tša Tshokollo gore ba be karolo ya Komiti ya Magareng ga Ditona (IMC) ge go etla go RLHR.

src_text: IKhabinethi iphasise ukutlolwa ngokomthetho eencwadini zombuso komTlamo womThethokambiso waboMma kezemiDlalo bona umphakathi uzwakalise imibono.
tgt_text: RLHR ke protšeke ya bosetšhaba yeo lebanego le go gopola le go keteka tsela ya Afrika Borwa ya go ya tokologong.

src_text: Umthethokambiso lo ubeka amagadango azokuthuthukisa abe asekele abomma emkhakheni wezemidlalo nokuqinisekisa bona amahlelo asendimeni efaneleko wokutjheja imidlalo ngokwahlukahlukana nezakheko zayo.
tgt_text: Kabinete hlomile IMC go bea leihlo protšeke ye le go eta pele ka sepolotiki.

src_text: Ubuye utjheje iinqabo eziliya abomma  bona bangene kezemidlalo ezifana nokutlhogeka kwesizo lezeemali, isekelo kunye nokubhadelwa ngendlela enganelisiko.
tgt_text: Protšeke ye nyaka go akaretša mehuta ye fapanego ya go gopola boikgafo bjo balwelatokologo ba bo dirilego gore Afrika Borwa be ye lokologilego ya demokrasi dumelela gape go agwa ga dimusiamo, mafelo segopotšo, makgobapuku le mafelo go lota, gomme ikemišeditše go lemoga moya wa botee le tirišano gare ga MaAfrika.

src_text: Umthethokambiso otjhukunyiswako lo uhlose ukukhuthaza ukungena kwabomma kezemidlalo neenkhundleni zoburholi ezifana nokubandula nokuphatha imidlalo.
tgt_text: Yona thekgilwe ke UN gomme na le bokgoni bja go matlafatša tirišano ya batho ka go šomiša setšo le bohwa go ralala le kontinente.

src_text: Umthethokambiso lo utjheja bona ukwanda kwabomma kezemidlalo neenkhundleni zokuphatha kuzokuphungula kugcine kukuqedile ukungalingani ngokobulili kezemidlalo kunye nezinye izenzo zokubandlululwa kwabomma.
tgt_text: Mešongwana mmalwa yeo diregilego ka 2022 akaretša diketelo tša Ditona ka Botswana le Zimbabwe gammogo le peakanyo ya dikopano le Angola le Tanzania.

src_text: Ubuye uphakamise ukulingana nokuqinisekisa bona abomma bayahlonitjhwa namkha bayatjhejwa ngokwelwazi kezemidlalo, ekubalwa ukubhadelwa ngokulinganako nabalingani babo ngokomsebenzi abamadoda enza umsebenzi ofana newabo.
tgt_text: Mešongwana ya protšeke ye nepile go kgokaganya dinaga ka moka tša Borwa bja Afrika le go ruta baswa ka ga ntwa kgahlanong le bokoloniale le kgethollo ya semorafe.
Pholisi ye gape tla le ka tumelelo ya go bušetšwa ga mašaledi balwelatokologo ba Afrika Borwa bao ba bolokilwego ka dinageng dišele.

src_text: Ukusingathwa kwe-International Maternal and Newborn Health Conference -.
tgt_text: Mabitla ka bago 11 ao tsebegago le MaAfrika Borwa hlathilwe ka Zambia, go akaretšwa le la molwelatokologo, Morena Duma Nokwe.

src_text: IKhabinethi inikele iSewula Afrika ilungelo lokusingatha ikhonferensi i-International Maternal and Newborn Health Conference eKapa ukusuka nakabu-8 ukuya nakali-11 kuMrhayili 2023, lapho kuzabe kuhlangene ababelani abangaphezu kweKulungwana abavela ephasini zombelele ukuzokukhambiselela iinsombululo zokwenza ngcono ukusinda kwabomma abasidisi namasana, nokuvimba ukubelethwa kwabantwana sebathulile.
tgt_text: Pholisi ya Bosetšhaba ya go Fetolela Bokgabo, Setšo le Bohwa Ditšithaleng.

src_text: ISewula Afrika ibe nepumelelo ekulu ekufikeleleni lokho okuqothelwe yiHlangano yeenTjhaba eziBumbeneko i-United Nations Sustainable Development Goals wezepilo yabomma abasidisi namasana, nokuvimbela ukubelethwa kwamasana selathule.
tgt_text: Kabinete dumeletše Pholisi ya Bosetšhaba ya go Fetolela Bokgabo, Setšo le Bohwa Ditšithaleng gore phethagatšwe.

src_text: Ilizwe lekhethu lizokuzuza khulu nalo njengombana iinthunywa ezizabe zisekhonferensini hlangana nokhunye, zizokwabelana amaqhinga asebenzako neendlela ezihlelekileko ngeendaba zepilo yabomma abasidisi neyamasana.
tgt_text: Pholisi fa maatla mangwe go Pholisi ya Bosetšhaba ya go Fetolela Methopo ya Bohwa Ditšithaleng yeo hlamilwego ke Kgoro ya Bokgabo le Setšo ya nako yeo ka.

src_text: IPhrojekthi i-Resistance and Liberation Heritage Route (RLHR).
tgt_text: Pholisi ye lebeletše kudu go fetolela methopo ya bohwa ditšithaleng ka nepo ya go lota, phihlelelo le taolo ya go ba mong.

src_text: Ikhabinethi ifumene umbiko opheleleko weragelo phambili kezokuhlonywa kwephrojekthi i-RLHR.
tgt_text: Le ge le gore go fetolela ditšithaleng ke tshepedišo ya go fetolela diteng tša analoko go ya go diteng tša ditšithale, go akaretšwa direkhoto tša pampiri, maekrofitšhi le direkhoto tša theipi tšeo sego tša ditšithale, pholisi katološitše tlhalošo ye go methopo ya ditšithale yeo hlagilego le ya ditšithale ka tlhago go swana le tshedimošo yeo tšweleditšwego ka ditšithale, yeo ka se tsogego fetotšwe go ba yeo swaregago.

src_text: IKhabinethi ibuye yaphasisa nokuthi uNgqongqotjhe wezobuDlelwano bamaZwe ngamaZwe newezoBulungiswa nezokuHlengwa kweSimilo bona babe yincenye yeKomiti eHlanganyelweko yaboNgqongqotjhe (i-IMC) ku-RLHR.
tgt_text: Phetolelo go ditšithale tla ba le mehola ye megolo go naga ka ge tla kgontšha phihlelelo ye bonolo ya methopo ya tshedimošo, kudukudu yeo swerwego ke mafelo go lota, makgobapuku le dimusiamo.

src_text: I-RLHR iyiphrojekthi yesikhumbuzo sesitjhaba ekuhloswe ngayo ukukhumbula nokugidinga indlela eya eKululekweni yeSewula Afrika.
tgt_text: Pholisi ye tla phethagatšwa go ralala le mmušo le setšhaba     Molaokakanywa.

src_text: Ikhabinethi yasungula i-IMC bona ibe lilihlo lephrojekthi le begodu inikele nangoburholi bezepolotiki.
tgt_text: Molaokakanywaphetošo wa Merero ya Boahlodi wa.

src_text: Iphrojekthi le ifaka hlangana iindlela ezihlukahlukeneko zokukhumbula ukuzinikela okwenziwa balwelikululeko bona iSewula Afrika ibe lilizwe elitjhaphulukileko nelilawulwa yintando yenengi.
tgt_text: Kabinete dumeletše go romelwa ga Molaokakanywaphetošo wa Merero ya Boahlodi wa 2023 Palamenteng.

src_text: Ibuye ivumele bona kwakhiwe ama-museum, ama-monument, ama-library nama-archive, ngehloso yokutjheja umoya wokuzwelana nokusebenzisana kwabantu be-Afrika.
tgt_text: Molaokakanywa wo ikemišeditše go fetoša Melao ye mentšhi yeo laolwago ke Kgoro ya Toka le Tlhabollo ya Molaotheo ka go rarolla ditaba tša sethekniki le merero yeo amago phethagatšo ya Melao.

src_text: Iphasiswe yiHlangano yeenTjhaba eziBumbeneko begodu inekghono lokuqinisa isebenziswano labantu bekhontinenti ngokusebenzisa amasiko namagugu.
tgt_text: Molaokakanywa wo na le tše 37 tšeo di šišinyago diphetošo tša go lokiša diphošo tša molaotheo tša Melao ye fapafapanego     Ditiragalo tše di Tlago.

src_text: Hlangana nokwenzekileko ngomnyaka wee-2022 kubalwa amakhambo waboNgqongqotjhe wokuya e-Botswana ne-Zimbabwe kunye nemihlangano yokuhlela ebanjwe ne-Angola ne-Tanzania.
tgt_text: Letšatši la Ditokelo tša Botho.

src_text: Izenzo ezimalungana nephrojekthi le kuhloswe ngazo ukuhlanganisa amazwe we-Afrika engeSewula nokufundisa abantu abatjha ngomzabalazo wokuthathwa kwamanye amazwe abe ngaphasi kwamanye kunye nokubandlululana.
tgt_text: Mopresidente Ramaphosa tla fa polelokgolo mo tiragalong ya bosetšhaba ya Letšatši la Ditokelo tša Botho la 2023 ka Labobedi la 21 Hlakola 2023 kua Lepatlelong la De Aar West, ka Kapa Leboa.

src_text: Umthethokambiso lo uvumela nokuthi amathambo wabalwelikululeko beSewula Afrika asemazweni we-Afrika abuyiswe.
tgt_text: Moeno wa ngwaga wo ke: “Go Tiiša le go Tšweletša Setšo sa Ditokelo tša Botho go ya Bokamoso”, ge re gopola dipolao tša Sharpeville le Langa, le megwanto ye mengwe yeo diregilego ka la 21 Mopitlo 1960 nageng ka bophara.

src_text: Kunamathuna abalelwa ku-11 ekwaziwa bona ngewamaSewula Afrika akhonjwa e-Zambia, ekubalwa hlangana nelikamakekere kezomzabalazo uNomzana Duma Nokwe.
tgt_text: Bjalo ka mmušo, re dula re ikgafile go maikarabelo molaotheo go šireletša ditokelo tša botho tša batho ka moka ka nageng re šomeng mmogo go netefatša gore ga re tlogele motho morago go dira gore dipeelano tša Molaotheo wa Repabliki ya Afrika Borwa wa 1996 le Molaokakanywa wa Ditokelo be nnete ye phetšwego go bohle.

src_text: UmThethokambiso weliZweloke wokuLondwa Budijithali kwemiSebenzi yobuGwali, yamaSiko neyeziNto eziliGugu.
tgt_text: Letšatši la Lefase la Meetse.

src_text: IKhabinethi iphasise nomThethokambiso weliZweloke wokuLondwa Budijithali kwemiSebenzi yobuGwali, yamaSiko neyeziNto eziliGugu (i-National Policy on the Digitisation of Arts, Culture and Heritage) bona ungasetjenziswa.
tgt_text: Afrika Borwa tla swaya Beke ya Bosetšhaba ya Meetse go tloga ka la 20 go fihla ka la 26 Jlakola 2023 ka fase ga morero wa: “Go akgofiša Phetogo”.

src_text: Umthethokambiso lo ubuye ukugunyaze ukusetjenziswa kwe-National Policy on the Digitisation of Heritage Resources ekumgomo owatlanywa mNyango wangalesosikhathi wezobuGwali namaSiko ngomnyaka wee-.
tgt_text: Beke ye sepelelana le Letšatši la Lefase la Meetse ka la 22 Hlakola 2023, leo le laetšago bohlokwa bja meetse hlwekilego.

src_text: Umthethokambiso lo utjheja ukufakwa kudijithali kweensiza zamagugu wesitjhaba bona zilondwe, zitholakale begodu kulawuleke nobunikazi bazo.
tgt_text: Go sa šetšwe dipula tša morago bjale tše matla dikarolong tša naga, Afrika Borwa sa dutše le naga yeo hlaelelago meetse gomme maemong go ba ye nngwe ya dinaga tša bo 30 tše di omilego kudu lefaseng.

src_text: Nanyana ikambiso yedijithali ifaka hlangana ukutjhugululwa ngendlela yokuthoma ye-analogu ukuya kudijithali kwemitlolo, ekubalwa amarikhodi wamaphepha, i-microfiche nemigadangiso yamatheyibhu ekungasi ngeyedijithali, umgomo lo ukhambiselele ihlathululolo eensizeni ezibizwa ngama-born-digital resources ezifana nelwazi elivezwe ngedijithali, ekungeze latjhugululelwa endleleni ephathekako.
tgt_text: Kabinete biditše badudi ka moka go šireletša methopo ya rena ya meetse ye bohlokwa go swana le mafelo monola, ka ge tše di le bohlokwa kudu go tšhireletšo ya rena ya meetse ya lebaka le letelele.

src_text: Ukungena kudijithali kuza neembonelelo ezikulu enarheni le njengombana kuzokwenza bona ilwazi litholakale lula, khulu khulu lelo elikuma-archive, ema-library, nakuma-museum.
tgt_text: Ka moka ga rena re na le tema yeo re swanetšego go kgatha go boloka meetse le go netefatša gore kabo ya rena ga ome.

src_text: Umthethokambiso lo uzokuhlonywa kurhulumende nemphakathini  UmThethomlingwa.
tgt_text: Letšatši la Lefase la Bolwetši bja Mafahla (TB).

src_text: UmThethomlingwa oKhibelelako wezoBulungiswa womNyaka wee-.
tgt_text: Motlatšamopresidente Paul Mashatile tla fa polelo ya motheo nakong ya segopotšo sa semmušo sa Letšatši la Lefase la TB ka la 24 Hlakola 2023 ka fase ga moeno wo rego: “Ee!

src_text: Ikhabinethi iphasise nokusiwa komThethomlingwa  oKhibelelako wezoBulungiswa womNyaka wee-2023 ePalamende.
tgt_text: Nna le Wena Re ka Fediša TB”.

src_text: Umthethomlingwa lo kuhloswe ngawo ukutjhugulula imithetho embalwa eyabekwa mNyango wezoBulungiswa nokuThuthukiswa komThethosisekelo ngokutjheja izinto ezingeneleleko nokhunye okuthinta ukusetjenziswa kwemithetho le.
tgt_text: Tiragalo ya semmušo ka Lepatlelong la Tlhabane ka Leboa Bodikela tla bona gape Lekgotla la Bosetšhaba la AIDS la Afrika Borwa le Kgoro ya Maphelo ba tsebagatša Leano la Togamaano la Bosetšhaba la TB, HIV le Diphetetšo tša Thobalano la 2023 go fihla ka.

src_text: Umthethomlingwa lo uneendinyana ezima-37 ezitjhukumisa bona kwenziwe amatjhuguluko azakulungisa imitjhapho esemithethweni ehlukahlukeneko elethwe kudzubhula kumthethosisekelo  Iminyanya Ezako.
tgt_text: Se se aga godimo ga kgatelopele ye bohlokwa yeo fihleletšwego ka nepo ye mpshafaditšwego go thibelo, kalafo, go amogelwa, khupetšo le go kgomarela, le go fediša kgethollo le kgethollo     Melaetša.

src_text: Ilanga lamaLungelo woBuntu.
tgt_text: DitebogišoKabinete rometše ditebogišo le go akela mahlatse le mahlogonolo go:Sehlopha sa di-Proteas seo gabjale se ralokago le sa West Indies mo ketelong ya dithaloko tša go fapafapana.

src_text: UMengameli u-Ramaphosa uyokwethula ikulumo yelanga emnyanyeni wesitjhaba wokutshwaya iLanga lamaLungelo woBuntu lomnyaka wee-2023 ngeLesibili nakama-21 kuNtaka wee-2023 e-De Aar West Stadium, eTlhagwini Kapa.
tgt_text: Kabinete ipiletša go maAfrika Borwa ka moka go thekga Proteas ge tšwela pele go fofiša folaga ya rena godimo.

src_text: Isiqubulo sanonyaka sithi: “Consolidating and Sustaining Human Rights Culture Into The Future”, njengombana sizabe sikhumbula izehlakalo zokuRhayilwa kwabantu e- Sharpeville nakwaLanga, neminye iimatjho eyaba mhlana ama-21 kuNtaka 1960 elizweni loke..  Singurhulumende sisazibophelele kilokho ekufuneka ngokomthethosisekelo ekukuvikela amalungelo wobuntu wabo boke abantu belizweli.
tgt_text: MatshidišoKabinete rometše matshidišo go ba lapa le bagwera ba:Molekgotlaphethiši wa Thuto ka Freistata, Tate Makgoe (60), yo bilego le seabe se segolo kudu ka lekaleng la thuto gomme eta pele Freistata ka katlego go fihlelela dipoelo tša godimodimo tša marematlou mengwaga ye mene ka go latelana.Mme Maurencia Gillion , yo emetšego Kapa Bodikela ka Lekgotleng la Bosetšhaba la Diprofense, gomme šoma ka Komiting ya Nakwana ya Maphelo le Ditirelo tša Leago.

src_text: Asisebenzisaneni ukuqinisekisa bona akekho esimtjhiya ngemuva soke nasilandela ukusebenza komThethosisekelo weRiphabhliki yeSewula Afrika ka-1996 kunye nomTlolo wamaLungelo  woBuntu.
tgt_text: Yena be le molwelatokologo yo tsebegago kudu gomme hlanketše batho ba Kapa Bodikela, kudukudu ka dinagamagaeng tša profense, mengwaga ye mentšhi.Morena John Wills (66), ramolao wa go tuma wa ditokelo tša botho ebile le molweladitokelo tša botho yoo kilego emela baetapele ba bantšhi ba dipolotiki, go akaretšwa Mopresidente wa peleng Nelson Mandela.Morena Mark Pilgrim (54), raditaba yo hlohleleditšego le go huetša batho ba bantšhi ka indasetering ya bobegaditaba.Mme Gloria Bosman (50), seopedi seo se thopilego difoka sa mmino wa jazz ebile le mohlami wa dikoša wa Afrika Borwa     Go ThwalwaBatho ka moka bao ba thwetšwego mešomong mangwalo bona thuto tlo tiišetšwa le go netefatšwa ka tsela ya maleba.

src_text: Ilanga lezaManzi ePhasini loke.
tgt_text: Maloko Lekgotla la Boeletši la Taolo ya Dithaetlele tša Meagokabelano     Moadfokeiti Boyce Mkhize (Modulasetulo)     Kgoši Pheni Cypraim Ngove (Motlatšamodulasetulo)     Mme Kagisho Mmaseleke Choenyana     Morena Pieter Jacobus De Beer     Moadfokeiti Nomonde Nokuthula January     Morena Iqbal Mohamed Motala; le     Ngaka Vuyisani Moss.
